story:
Ondervind je problemen met betalen? Mail naar linekekoomen@hotmail.com; je ontvangt dan de nodige informatie om het geld met internetbankieren over te maken. Bedankt!

Klikk her for norsk

Click here for English

           

 

Rickshaw Run 2015
In april gaan wij ruim 2700 kilometer afleggen van west naar oost India in een gemotoriseerde driewieler, beter bekend als een riksja. En dit in circa 14 dagen tijd. Er is geen vaste route, we zullen obstakels tegenkomen en er zal geen 'bezemwagen' zijn... dat is de uitdaging. Natuurlijk zitten we zelf achter het stuur. Met 3 backpacks op het dak.... Het wordt een avontuur!

Tijdens ons avontuur willen we ons steentje bijdragen en iets kunnen betekenen voor de lokale bevolking. Wij willen dit moment aangrijpen om het leven van sommige lokale mensen gemakkelijker te maken. Daarom zamelen we tijdens ons avontuur geld in voor Stichting Duniya.

Maar, wie zijn "wij" eigenlijk?
Wij zijn een drietal dat bestaat uit twee Nederlandse meiden en 1 stoere viking uit Noorwegen. We zijn alle drie gek op reizen en zo hebben we elkaar dan ook ontmoet. Samen bedachten we dit India-avontuur aan te gaan en zo was team "Vikings on Clogs" een feit.


De riksja en de 'run'

Riksja’s zijn niet de meeste ideale vervoersmiddelen voor een reis door India. Ze zijn traag, ze stinken, ze vallen om als je een scherpe bocht maakt. Maar op de 1 of andere manier is het een ideaal voertuig voor een mooi avontuur...

De technische specificaties op een rijtje:
Motor: tweetakt, eencilinder 
Kracht: 7 PK bij 5000 tpm
Transmissie: 4 versnellingen
Brandstoftank: 8 ltr + 1.4 reserve
Topsnelheid: 55km/u (bergafwaarts)
Motorinhoud: 145.45 cc
Voltage: 12V , DC


De Rickshaw Run heeft een vast start- en eindpunt. De start is in Jaisalmer in het westen van India en de finish is in het oosten in Shillong. En dan nog wat 'detours' onderweg natuurlijk...

 Maar hoe ver is dat dan eigenlijk? Om je een idee te geven: de afstand is te vergelijken met een rit van Oslo naar Barcelona.


Wat doet Stichting Duniya?

Stichting Duniya is opgericht om de inwoners van de sloppenwijk Nagwa in de Noord-Indiase stad Varanasi gezondheidszorg en onderwijs te bieden. Onder de vlag van Duniya Eduction ontfermen leerkrachten zich dagelijks over ruim tachtig leergierige kinderen, die tijdens de middagpauze een voedzame maaltijd krijgen voorgeschoteld door de kok van Duniya Nutrition. Niet zelden is dit de enige warme maaltijd die ze op een dag eten. 


Intussen is de eerste generatie kinderen van de Duniya Generation doorgestroomd naar het voortgezet onderwijs. De kosten voor dit externe onderwijs worden ook door Duniya gedragen. Ook wordt er in het naaiatelier van Duniya Decoration hard gewerkt aan handgemaakte artikelen die via Duniya's eigen webwinkel verkocht worden. De vrouwen van Nagwa die er werken weten zich verzekerd van een bescheiden maar regelmatig inkomen. 

Stichting Duniya is een kleinschalige organisatie ontvangt geen subsidies, maar draait volledig op particuliere donaties. Wij brengen tijdens onze reis door India een bezoek aan Duniya in Varanasi (ongeveer halverwege onze trip)!

Hoe kun jij helpen?

Ons doel is om minimaal €1250,- op te halen voor Stichting Duniya. We zouden het daarom te gek vinden als je een bijdrage wilt leveren. Dat kan je doen door rechts op de knop 'Contribute now' te klikken. Je bepaalt dan zelf het bedrag dat jij kunt missen.

Vind je het leuk om er, naast goede karma, ook nog iets tastbaars voor terug te krijgen? Dat kan! Kijk dan even aan de rechterkant van deze pagina naar de 'perks' (een souvenir voor jou). 

Natuurlijk help je ons ook heel erg als je deze pagina deelt & vergeet niet om ons avontuur door India te volgen! 

Hoe werkt het met betalen?

Je kunt via deze website met Paypal of direct met creditcard betalen. Je vindt beide mogelijkheden achter de knop 'Contribute now'. Betalen via de website heeft natuurlijk onze voorkeur, want zo tikt de teller direct door en kunnen we jouw donatie goed bijhouden.

Maar mocht het je nou niet lukken via deze weg, stuur dan een e-mail naar linekekoomen@hotmail.com. Vermeld hierin het bedrag dat je wilt doneren, eventueel je 'perk' naar keuze en in dit laatste geval ook je post adres. Wij zorgen dat jouw donatie op de juiste plek komt.

Norsk: Rickshaw Run og Veldedighet

Galskapen:

I april 2015 skal vi (Svein-Ole, Monique and Lineke) stille med lag i The Rickshaw Run I India. Dette er altså en sammensetning av en nordmann og to nederlandske damer!

Vi stiller som “Team Vikings on Clogs” (Viking med tresko for de om ikke skulle skjønne den). Det vi skal gjøre er å krysse India på tvers fra Jaisalmer i vest til Shillong i øst i en Rickshaw (tuk-tuk) ila 14 dager. Og ja. Vi skal kjøre selv! Strekningen er ikke mindre enn ca 2800km (se kart over) og tilsvarer en strekning fra Oslo til Barcelona. Det er ingen fast rute, ingen reserveplan og ingen som helst garanti for at vi vil klare å fullføre. Vi har start og målpunkt og så er det opp til oss å finne beste/verste rute. Det eneste som er sikkert er at vi kommer til å kjøre oss bort, kjøre oss fast og at vi vil få problem med Rickshawen under veis. Det er det som er selve utfordringen! Rickshaw run

Vår geniale Rickshaw!

Hvis Gud hadde skapt verdens maskiner, så hadde han mest sannsynlig droppet å lage en Rickshaw.

Det er i utgangspunktet ingen god ide. Den er langt i fra rask, den lukter, bråker og tipper når du svinger litt for brått. Den slår seg oftere vrang enn en EMO i tenårene og etter en dag bak spakene, så kjennes det som en elefant har sparket deg i rævva. Men så er det et eller annet som er tiltrekkende med disse doningene og derfor har vi tatt utfordringen. Og med en teknisk spesifikasjon som dette, så er det vanskelig å si nei til denne turen:

Motor: en sylinder, totaker, luftavkjølt

Effekt: 7hk på 5000 rpm (tilsvarer en familiehund)

Overføring: 4 gir frem og 1 revers

Kapasitet: 8 liters tank + 1,4 reserve

Topphastighet: 55 km/t (Nedover, med sola i ryggen og kjøttkaker til middag)

Motor: 145 CCM


Duniya - Veldedighet i slummen

Men turen handler om mer enn bare å ha det "moro". Vi skal også samle inn penger til en Indisk veldedighetsorganisasjon som heter Duniya og her kommer du inn i bildet!

Duniya Foundation ble etablert i 1996 for å gi innbyggerne i slummen Nagwa i den nordindiske byen Varanasi skolegang og basis helseartikler. Organisasjonen hjelper bl.a barn med skolegang, mat og aktiviteter. 

I avdelingen Duniya Banks Utdanning er det lærere som daglig underviser ca. åtti nysgjerrige barn, som i tillegg får et måltid til lunsj av Duniya Nutrition. Dette er ofte det eneste varme måltid de spiser i løpet av dagen. For 1000kr i året er et barn sikret skolegang, skoleuniform, mat og hygieneartikler som tannbørster utdelt månedlig.

Når barna blir større, så blir de overført til Duniya Generation og til videregående opplæring. Kostnaden for utdanning er også finansiert av Duniya stiftelsen.

De har også et håndarbeidsverksted hvor de lager tepper og andre håndlagde produkter. Disse selges gjennom Duniyas egen nettbutikk. Kvinner som jobber i Nagwa er sikret en beskjeden, men nødvendig inntekt. Duniya Foundation mottar ingen subsidier og er kun basert på private donasjoner.

De har et samarbeid og administrasjon i Nederland. Administrasjon er baser fullt og helt på frivillighet! Nettsiden inneholder ikke alt for mye informasjon på engelsk, men er verdt et besøk. http://www.duniya.org/

Vi har allerede vært i kontakt med Duniya og kommer også til å besøke de på vår ferd igjennom India. Til dere som er med å bidra, så har Duniya lovet  å gi en liten gave i retur til dere som kjøper en "perk". Disse tar vi med hjem i ryggsekken og distribuerer når vi er tilbake. Vårt mål er å samle inn 1250 euro!   (Dvs skolegang til ca 12 barn i ett år!). Mer info om gavene finner du under "perks" knappen. 

Donasjoner:

NB! velger du å kjøpe en "perk", så vil du motta en gave tilbake, men det er også mulig å donere egendefinert beløp.

Du må velge betalingsmåte PayPal, men når du åpner linken, så kan du velge å benytte kredittkort! 

Har du problem med å finne ut av betalingen, så kontakt meg på facebook eller send meg en mail på retterasen@gmail.com

På forhånd takk for hjelpen!


English section:

Rickshaw Run 2015

In April we will be driving through India in a glorified lawnmower, also known as a rickshaw. The journey is about 2700km from west to east India in about 2 weeks. We will be driving ourselves and our backpacks will go on the roof. No set route, no back-up, no way of knowing if we are going to make it. The only certainty is that we will get lost we will get stuck and we will break down....it’ll be an adventure!

While we’re on our adventure, we would like to contribute to the Indian community. We would like to take this opportunity to help make the life for some of them a bit better. That is why we are raising money for Duniya Foundation.

But first of all: who are “we”?

We are two Dutch girls and one tough viking from Norway. We all love to travel and therefore it will be no surprise that’s the way we met. Together we decided to participate in this Indian-adventure and that is how team ‘Vikings on clogs’ was born.


The rickshaw and the run

If God had made machines he probably wouldn’t have bothered with a Rickshaw. Essentially, it’s not a very good idea. It’s not very fast, it smells, it falls over when you go round corners, it breaks down more often than an emo teenager and a days driving feels like you’ve been kicked up the arse by an elephant. But somehow all this makes them better.

Here are some specs:
Engine: 2 stroke, single cylinder, forced air cooled 
Power: 7 HP at 5000 rpm (equiv. 1 family dog)
Transmission: 4 forward 1 reverse
Fuel Capacity: 8 ltr + 1.4 reserve
TopSpeed: 55km/u (downhill)
Engine size: 145.45 cc
System Voltage: 12V , DC

The Rickshaw Run has a set starting point and finish line. The starting point will be in Jaisalmer which is in the west of India and the finish line is in Shillong in the east. Of course we will make some detours along the way…How far is it really? It’s the same distance as driving from Oslo to Barcelona! (Scroll a bit up for maps/pics/route)

Duniya Foundation

Duniya Foundaton was established in 1996 to help the residents of Nagwa slum in the northern Indian city of Varanasi to have access to health and education.

Duniya’s teachers educate more than 80 studious children, the children are provided a warm meal during lunch break by the chef of Duniya Nutrition. This is often the only warm meal they will eat in a day.

The first generation of school kids started to go to high school. The costs for this external education are also covered by Duniya through Duniya Generation. In the artstore of Duniya Decoration handmade items are produced by local woman. These woman from Nagwa earn a modest but regular income  by selling this artwork through Duniya’s webshop.

Duniya Foundation is a small organization which is entirely dependent on private donations. During our rickshaw run through India we will visit Duniya in Varanasi to meet the kids, teachers, staff and experience how it’s run on a daily basis.  This is also where we’re going to pick up the perks, bring it home and send it to you!

What can you do to help?

We set ourselves the goal to raise at least €1250,- for Duniya Foundation. We would really appreciate if you could contribute to that. You can make a donation by pressing the button ‘Contribute now’. Do you like to get something nice in return, besides good karma? That is possible! Pick a nice perk, you’ll find the options on the right side of this page. 

Of course you can also help us out by sharing this page & don’t forget to follow us on our adventure!

How does the payment system works?

You can donate through this website via Paypal or via creditcard. You’ll find both possibilities if you click the button ‘Contribute now’. We prefer to receive the donations this way, because we can keep the score and keep track of your donation.

But, if you don’t have a PayPal account or if you receive an error when paying by credit card you can try a third method: send us an e-mail on linekekoomen@hotmail.com or retterasen@gmail.com. Let us know what the amount is that you would like to donate, if you would like to receive a perk then send us your postal address. We will make sure your money gets into the right hands.

Men så er det et eller annet som er tiltrekkende med disse doningene og derfor har vi tatt utfordringen. Og med en teknisk spesifikasjon som dette, så er det vanskelig å si nei til denne turen:
Motor: en sylinder, totaker, luftavkjølt
Effekt: 7hk på 5000 rpm (tilsvarer en familiehund)
Overføring: 4 gir frem og 1 revers
Kapasitet: 8 liters tank + 1,4 reserve
Topphastighet: 55 km/t (Nedover, med sola i ryggen og kjøttkaker til middag)
Motor: 145 CCM
Duniya - Veldedighet i slummen

Men turen handler om mer enn bare å ha det "moro". Vi skal også samle inn penger til en Indisk veldedighetsorganisasjon som heter Duniya og her kommer du inn i bildet!
Duniya
Foundation ble etablert i 1996 for å gi innbyggerne i slummen Nagwa i den
nordindiske byen Varanasi skolegang og basis helseartikler. Organisasjonen
hjelper bl.a barn med skolegang, mat og aktiviteter. 
I avdelingen Duniya Banks
Utdanning er det lærere som daglig underviser ca. åtti nysgjerrige barn, som i
tillegg får et måltid til lunsj av Duniya
Nutrition. Dette er ofte det eneste varme måltid de spiser i løpet av dagen. For 1000kr i året er et barn sikret skolegang, skoleuniform, mat og hygieneartikler som tannbørster utdelt månedlig.
Når barna blir større, så blir
de overført til Duniya Generation og til videregående opplæring. Kostnaden for utdanning
er også finansiert av Duniya stiftelsen. 
De har også et håndarbeidsverksted hvor de lager tepper og andre håndlagde produkter. Disse selges gjennom Duniyas
egen nettbutikk. Kvinner som jobber i Nagwa er sikret en beskjeden, men nødvendig
inntekt. Duniya Foundation mottar ingen subsidier og er kun basert på private
donasjoner.
De har et samarbeid og administrasjon i Nederland. Administrasjon er baser fullt og helt på frivillighet! Nettsiden inneholder ikke alt for mye informasjon på engelsk, men er verdt
et besøk. http://www.duniya.org/
Vi har allerede vært i kontakt med Duniya og kommer også til å besøke
de på vår ferd igjennom India. Til dere som er med å bidra, så har Duniya lovet  å gi en liten gave i retur til dere som kjøper en "perk". Disse tar vi med hjem i ryggsekken og distribuerer når vi er tilbake. Vårt mål er å samle inn 1250 euro!   (Dvs skolegang til ca 12 barn i ett år!). Mer info om gavene finner du under "perks" knappen. 
Donasjoner:
NB! velger du å kjøpe en "perk", så vil du motta en gave tilbake, men det er også mulig å donere egendefinert beløp.
Du må velge betalingsmåte PayPal, men når du åpner linken, så kan du velge å benytte kredittkort! 
Har du problem med å finne ut av betalingen, så kontakt meg på facebook eller send meg en mail på retterasen@gmail.com
På forhånd takk for hjelpen!




English section:
Rickshaw
Run 2015

In April we will be driving through India in a glorified lawnmower, also known as
a rickshaw. The journey is about 2700km from west to east India in about 2
weeks. We will be driving ourselves and our backpacks will go on the roof. No
set route, no back-up, no way of knowing if we are going to make it. The only
certainty is that we will get lost we will get stuck and we will break down....it’ll
be an adventure!

While we’re on our adventure, we would like to contribute to the Indian community.
We would like to take this opportunity to help make the life for some of them a
bit better. That is why we are raising money for Duniya Foundation. 



But first of all: who are “we”?

We are two Dutch girls and one tough viking from Norway. We all love to travel and
therefore it will be no surprise that’s the way we met. Together we decided to
participate in this Indian-adventure and that is how team ‘Vikings on clogs’
was born.

The rickshaw and the run

If God had made machines he
probably wouldn’t have bothered with a Rickshaw. Essentially, it’s not a very
good idea. It’s not very fast, it smells, it falls over when you go round
corners, it breaks down more often than an emo teenager and a days driving feels
like you’ve been kicked up the arse by an elephant. But
somehow all this makes them better. 
Here are some specs:
Engine: 2 stroke, single cylinder, forced air cooled 
Power: 7 HP at 5000 rpm (equiv. 1 family dog)
Transmission: 4 forward 1 reverse
Fuel Capacity: 8 ltr + 1.4 reserve
TopSpeed: 55km/u (downhill)
Engine size: 145.45 cc
System Voltage: 12V , DC

The Rickshaw Run has a set starting point and finish line. The starting point
will be in Jaisalmer which is in the west of India and the finish line is in
Shillong in the east. Of course we will make some detours along the way…How far
is it really? It’s the same distance as driving from Oslo to Barcelona! (Scroll a bit up for maps/pics/route)

Duniya
Foundation
Duniya Foundaton was
established in 1996 to help the residents of Nagwa slum in the northern Indian
city of Varanasi to have access to health and education.

Duniya’s teachers educate more than 80 studious children, the children are
provided a warm meal during lunch break by the chef of Duniya Nutrition. This
is often the only warm meal they will eat in a day.

The first generation of school kids started to go to high school. The costs for
this external education are also covered by Duniya through Duniya Generation.
In the artstore of Duniya Decoration handmade items are produced by local
woman. These woman from Nagwa earn a modest but regular income  by selling this artwork through Duniya’s
webshop. 

Duniya Foundation is a small organization which is entirely dependent on
private donations. During our rickshaw run through India we will visit Duniya
in Varanasi to meet the kids, teachers, staff and experience how it’s run on a daily basis.  This is also where we’re going to pick up the perks, bring it home and send it to you!


What can you do to
help?
We
set ourselves the goal to raise at least €1250,- for Duniya Foundation. We
would really appreciate if you could contribute to that. You can make a
donation by pressing the button ‘Contribute now’. Do you like to get something
nice in return, besides good karma? That is possible! Pick a nice perk, you’ll
find the options on the right side of this page. 

Of course you can also help us out by sharing this page & don’t forget to
follow us on our adventure!
How
does the payment system works?

You can donate through this website via Paypal or via
creditcard. You’ll find both possibilities if you click the button ‘Contribute
now’. We prefer to receive the donations this way, because we can keep the
score and keep track of your donation. 

But, if you don’t have a PayPal account or if you receive an error when paying
by credit card you can try a third method: send us an e-mail on linekekoomen@hotmail.com or retterasen@gmail.com. Let us know what
the amount is that you would like to donate, if you would like to receive a
perk then send us your postal address. We will make sure your money gets into
the right hands.

story:
Who we are

-We are a group of people between the ages of 17-26.
-We are passionate about getting teenagers to use their bikes instead of the bus and private cars for transportation.
-Our mission is to make it a habit for young people to choose their bike as their main transportation. And to make a difference and impact in every teenagers future.  


What We Need & What You Get
-We need sponsors and funding to start a pilot program at a High School in Stavanger, Norway.
-The money goes toward development of bike tracking technology.

-Being a role model and being a part of making a difference in a teenagers everyday life.


The Impact
-Making it a habit to use a bike for the main transportation in a community
-Punctual employees
-Less rush
-Positive employees
-Healthier employees/ less sick leave at work and school
-More environmentally friendly community
-Making Stavanger a social community
-Getting teens more engaged in making a positive future for themselves and others.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would greatly appreciate it if you guys could help spread the word.

And to make a difference and impact in every teenagers future.   What We Need & What You Get-We need sponsors and funding to start a pilot program at a High School in Stavanger, Norway. -The money goes toward development of bike tracking technology. -Being a role model and being a part of making a difference in a teenagers everyday life.

story:
The inside temperature of an enclosed vehicle under the sun can reach a fatal level as quickly as 10 mins. However, traditional windshield sunshade or tinted windows only have limited effectiveness to reduce the heat.

 

Animation of temperature inside of a car every ten minutes as it sits in the sun when the outside temperature is 80 degrees (General Motors and Golden Gate Weather Services).

 

Why doesn't traditional windshield sunshade work?

Its advantages: 

  • Cheap.
  • Inside the vehicle so it is safe when sudden turbulent winds hit.

Its disadvantages:

  • Not effective, especially when the side facing the sun is not covered. 
  • It is inside the vehicle, so heat generated will still trapped inside.
  • It takes space to store, and takes time to put on and take off. 
  • Low or almost no privacy.

 

Why doesn't tinted window work?

Its advantages:

  • Clean and straightforward, no extra moving parts.
  • Safe when sudden turbulent winds hit.

Its disadvantages: 

  • Still need windshield sunshade.
  • Laws dictate how much you can block, so still at least 30-40% light can get in and it is not very effective when car is under the sun for several hours.
  • By considering that only half of the windows can be tinted, so your best bet is it is only 20-25% effective.
  • Grilling turkey effect: the dark tint is really good to turn sunlight to heat, so the tainted glass will become extreme hot like the grilling bird inside the oven (crispy outside, tender insider?). It is kind of count productive.
  • Tinted windows introduce some risks when drive under low light condition.

Other prior arts or ideas are either too bulky, too complicated, need too much manual handling, or not practical at all. Sunshade360 overcomes all those drawbacks and provides an automated, effective, slim, and convenient way to cool your car and protect your privacy.  It keeps your vehicle from the burning sun and prying eyes with just a click of a button.

If this compaign is successful, Sunshade360 will start delivery before June'2014.

 

Sunshade360 provides 360 degrees coverage

All the shades and the extendable/retractable arms are stored inside a thin aerodynamic box, which is mounted on the top of the vehicle (to your car's roof rack). When retracted, Sunshade360 has minimal or no impact to the driving visibility and the fuel economy, with a very neat and clean design.   

Sunshade360 in retracted state

 

When extended, the shades cover all the windows from all 360 degrees, no matter how and where you park your vehicle. 

Sunshade360 in parked state 

 

Works on other types of vehicle too

 

Sunshade360 will block all the sunlight before its heat and harmful UV even reach your car. At the same time, it also provides a layer of heat isolation air between the shades and vehicle body. The air is constantly moving, so the vehicle's passenger compartment will never feel or see the sunlight. The maximum inside temperature it could possibly reach is the surrounding air tempture.

 Maximum protection from the sunshine and heat

 

Sunshade360 provides maximum privacy

Since all the windows are covered from all directions, you have created your own personal space with total privacy. It also protects your valuables from any prying eyes. Imaging this, you can take a nap, change clothes at the beach, read a book, or watch video without the eyes-blinding sunlight or peoples curious peek. 

 

Sunshade360 in retracted position, sunshine and no block of view

 

 Sunshade360 in closed state, no light or prying eyes can penetrate the shades

 

 

Sunshade360 is practical 

Sunshade360 has a very small footprint and it is very thin with an aerodynamic low profile. When it is in full extended position, Sunshade360 is even narrower than your vehicle's side mirror. One of the biggest difference of this design from others is the shades will turn to fit the car's exterior, so the risk of car damaging will be dramatically reduced when the wind storms suddenly hit.

Top view when it is in maximum extended state, very small footprint

 

 Top view when Sunshade360 is in parked state, no extra parking space needed and it will hold under turbulent weather

 

 

Sunshade360 is convenient

Sunshade360 is powered with solar panels, and comes with a slim wireless remote control. It is opened and closed with a click of a button. No tangling wires, no manual handling. When you reach your vehicle, it will be ready and cool, just for you.

A car key control is all your need to carry or operate.

 

Sunshade360 is flexible

Sunshade360's shades are individually operated. You could open all shades or just one. Therefore you can keep cool when you are enjoying the view, or waiting for kids inside the car, or even when you are totally stuck on highway traffic. 

 Leave front shade open

 

 Leave one side-shade open

 

Sunshade360 comes with style

Certainly we do not want a big, bulky, black box on the top of the vehicle. We definitely can throw some styles into the design to make it a little bit fashionable.

A design similar to this 

 

 

Or a design similar to this

 

Sunshade360 team t-shirt design preview

Perk recommendation

Since it is not realistic to have an one-size-fit-all Sunshade360, the following listed vehicles will be covered first.

 

 

FAQs

Q: How is the Sunshade360 mounted to the top of the vehicle?

A: Now majority of the minivan and SUV comes with factory installed roof rack and Sunshade360 will be counted very securely to the roof rack.  If your vehicle is not equipped with a roof rack, the installation package will include one.

Q: Can someone steal the Sunshade360 when the vehicle is parked unattended?

A: The risk is very low, there will be a locking mechanism with keys that secures the Sunshade360 to the roof rack.  

Q: How to prevent the shade is deployed during driving?

A: It will lock the Sunshade360 at the retracted position when it detects that vehicle is moving or the outside winds are too strong.

Q: How to retract the shades when the driving mechanis does not work?

A: It will come with a mannual procesure to roll the shades in when the automated system is failed. 

 

Risks and challenges

SYSTEM INTEGRATION

The sunshade360 system is a highly integrated system that need to endure the harsh environment and whatever the mother nature is throwing at it. We believe all the building blocks and engineering principles are already developed so the main risk is the integration. To achieve the level of simplicity in user experience and quality/reliability that it needs, we will design the sunshade360 system with Design For Manufacturing principle, take advantage the mass source of off shelf modules, and test system with an obsession for perfection.

LOGISTICS & SUPPLY CHAIN

Many Indiegogo campaigns can encounter problems when taking their lab prototypes to mass production, for example, how to manage different form factors for different cars. To tackle this, we think execution and project timeline management are the keys and are essential for this project. We take this issue seriously with plans in place. Now we mainly require the resources to execute them.

TEAM

Right people is one of the most critical part of the project. We want to build a talented, passionate, motivated designers and engineers team. If you are interested, please drop us a note.

story:
GOAL UPDATE

QUICK-SWAP WHEELS are UNLOCKED! See the perks listed for wheels to pre-order for CLASSIC, TRAVEL, and RACER.

PRODUCTION UPDATE

Huger is in production - we can’t wait to get these boards into your hands! Orders are on track to start shipping October 2017.

 

 

Huger's electric skateboards have great range and grade capabilities, AND are affordable. Everything you want in one incredible board.

 

 

 

 

"With impressive specs like a 22 mile range and navigation capabilities, the [Huger] Travel board just may be a board like no other."

- Johnathan Lonso, Tech on a Budget 

 

 
“It’s fast. These hills are big. If they can handle these hills, they can handle anything. It’s too easy.”
 
 - Dylan Kowalski
 
“This is the board you’re looking for!…It doesn’t feel cheap, and it’s definitely not a toy. Even if your battery dies, you can use it as a traditional skateboard. Practically weightless compared to other e-skateboards that can weigh up to 30lbs."

- Johnathan Lonso, Tech on a Budget 

 

 

Huger’s innovations in adjustable acceleration are an industry first. Choose from 0-100% in the Huger app for a tailored riding experience.

 

Huger’s ergonomic bluetooth-enabled remote control puts power in the palm of your hand.

 

With the Huger Travel Board, ride in style with 7 customizable undercarriage lights. Navigate traffic safely with ease with Huger front and rear LED lights, brake lights, and turn signals.

 

Using high-quality, industry-grade materials, Huger electric skateboards are built to last and keep you safe. UL certification pending.

 

Our Huger Quick Swap Battery system takes less than 60 seconds to get you back on the road riding. For the Travel & Racer only.

 
 

 

  • The Travel Board goes up to 22 miles on a single charge. 
  • The Racer Board hits speeds up to 25 mph. 
  • The Classic Board is under 9 pounds. 

 

Quality. Safety. Durability. Huger electric skateboard motors are IPX6 waterproof rated so you can ride with confidence.

 

Tackle tough climbs with Huger's impressive grade capabilities.

 

Huger’s ergonomic bluetooth-enabled remote control gives you the power at your fingertips.

 

 

 

 

 

The free iOS and Android app lets you easily set up and manage your experience.

 

With 3 easy steps, the product is simple to set up and intuitive to use.

 

What you get with your pre-order.

 

 

Our mighty small device packs a big punch. This striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home.  

 

 

Our designs have been tested and proven. We've been perfecting the technology to get it ready to bring home. Orders are on track to start shipping October 2017.

 

 
Here's a sneak peek at what 12 layers of Canada's best Maple Wood look like as our CNC (Computer Numerical Control) Machining process guides your deck from lathe to mill, routers and grinder.

 

 
Ever wonder how hub motors are made? Check out Huger's here!
 
 

Huger Tech is a startup based in Southern California that provides world class technology to power smart electric mobility products that are efficient, durable and affordable.

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship the product in October 2017*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.
*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date. International shipping may take an additional 7-10 days to ship. 

 

By backing now, you’ll get your hands on the very first Huger electric skateboards at low prices only available to backers on Indiegogo.

 

What is it? Huger Tech offers the most innovative, powerful, and affordable electric skateboard models available on the market.
Who created it? Huger Tech, a startup based in Southern California, providing world class technology to power smart electric mobility products that are efficient, durable, and affordable.
Why should we use it?

Cut traffic and get to work *that* much easier. Pure joy, adrenaline, and enjoyment.

Travel faster, ride farther, and spend less money than with anything else on the market!
Where can we buy it? Right here, right now on Indiegogo.
What do we get when we order? Electric Skateboard of Your Choice, Bluetooth Remote Control, Removable Wrist Strap, Charger with Detachable Cord, T-Tool, Micro USB Cable, User's Manual, Advanced User Bushings (Travel & Racer only).
Why are you crowdfunding?

To offer our earliest supporters the best prices possible. We're excited to bring Huger's technology to Indiegogo and beyond!

 

What features are available?

Travel: Cutting-edge tech and efficiency in one durable board with industry-leading range. The all-around solution for the modern commuter who needs some speed.

  • Dual hub motors with an IPX6 waterproof rating
  • Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning, top deck LED lights for GPS navigation and under carriage lights available in 7 colors
  • 22-mile range on up to a 20% incline with top speeds reaching 20 mph
  • Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

Racer: Fast and unbelievably powerful. For the thrill-seeker who can appreciate style.

  • Dual hub motors and an IPX6 waterproof rating
  • Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning
  • 20-mile range on up to a 25% incline with top speeds reaching 25 mph
  • Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

Classic: An iconic look with a modern upgrade. For the traditionalist who enjoys a boost.

  • Single hub motor and an IPX6 waterproof rating
  • Minimal resistance from motor, allowing riders to push the board like a normal skateboard
  • Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning
  • 8.5-mile range with top speeds reaching 15 mph
  • Battery recharges in 1-1.5 hours
What sizes do you offer?

Travel: Measurements: 31.5in x 7.8in in size, 14.6lbs in weight  

Racer: Measurements: 38.25in x 7.75in in size, 15.7lbs in weight

Classic: Measurements: 28.5in x 7.5in in size, 8.7lbs in weight  
How does the Handheld Bluetooth Remote work?

Huger Bluetooth Remotes are easily re-pairable within seconds. This means you can use any of our bluetooth remotes for any of our boards, at any time.
How does the Quick Swap Battery work? Our Huger Quick Swap Battery system takes less than 60 seconds to get you back on the road riding. Power down the Huger electric skateboard first, remove the thumb screw to remove the battery door, disconnect the existing battery and swap it out with the charged battery. Place the door back on and lock down with thumb screw. You're ready to get rolling again! Travel & Racer board batteries are interchangeable between the two boards. *For Travel & Racer boards only.
What is the hardness rating of the wheels? Huger wheels are rated 86A Durometer.
Which option is best for me? The most popular board is the Travel Board. For all you longboarders out there, you'll love the Racer Board. If you feel the need to do an ollie, the Classic Board is for you.

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology?

Huger electric skateboards are faster, far more affordable, and much more powerful than competitor models. It includes the best of everything in an electric skateboard--in three great models. Huger quick swap batteries also get you back on the road in under 60 seconds. Industry-leading torque control. IPX6 Waterproof Motors. Durable materials. Powerful hub motors. Designed with safety in mind.
How far can I go before recharging the battery? How to charge?

Travel: 22-mile range; Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

Racer: 20-mile range; Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

Classic: 8.5-mile range; Battery recharges in 1-1.5 hours

Huger electric skateboards come with a charger and detachable cord. 
What are the dimensions and weight?

Travel: Measurements: 31.5in x 7.8in in size, 14.6lbs in weight  

Racer: Measurements: 38.25in x 7.75in in size, 15.7lbs in weight

Classic: Measurements: 28.5in x 7.5in in size, 8.7lbs in weight  
How does it work? Huger's hub motor(s) are controlled by a handheld bluetooth remote control.
What kind of sensors are you using?  Gyroscope sensors control Huger's lights. Sensors in the hub motors that is programmed through complex software.
Will there be updates to it in the future? Over-the-air (OTA) updates will be continual to improve the product. 
What kind of braking system do Huger boards have?  Huger electric skateboards feature hub motors with regenerative braking. This helps to conserve battery life and gives you a bit more distance when riding. Also, while traveling downhill and braking, you'll get some energy back into the battery.
Is it waterproof? Huger's IPX6 waterproof rating enable riders to stay safe, even in less-than-ideal riding conditions. Huger encourages all riders to always wear a helmet.
Where is it manufactured? Manufacturing: Shenzhen, China. R&D, refinement, testing: USA.

 

Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with? The Huger App is available on Android & iOS.
When will the app be available? October 2017. 
Can we also access app functions on a web browser?  The app is only available on Android & iOS. 
How does the device connect to the app? Bluetooth. 
What can we expect from the app?
  • Get going fast - Board & remote paired at factory.
  • Add multiple boards to the app database.
  • Adjust torque (industry-leading capability).
  • View stats - Range Speed, odometer.
  • Use GPS Navigation (Travel only).
  • Customize undercarriage lights (Travel only).
Will there be updates available through the app? Yes, over-the-air updates will keep the Huger App up-to-date.

 

How do I set it up? Turn on your board, turn on remote, and go! Board can pair with smart device, with bluetooth enabled.
How do I turn it on and off? Use the power button on both the electric skateboard and remote.
How do I control it? The handheld bluetooth remote control.
What is the care and cleaning of it? Board doesn't require much cleaning. Remote can be cleaned with cloth towel and mild soap & water.
Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable? No. 
Does it have an expiry date? No. 

 

What are the recommend ages? Huger electric skateboards are for 16+ is the minimum age. Young adults or older. 
Where can I use it? Ride Huger outdooors, along streets, sidewalks, or smooth flat roads. 
Is it safe? Yes, but Huger boards require safety attention and learning to control. Huger encourages all riders to wear a helmet at all times.
What certifications do you have? US: UL 2272, FCC EU: CE Common: ROHS
How durable is it? Huger boards are made with Canadian Maple Wood and are IPX6 waterproof-rated for the motors. Metal battery case.

 

When does shipping begin? October 2017.
When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps? October 2017.
Where does it ship? Worldwide. 
How much is shipping? Free US shipping. $99 worldwide. 
I'm interested in a distribution partnership. Fantastic! Please reach out at support@hugertech.com.
Do I have to pay VAT / GST? VAT & GST are not included in purchase price. 

 

Is there a warranty? Yes, 6 months for parts and labor. 
What is your refund policy? Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped. 
What is your return / exchange policy? If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.
How do I choose more than one reward?  To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.
How can I check the status of my pre-order? By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.
I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester.  Please contact us at: info@hugertech.com
Why do I have to wait longer than usual?

This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build Huger, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.
If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Press: info@hugertech.com
Investment Inquiries: sales@hugertech.com
Support: support@hugertech.com

Alternatively, for any additional Customer Service needs, please contact support@hugertech.com or call 714-646-9483 (available 9AM to 6PM M-F PST).
story_txt:
GOAL UPDATEQUICK-SWAP WHEELS are UNLOCKED! See the perks listed for wheels to pre-order for CLASSIC, TRAVEL, and RACER.PRODUCTION UPDATEHuger is in production - we can’t wait to get these boards into your hands! Orders are on track to start shipping October 2017.  Huger's electric skateboards have great range and grade capabilities, AND are affordable. Everything you want in one incredible board.    "With impressive specs like a 22 mile range and navigation capabilities, the [Huger] Travel board just may be a board like no other."- Johnathan Lonso, Tech on a Budget   
“It’s fast. These hills are big. If they can handle these hills, they can handle anything. It’s too easy.”
 
 - Dylan Kowalski

 “This is the board you’re looking for!…It doesn’t feel cheap, and it’s definitely not a toy. Even if your battery dies, you can use it as a traditional skateboard. Practically weightless compared to other e-skateboards that can weigh up to 30lbs."
- Johnathan Lonso, Tech on a Budget 
  Huger’s innovations in adjustable acceleration are an industry first. Choose from 0-100% in the Huger app for a tailored riding experience. Huger’s ergonomic bluetooth-enabled remote control puts power in the palm of your hand. With the Huger Travel Board, ride in style with 7 customizable undercarriage lights. Navigate traffic safely with ease with Huger front and rear LED lights, brake lights, and turn signals. Using high-quality, industry-grade materials, Huger electric skateboards are built to last and keep you safe. UL certification pending. Our Huger Quick Swap Battery system takes less than 60 seconds to get you back on the road riding. For the Travel & Racer only.   
The Travel Board goes up to 22 miles on a single charge. 
The Racer Board hits speeds up to 25 mph. 
The Classic Board is under 9 pounds. 
 Quality. Safety. Durability. Huger electric skateboard motors are IPX6 waterproof rated so you can ride with confidence. Tackle tough climbs with Huger's impressive grade capabilities. Huger’s ergonomic bluetooth-enabled remote control gives you the power at your fingertips.     The free iOS and Android app lets you easily set up and manage your experience. With 3 easy steps, the product is simple to set up and intuitive to use. What you get with your pre-order.  Our mighty small device packs a big punch. This striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home.    Our designs have been tested and proven. We've been perfecting the technology to get it ready to bring home. Orders are on track to start shipping October 2017.  Here's a sneak peek at what 12 layers of Canada's best Maple Wood look like as our CNC (Computer Numerical Control) Machining process guides your deck from lathe to mill, routers and grinder.  Ever wonder how hub motors are made? Check out Huger's here!  Huger Tech is a startup based in Southern California that provides world class technology to power smart electric mobility products that are efficient, durable and affordable.  We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward details for the shipping cost that applies to you. We plan to ship the product in October 2017*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date. International shipping may take an additional 7-10 days to ship.  By backing now, you’ll get your hands on the very first Huger electric skateboards at low prices only available to backers on Indiegogo. 

What is it?
Huger Tech offers the most innovative, powerful, and affordable electric skateboard models available on the market.


Who created it?
Huger Tech, a startup based in Southern California, providing world class technology to power smart electric mobility products that are efficient, durable, and affordable.


Why should we use it?

Cut traffic and get to work *that* much easier. Pure joy, adrenaline, and enjoyment.
Travel faster, ride farther, and spend less money than with anything else on the market!



Where can we buy it?
Right here, right now on Indiegogo.


What do we get when we order?
Electric Skateboard of Your Choice, Bluetooth Remote Control, Removable Wrist Strap, Charger with Detachable Cord, T-Tool, Micro USB Cable, User's Manual, Advanced User Bushings (Travel & Racer only).


Why are you crowdfunding?
To offer our earliest supporters the best prices possible. We're excited to bring Huger's technology to Indiegogo and beyond!

 

What features are available?

Travel: Cutting-edge tech and efficiency in one durable board with industry-leading range. The all-around solution for the modern commuter who needs some speed.

Dual hub motors with an IPX6 waterproof rating
Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning, top deck LED lights for GPS navigation and under carriage lights available in 7 colors
22-mile range on up to a 20% incline with top speeds reaching 20 mph
Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

Racer: Fast and unbelievably powerful. For the thrill-seeker who can appreciate style.

Dual hub motors and an IPX6 waterproof rating
Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning
20-mile range on up to a 25% incline with top speeds reaching 25 mph
Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools

Classic: An iconic look with a modern upgrade. For the traditionalist who enjoys a boost.

Single hub motor and an IPX6 waterproof rating
Minimal resistance from motor, allowing riders to push the board like a normal skateboard
Front and rear LED lights to signal braking and turning
8.5-mile range with top speeds reaching 15 mph
Battery recharges in 1-1.5 hours




What sizes do you offer?

Travel: Measurements: 31.5in x 7.8in in size, 14.6lbs in weight  
Racer: Measurements: 38.25in x 7.75in in size, 15.7lbs in weight
Classic: Measurements: 28.5in x 7.5in in size, 8.7lbs in weight  



How does the Handheld Bluetooth Remote work?
Huger Bluetooth Remotes are easily re-pairable within seconds. This means you can use any of our bluetooth remotes for any of our boards, at any time.


How does the Quick Swap Battery work?
Our Huger Quick Swap Battery system takes less than 60 seconds to get you back on the road riding. Power down the Huger electric skateboard first, remove the thumb screw to remove the battery door, disconnect the existing battery and swap it out with the charged battery. Place the door back on and lock down with thumb screw. You're ready to get rolling again! Travel & Racer board batteries are interchangeable between the two boards. *For Travel & Racer boards only.


What is the hardness rating of the wheels?
Huger wheels are rated 86A Durometer.


Which option is best for me?
The most popular board is the Travel Board. For all you longboarders out there, you'll love the Racer Board. If you feel the need to do an ollie, the Classic Board is for you.

 

What is the uniqueness of the technology?
Huger electric skateboards are faster, far more affordable, and much more powerful than competitor models. It includes the best of everything in an electric skateboard--in three great models. Huger quick swap batteries also get you back on the road in under 60 seconds. Industry-leading torque control. IPX6 Waterproof Motors. Durable materials. Powerful hub motors. Designed with safety in mind.


How far can I go before recharging the battery? How to charge?

Travel: 22-mile range; Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools
Racer: 20-mile range; Removable battery that recharges in 2-2.5 hours and can be easily swapped out without any tools
Classic: 8.5-mile range; Battery recharges in 1-1.5 hours
Huger electric skateboards come with a charger and detachable cord. 



What are the dimensions and weight?

Travel: Measurements: 31.5in x 7.8in in size, 14.6lbs in weight  
Racer: Measurements: 38.25in x 7.75in in size, 15.7lbs in weight
Classic: Measurements: 28.5in x 7.5in in size, 8.7lbs in weight  



How does it work?
Huger's hub motor(s) are controlled by a handheld bluetooth remote control.


What kind of sensors are you using? 
Gyroscope sensors control Huger's lights. Sensors in the hub motors that is programmed through complex software.


Will there be updates to it in the future?
Over-the-air (OTA) updates will be continual to improve the product. 


What kind of braking system do Huger boards have? 
Huger electric skateboards feature hub motors with regenerative braking. This helps to conserve battery life and gives you a bit more distance when riding. Also, while traveling downhill and braking, you'll get some energy back into the battery.


Is it waterproof?
Huger's IPX6 waterproof rating enable riders to stay safe, even in less-than-ideal riding conditions. Huger encourages all riders to always wear a helmet.


Where is it manufactured?
Manufacturing: Shenzhen, China. R&D, refinement, testing: USA.

 

Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with?
The Huger App is available on Android & iOS.


When will the app be available?
October 2017. 


Can we also access app functions on a web browser? 
The app is only available on Android & iOS. 


How does the device connect to the app?
Bluetooth. 


What can we expect from the app?

Get going fast - Board & remote paired at factory.
Add multiple boards to the app database.
Adjust torque (industry-leading capability).
View stats - Range Speed, odometer.
Use GPS Navigation (Travel only).
Customize undercarriage lights (Travel only).



Will there be updates available through the app?
Yes, over-the-air updates will keep the Huger App up-to-date.

 

How do I set it up?
Turn on your board, turn on remote, and go! Board can pair with smart device, with bluetooth enabled.


How do I turn it on and off?
Use the power button on both the electric skateboard and remote.


How do I control it?
The handheld bluetooth remote control.


What is the care and cleaning of it?
Board doesn't require much cleaning. Remote can be cleaned with cloth towel and mild soap & water.


Is it dishwasher safe / machine washable?
No. 


Does it have an expiry date?
No. 

 

What are the recommend ages?
Huger electric skateboards are for 16+ is the minimum age. Young adults or older. 


Where can I use it?
Ride Huger outdooors, along streets, sidewalks, or smooth flat roads. 


Is it safe?
Yes, but Huger boards require safety attention and learning to control. Huger encourages all riders to wear a helmet at all times.


What certifications do you have?
US: UL 2272, FCC EU: CE Common: ROHS


How durable is it?
Huger boards are made with Canadian Maple Wood and are IPX6 waterproof-rated for the motors. Metal battery case.

 

When does shipping begin?
October 2017.


When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
October 2017.


Where does it ship?
Worldwide. 


How much is shipping?
Free US shipping. $99 worldwide. 


I'm interested in a distribution partnership.
Fantastic! Please reach out at support@hugertech.com.


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
VAT & GST are not included in purchase price. 

 

Is there a warranty?
Yes, 6 months for parts and labor. 


What is your refund policy?
Refunds are processed on a case-by-case basis; at some point we will need to lock refunds in order to go into production & shipment. We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped. 


What is your return / exchange policy?
If you received your product and you aren't satisfied, you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, less shipping & handling fees.


How do I choose more than one reward? 
To get more than one perk, please make a new contribution for each perk.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information.


I'm interested in becoming a Beta Tester. 
Please contact us at: info@hugertech.com


Why do I have to wait longer than usual?
This is not just pre-orders: You're helping to build Huger, and we need to know how many to make before we can start production. This is the first of its kind, and you'll be glad you waited. We will send you updates while we work to produce the first batch.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Press: info@hugertech.comInvestment Inquiries: sales@hugertech.comSupport: support@hugertech.com
Alternatively, for any additional Customer Service needs, please contact support@hugertech.com or call 714-646-9483 (available 9AM to 6PM M-F PST).

story:
Mi nombre es Alan Schwarz López, tengo 22 años de edad. Tuve el gran privilegio de estudiar en Austria durante 6 años.

Aprendí mucho viajando, viendo la infraestructura implementada en varios lugares del mundo. Una aplicación para transporte público es normal en muchas ciudades, y en otras casi imposible. Sin embargo, Chepex.com tiene como objetivo ser la aplicación para Costa Rica. De este modo, tanto ticos como turistas podrán viajar en bus de una forma más segura, eficiente y cómoda. 

Esta campaña es, sin duda, la oportunidad para los costarricenses de tomar el destino de su país en sus propias manos.

Con una donación de cualquier monto, ya están contribuyendo a una de las campañas más grandes y transparentes de Costa Rica.

 

Chepex.com es independiente. Lo cual nos permite ser transparentes. En Chepex.com sólo queremos ver nuestro país progresar, para así beneficiarnos todos y no sólo algunos pocos. 

 

 

Que haremos con $50,000?

  • construir los 50 chepitos
  • instalarlos en 50 unidades de bus
  • gastos de programación, así como servidores y bancos de datos

El proyecto Chepex.com es más que sólo la evolución del transporte publico.

Nuestra filosofía es: mejorar la calidad de vida para los ciudadanos de Costa Rica - jóvenes, adultos mayores, familias,.. - nadie va a estar excluido de esta evolución! Nosotros estamos dando todo para hacer lo mejor que se pueda en este país, tanto con la mente como con nuestro corazón!

 

Porqué estamos recaudando fondos?

Somos jóvenes emprendedores, tenemos una idea real y el momento es ahora!

Costa Rica necesita mejorar la calidad del transporte público y la gente de Costa Rica puede hacer un cambio! Nosotros no tenemos la posibilidad de financiar los Chepitos ahora con nuestros fondos, pero si todos juntos contribuimos, si nos unificamos, podemos lograr el cambio necesario para modificar el presente y el futuro de Costa Rica. Con tu donación estas aportando más que sólo dinero: estas probando que cada persona en este mundo tiene el poder para crear la vida harmónica que todos buscamos y queremos. 

Done dinero hoy y mañana habrá un mejor futuro para Costa Rica. Chepex es sólo el comienzo!

Chepex.com ya esta en crecimiento, personas están donando, el video sigue compartiéndose, nuestra página de Facebook tiene mas likes cada día y así esperamos que siga así!

 

  • Todo tiene un riesgo de que no se dé. Nosotros hacemos lo que podemos y más, para alcanzar estos 50.000 dólares, y eso es lo que importa! Estamos llenos de esperanza,  energía y comprometidos con la gente de este país :)
  • En caso de que no se alcance la meta, invertiremos en la cantidad de prototipos que alcancen para obtener resultados!
  • Si no alcanza ni un solo Chepito, lo donaremos todo a la Fundación Casa de los Niños.

Les pedimos que compartan esta campaña en sus redes sociales, amigos y de esta forma aceleramos esta campaña!

Para más información visiten nuestra página web: www.chepex.com

story:
A Thousand Mile Bike Ride for the Right to Play

                                           'A 1,000 miles for a 1,000 dollars' 

On the 24th July I will be starting my attempt to bike a thousand miles spanning the UK, from the furthest southern point in England- Lands End to the furthest northern point-John O' Groats in Scotland.   Check out my proposed route here.

I am doing this to try and give children in Uganda the Right to Play!

I volunteered in Uganda in 2011 where I helped to build a solar powered school.  The kids we worked with and got to know were just awesome, but their days seemed to change little between back breaking labor, collecting water, tilling the land, and well... not much else!

I helped organise a football (soccer)  tournament when I was over there and they just loved it! It was great that they got a chance to be kids and have fun, what all children have a right to do. With your help I now want to take it to the next level.

Here is the plan:

  • Flatten out a section of land at the solar powered school for the children to play on.

  • Install goal posts.

  • Set up a Ball Bank- A crate of footballing equipment (balls, cones, bibs and whistles) which the school can use and also sign out to local schools. 

What We Need and What You Get

To accomplish all of this, we need about $1,000 (approx. £580).

The money will be used for:

  • Labor- The land sits on the side of Mt. Elgon in Uganda, so it is going to be a lot of work to flatten out the land.

  • Goal posts
  • The 'Ball Bank' crate- Balls, bibs, cones, pumps, whistles.

We have some great perks as well, including:
  • A shout out from the kids in Uganda! (A thank-you photograph)

  • Arts and crafts from Uganda 

Other Ways You Can Help
  • Please help us spread the word by sharing this link with your friends and family

  • You could even volunteer in Uganda with Meaningful Volunteer

               Thanks for taking the time to read this, spread the word!!

story:
www.skybean.eu

The campaign is over but our work continues. Visit our new website!

            


We are group of young engineers who are keen on paragliding. As active members of paragliding community we got familiar with beauties and pleasures but also many needs and expenses of this breath-taking hobby. We created the most affordable and beautiful vario in the world – this is how we want to help every pilot out there in the skies. With high-quality, robustness and reliability it still won’t burn a hole in pilot`s pocket.



SkyBean real flight test -  sink/lift alarm. 

  • handy, lightweight and wallet-friendly
  • high precision digital barometer with 10 cm resolution
  • long life - 150 hours on a single button cell battery (CR2032)
  • configurable audio volume
  • configurable sink/lift alarm threshold
  • battery included, actually two of them

       

Set your lift and sink alarm threshold on the device. Would you like to set your own audio profile used in low cost varios? Create, modify and finally vote for the best audio profile for the basic model. More advanced pilots can create their own audio profile.



Our first prototype was based on bare test-board. We tested different pressure sensors and used them with prototype platform to prove the concept. From this point we started to develop microprocessor software. Development later considered critical tasks of noise reduction continued by improvement of power-management. Since SkyBean is very light and small, we had to figure out the way how to power it. Now a small battery provides enough juice for over 150 hours of flying. Design - we knew how important is the design. Even more important was to build a useful device with hard case and small enough to fit in pocket or helmet.

Right now the latest prototypes are tested in the air. Our test-pilots check the functionality, reliability and improve the audio profiles to fit everybody. Software team has reached the final phase.


We will soon work on packaging design for shipping. If we succeed in our first goal, new molding form will be prepared. This is where we need your help.


 



Martin Daricek, CTO
Years and years of experience and hundreds of developed electronic devices. University lecturer in the field of industrial electronics. Work hard, fly high!

Fero Horinek, Software development
Software designer with tons of code written in almost any language. As a leader of our software team there in no challenge unbeatable. Linux forever!
Martin Donoval, CEO
Paperwork, discussions, team management. There is though still time to get back to technical science and research to keep up with the pace and the hi-tech stream.
Lubo Sladek, Mechanical engineer
This guy copes with any problem from casing to smallest mechanical problems with integrated circuits. We would hardly find someone with more precise feeling. He sees inaccuracies and defects where other would hardly measure them.
Lydia Kotrikova, Creative officer
Team flower - managing the support work around us. Communication, PR, distribution, supplies, news and nice photo-work. This girl brings untechnical view in many problems and helps us to think globally.

Patrik Ontkovic, Graphic designer
Graphics, graphics, graphics. These do not grow on trees but result from hard work of this guy. Shake before use!

In near future we will keep on development of the next devices. If we succeed in this campaign, we will get the chance to design new devices with connection to smart-phones or flight computers (XCSoar/LK8000). By adding display the pilots would be able to check the stats right on the screen. With display and Bluetooth connection the vario will provide interesting data in many other fun-activities like hiking, biking, skiing and more at price affordable for anybody. You will get the chance to know your performance and calories burned.

I am not a pilot, what is vario and what is SkyBean?

Variometer is a device used in aircraft as a vertical speed indicator. It is every pilot`s basic equipment. It informs an aviator about the rate of climb and descent in meters per second usually during unpowered flight. Due to sensitive and accurate measurement SkyBean allows to locate the lift. 

What are the shipping costs?

Shipping is free worldwide.

I already have vario, how can I help you? 

The community of pilots is rather small. Although there are many Indiegogo fans, the Bean will not be useful for everybody. Help us to spread SkyBean to your flying community. Be a tester and find out what is missing. We will listen to your ideas and improve the Bean as much as we can. Besides this, SkyBean will always serve very well as a back-up vario, always packed in your harness. 

How can I make my own sound-profile?

With My Bean perk, you can prepare your own sound-profile, if you do not like the default setting. Check it out here and decide. Once you set-up your own audio profile, we will upload it to your Bean and send it to you.

When can I choose label and casing style?

After the campaign finishes we will send you application where you will choose your style of the Bean.

Can I use SkyBean when I am not a pilot?

SkyBean is a vario - a device mostly oriented for aviation. It is focused mostly on paragliding as an affordable compact or back-up vario. 

Where can I fit the SkyBean?

Bean is designed to be as small as possible, so it fits almost anywhere. You can attach it to your harness, backpack, keep it in your pocket, connect to your helmet, keep it simply anywhere. Don’t forget about the BeanClip.

Is SkyBean loud enough hear it in the air? 

 Bean is small but still loud, so you will hear it clearly. There are 4 levels of loudness you can choose. Make your Bean sound loud on your neck but gentle on the helmet. 

What is the battery life time?

During regular use the battery life reaches over 150 hours of flying. Have we mentioned the Bean will be sent to you with two batteries?

How do I replace the battery? 

 To keep Bean unbreakable we chose tight connection of aluminium and plastic part by screw. Use small phillips screwdriver to open it. Afterwards it is very easy. 

Can I connect SkyBean to my smart-phone?

Actually not in this stage of development. SkyBean is designed to provide high accuracy, compactness and long battery life at very low price.

When do I get my SkyBean? 

After the campaign finishes, we will manufacture and immediately ship the early-birds selection. This will happen in June 2014. Right after on we will work on assembling of your orders and ship it in August 2014. 

Can SkyBean get broken?

Due to very hard casing and precise design the Bean will break only hardly. Connection of two solid materials - plastic and aluminium provides high compactness.

The campaign is over but our work continues. Visit our new website!            We are group of young engineers who are keen on
paragliding. As active members of paragliding community we got familiar with beauties and pleasures but also many needs and expenses of this breath-taking hobby. We created
the most affordable and beautiful vario in the world – this is
how we want to help every pilot out there in the skies. With high-quality, robustness and reliability
it still won’t burn a hole in pilot`s pocket.SkyBean real flight test -  sink/lift alarm. 
handy, lightweight and wallet-friendly
high precision digital barometer with 10 cm resolution
long life - 150 hours on a single button cell battery (CR2032)
configurable audio volume
configurable sink/lift alarm threshold
battery included, actually two of them
       

Set your lift and sink alarm threshold on the device. Would you like to set your own audio profile used in low cost
varios? Create, modify and finally vote for the best audio profile
for the basic model. More advanced pilots can create their own audio profile.

story:
The most advanced thermal imaging sensor for motorsports

TireX is a thermal imaging sensor that visualizes how your tires are working, in real time.  Use it to tune your suspension for maximum grip and balance.

Next-generation technology

TireX uses the most advanced sensor technology in its class. Not only does it have superior accuracy and thermal compensation than current sensors, it's thermal array design allows applications beyond measuring tire temperatures. There's no sensor like TireX at any price!

Better grip, faster lap times, win races

TireX will show you how evenly your tires are working, helping you identify where to make changes to your suspension.  Maximize your tire's grip to get faster lap times and win races.

* See the FAQ for additional resource on interpreting tire temperatures!

 

Wide field of view works with your tight fenders and wide tires

110 degree field of view (FOV) simultaneously reads multiple zones across your tire.

See the FAQ for a guide on how far to mount TireX away from your tire!
 

Up to 16 temperature zones supported

You can select 1, 2, 4, 8, or 16 temperature zones per tire, enabling fine resolution when you need it - up to 64 channels of data with 16 zones and 4 corners!

Actual real-time 16 channel thermal data (cup of hot water for demonstration)

Assign each sensor to a vehicle corner

Each TireX sensor can be assigned to a corner of the vehicle, reporting each sensor's position with zones properly reporting inside edge to outside, regardless of left or right location on the vehicle.

Rugged and compact

TireX was carefully designed to keep a low profile mounting in mind, and specifically for mounting above the front tires to minimize steering-induced reading errors.

High quality connectors

TireX comes with a rugged and compact industrial M8 connector for integrating with your wiring harness. 

You only need 4 wires if you're doing your own wiring: 12v power, ground and two CAN bus connections.

However, you can choose our ready-made four-corner plug and play harness, saving hours of wiring time:

 

RaceCapture owners

Choose both the plug and play harness and the Powered CAN hub + RaceCapture integration cable add-on-perk to make a 100% plug and play solution - no custom wiring!

Compatible with Podium real time telemetry

Easily analyze tire temperatures right from the pits and figure out what you need to tune before the car even comes into the pits! Three unique data visualizations are offered for TireX - optimized equally well for real-time data as well as after-session review. Learn more about Podium

To play with this data directly, find the 'Tire Temperature simulation' event at Sonoma Raceway on the Podium app!

Compatible with most popular data systems

Simple CAN bus protocol makes integration easy with virtually any modern data system supporting CAN bus, such as AiM, MoTeC, AEM and more, with presets available for download.

See the finalized CAN bus protocol for the complete documentation.

Advanced thermal imaging mode

The capabilities of TireX go beyond measuring tire temperatures: The 16 x 12 thermal imaging sensor generates 192 channels of data that you can use to monitor hot spots on your race car in real time, while on track.  You can use it with Podium real time telemetry, or with any analysis package capable of visualizing this advanced data!

Inspirational simulated example :)

 

Actual thermal image real-time telemetry with Podium

Next generation technology

Not only does TireX support advanced thermal imaging capabilities, its latest generation sensor technology offers approximately 2x better noise performance and improved thermal compensation vs. other sensors in its class.

Want to compare existing first generation sensors? Those are the devices that specify 120, 60, or 40 degree field of view (FOV).

Plug and play harness option

Save hours on installation time! The optional plug and play harness makes it incredibly easy to wire and minimizes errors - just plug the sensors into the harness, then run the loop around your vehicle, locating a sensor at each corner.  

After routing, it's just two wires for data, and two wires for 12v and Ground!

CAN bus protocol - ready to go!

TireX's CAN bus protocol is finalized and ready to be integrated with your system. See the protocol information on our wiki,

Fully customizable

All of TireX's settings can be customized via software (CAN bus) command, and these settings are saved in non-volatile flash memory so they are retained across power cycles.

Complete specifications

Feature Description
Sensor type Thermal array
Sensor Resolution 16 x 12 (192 pixels)
Object temperature range 0 - 127.5C (tire temperature mode) / 0 - 255C (full frame mode)
Field of view 110 x 75 degrees (55 x 35 upon special request)
Accuracy 1C
Temperature zones (tire) 1 / 2 / 4 / 8 / 16
Sample rate 0.5 - 64Hz (Tire temperature mode) 0.5 - 10Hz (Full frame mode)
Processing Engine 32 bit
Configurable positions 4 (Left-Front, Right-Front, Left-Rear, Right-Rear); Reversible orientation
Emissivity Configurable (0.95 default)
Ambient temperature compensation Automatic (adjustable offset)
Electrical  
Interface CAN 2.0
Supply voltage 6 - 12v
Power 200mW
Harness M8 4P Male, 250mm length
CAN bus  
CAN baud rate 500K and 1M, jumper and software configurable (500K default)
Address space 4 separate address spaces (configurable via jumper)
Termination No Termination (configurable via jumper)
Physical / Environmental  
Construction CNC aluminum
Dimensions 64 x 46 x 12.5mm
Weight 10 grams
Operating temperature -40 - 85C
IP rating IP65

View the extended specifications and installation guide in our wiki.

Status / Risks and Challenges

We've poured almost a year of R&D into TireX - and it's virtually production ready.

Here's where we're at:

  • Mechanical design: complete
  • Environmental testing: complete
  • Electronics: complete
  • Firmware: complete
  • CAN protocol: complete
  • Plug and Play harness: complete
  • Software visualization : complete
  • Select manufacturing partners: complete
  • Final Testing: Ongoing
  • Production Test Fixture: In development

Note on production and supply chain

The awesome thermal imaging sensor at the heart of TireX is driving the project timeline. We need to place a large quantity order of this sensor for two reasons:

  • To offer you the best possible price
  • To expedite the delivery time of the these sensors. Why? The sensor manufacturer is currently prioritizing single-pixel sensors to fill the demand of digital thermometers due to COVID-19. Placing a volume order of sensors will help prioritize time on their manufacturing line and shorten delivery time.

About Autosport Labs

Founded by Brent Picasso and Kelley Picasso in 2008, Autosport Labs specializes in motorsports data and telemetry -- creating products that perfectly balance power, beauty and ease of use.   Our real power comes from our amazing and vibrant community, with our customers helping each other with tips, ideas, and finding new ways of using Autosport Labs technology.

We're highly experienced in bringing new products to market, having successfully completed two crowdfunding campaigns for RaceCapture, and several additional pre-order based product launches since then.

Learn more about Autosport Labs
