story:
The campaign is now closed! If you want to order the product please head to: unlimitedev.com

 

 

EU & USA STREET LEGAL

EU 250 W & 25 km/h

USA 750 W & 22 mph

 

Why pay thousands more for a new bike?

Use the bike you already own to make the perfect eBike!

 

 

The Unlimited eBike Kit is designed and assembled in Barcelona, Spain. This is our second generation product and we are already in production. If you contribute to our campaign, you will get your perk, guaranteed. 

 

REALLY EASY SETUP!

Full installation video: https://youtu.be/drpxKGxenoM

 

Unlimited in the news:

​

 

 

It's never been this easy to make ANY bike electric. Wireless pedal (PAS) sensor means it fits on any bike without complicated wiring.

 

Forget 36V or even 48V. Our proprietary, fully-integrated, HIGH-VOLTAGE 52V battery is hyper efficient and allows us to pack the most mileage and power into the lightest package. No other eBike comes even close!

 

We monitor every parameter so you get the most torque and reliability.

 

Turns ON & OFF automatically, a multicolor LED button, our APP dashboard and optional (standard on XR+) display show all the stats like speed, distance and battery.

 

Integrated WiFi means the system is constantly monitored while charging and updated to the latest and greatest. It will also notify you when the charge is ready to go!

 

Does not need to live in a garage, made tough for the rigors of commuting.

 

A dedicated EU & US based customer support team to help you and guide you through any questions. Shoot us an email at ig@unlimitedev.com


 

1.- Choose your Kit

**Range and Power vary depending on weight, terrain, riding style and local regulations.

Everything you need in the box.

 

2.- Get your Add-ons!

Keep your battery and speed in check with the stealth screen!

Rocket yourself uphill by simply pushing the throttle with your thumb!

There are extra goodies for every case & taste! Grab yours!

 

Am I getting a good deal? ABSOLUTELY!

To get a bike with similar specs and technology would cost you thousands! Use the bike you already have and make it a high-end eBike for a fraction of the price!

 

 

 

Does it fit my bike? YES!

Check out our Does it fit my bike? page for detailed specifications.

Check the 3 items below just to make sure:

OPEN DROPOUTS. Your front forks or frame (rear motor) need to accept the standard axle with open dropout (where the wheel is attached). Wheel axles come in quick-release (most common) or bolt-on (fixie, bmx, Brompton, cruisers, older bikes).

Dropout width: the distance between the inner faces of the fork must be 74 mm or 100 mm. Please make sure our motors will work with your bike.

 

REAR MOTOR (OPTIONAL): If you are interested in a rear motor, frame and drivetrain requirements are as follows.

- Dropout: 135 mm open width (not compatible with Brompton/folding or "Track/Fixie" bikes)

- Drivetrain: cassette (Shimano HG spline - usually 7-12 gears) or threaded freewheel (usually <7 gears or single speed).

 

WHEEL SIZE. We build the motor wheel to any of the below wheel sizes 16” to 29", great for city, trekking, mtb, gravel or road bikes. We will send you a survey (and help you figure it out) after the campaign is done. 

 

BRAKES. Disc or rim compatible. So no issues here!

 

Check out our Does it fit my bike? page if you still  have questions.

 

 

Delivery timeline

Since we are leveraging our technology base and well-established supply chain, we are certain we can stick to this timeline.

 

Proven Team and Technology

Born in Barcelona in 2016 out of a group of good friends, the Unlimited team is dedicated to transforming the future urban mobility. With really strong technical backgrounds (including a PhD in engineering, 3 masters in engineering, and an MBA from MIT), the Unlimited crew teamed up to build cutting-edge electric vehicles. 

 

We initially launched an electric skateboard conversion kit via crowdfunding in 2016 that quickly sold out, has been completely fulfilled and gets rave reviews.

 

eSkate is considered the most demanding electric vehicle application in regards to vibration, impact resistance, power and energy density. Since 2018, Unlimited partnered with Loaded Boards (unlimitedxloaded.com) to offer top rated electric skateboard conversion kits and complete boards.

“We couldn't have picked a more passionate, dedicated and capable team to partner with. Since day one it's been a pleasure to work with them and we look forward to a bright future together” Don Tashman - CEO @ Loaded

 

We learned a lot from our first crowdfunding, and we’re incredibly thankful for the backers who believed in our vision. Our backers where with us the whole way as we learned how to manufacture and deliver our new technology, and we couldn’t have done it without their encouragement and support.

Now we decided to get much further along in the design and manufacturing process before launching. With the Unlimited Electric Skateboard, we hadn’t even met our manufacturer when we launched. This time we’ve been working with them for four years straight, and they’ve been a part of our new powertrain design since day one.

 

We are already into the tooling phase for the product, which means we are testing the initial mechanical parts straight from the factory. We’ve tested multiple electrical designs, optimizing for international certifications and long-term quality. And our firmware and software development is well underway, which means the prototypes you see in the videos are actually working! In short, we’re in the final stages of manufacturing and delivering the Unlimited eBike, and it’s going great.

Of course, with any new product and the current global situation there are factors that we cannot foresee. For your peace of mind, this is not our first product and we have years of experience with a well established global supply chain. We’re inviting you into the process with us, so you’ll get to see how it all works. We’ll be posting lots of updates during the final phases of development and manufacturing, and we’re excited to share the journey with you.

  

Duties, VAT and Taxes. 

We are doing everything possible in order to reduce costs to our backers and streamline delivery. As such, the perks do not include Duties, VAT/GST or Taxes as these depend on many factors. Duties/VAT/GST are to be paid before we can deliver your Unlimited eBike kit or WARP eBike. We will send payment links, invoice overview and ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship. 

In the EU, VAT is 21%

In the US, Duty is 5% and Sales Tax depends on each state.

 

 

Latest Articles:

               

  

 

 

CUSTOMER TESTIMONIALS

 

PR LINKS

https://electrek.co/2020/05/27/unlimited-e-bike-kit-diy-ebike-conversion-simple/

https://www.netzwelt.de/news/178729-fahrrad-e-bike-unlimited-ebike-kit-verspricht-umbau-binnen-minuten.html

http://www.cnet.com/news/skateboard-electric-unlimited-x-loaded-conversion-kit/

https://electrek.co/2019/07/09/unlimited-loaded-new-electric-skateboard-kit/

https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinion/why-you-should-back-the-eon-a-powertrain-that-makes-any-skateboard-electric-2936978

https://newatlas.com/eon-electric-skate-drive/44466/

https://uncrate.com/unlimited-x-loaded-electric-skateboard-conversion-kits/

 

FAQ

Is this a donation or will I actually get a kit/bike

All crowdfunding projects have a certain associated risk. There are all kinds of projects, companies and people uploading stuff everyday. When you are checking out a crowdfunding project, it's a great idea to do some due diligence so you can judge how trustworthy the campaigners are.

This is Unlimited’s second crowdfunding project. We learned a TON from our last campaign, which we fully delivered with a product that was significantly better than we initially offered, in every way. It took time and it was incredibly hard, for us, our families and for our dear backers. Thanks to that experience, we are now able to offer a super good product that leverages all the technology we developed, but also do better in terms of pricing, where we sell, timeline and overall execution of the project.

At Unlimited, we are 1000% committed to delivering to our backers. We are a Techstars-backed company! Fully running since 2016 and we have been delivering top-of-the-line products and supporting our customers and backers every single day for 3 years now. Late in 2018 we partnered with the best longboard brand in the world: Loaded Boards. We’ve been working on this eBike product for more than a year (4 if you consider that the tech was developed in the skateboard!) and we now partnered with Detroit Bikes, one of the largest manufacturers of bicycles in the US! They have the experience and track record of making great bikes.

We are here for the long run and we will take any necessary steps to deliver!

Does it fit my bike?

The Unlimited eBike Kit really is compatible with almost any bike. If your bike has a quick release or bolt-on front axle (the thingy that holds the wheel to the fork), chances are it will work. Some exceptions include bikes with high-end suspension forks (as they have thru-axles) or very weird/vintage wheel sizes.

How does it all work?

The Unlimited eBike Kit   makes any bike a pedal-assisted bike. This means it will provide electrically powered assist when you pedal. The pedal sensor detects your pedalling motion and immediately tells the motor controller to drive the motor via Bluetooth 5 Low Energy. Simple? It is! You can fine-tune how it all feels through our mobile app!

What happens if I don’t have the handlebar-mounted screen?

You can use the Unlimited eBike Kit without any screen. You can also mount your smartphone on the handlebar and open our app which includes a super sleek dashboard. The screen saves you from draining the battery in your phone and also gives you quick access to information and options so it’s great to have though!

What range can you get?

Unlimited! with pedaling!. It pedals just like a normal bike and there is no motor drag. With pedal assist, typical riders can expect around 20-50 miles of assisted riding, depending on how the use the energy, the gradient, wind, and several other factors. Range figures are estimates and not a guarantee that you will achieve them.

Can I use the bike without the battery?

YES. The motor is completely drag-free and feels like a normal hub when rolling. Our intention is that people can still enjoy the analog bike when they feel like it without complicated changes! Just remove the battery and make sure the motor wire is safely grabbed with the provided clips so it’s not hanging around and you’re good to go.

How frequently do you need to charge the battery in the pedal sensor?

If you commute daily the battery will need recharging every 3-6 months depending on how long your commute is.

How easy is it really to install the pedal sensor?

We know most pedal sensors can be a pain to install with wires, alignment, and connectors. For these reasons we are convinced that our pedal sensor is a game changer, it literally takes no longer than 5 seconds to install.

Does the pedal sensor need to be on the left or right crank arm specifically?

You can install it in whichever crank arm you think works best for you or your bike, it does not matter which side. You can configure this from the app.

What are the dimensions of the pedal sensor?

The pedal sensor is 75 mm x 30 mm x 13 mm.

What are the dimensions and weight of each battery?

The SL battery is 220 mm x 84 mm x 51 mm. Height is increased by 12 mm when the mounting baseplate is considered. Weight is 1.1 kg.

The XR battery is  356 mm x 84 mm x 51 mm. Height is increased by 12 mm when the mounting baseplate is considered. Weight is 1.9 kg.

What are the electrical specs of the batteries?

All cells utilized are top quality Samsung or LG 18650 cells.

The small battery is a 52 V, 151 Wh small little piece of dense energy!

The big battery is also 52 V but 353 Wh, also super dense for its size!

You can note that voltage is higher than in most other ebikes and this enables a higher efficiency system =).

Is the powertrain waterproof?

YES! The system is sealed to IP65 rating!

Is the kit strictly for front wheels?

The front wheel is clearly the easiest to swap and the most similar among existing bike standards. But we understand that some people (especially for mtb use) might want a rear motor so we have added it as an add-on.

What if I run out of battery?

If you run out of battery, you can just pedal the bike normally. Rolling resistance was a high priority for us when designing the powertrain, because our intention is that our customers use the bike also without the battery from time to time. Therefore, we included a one-way clutch in the motors which eliminates all resistance from the motor when rolling forward. It feels like a normal wheel!

What about spare parts?

Any part directly related to the electric powertrain you can get from us aftermarket. We are a fully operational company supporting thousands of customers for our electric skateboard product. In case you get the fully assembled Unlimited Warp eBike from us, all components not related to the electric powertrain are fairly standard and any local bike shop will be able to help you out!

Do I need a license to use this electric powertrain?

No, both the Unlimited eBike Kit and the Unlimited Warp eBike are no different than any other eBike out there in that sense, which don’t require a license in the US and EU. Note you can’t run a throttle in the EU.

Can I change the tire that comes with the kit?

YES. It is a standard bicycle tire for the wheel size you selected. You can change it whenever you want to the tire of your personal preference or have a local shop do it for you.

What tire sizes do you recommend for the kit?

Tire size is, to some extent, related to rim width and riding purpose. Tire diameter needs to be in accordance with your wheel size, but you can use different widths depending on what you want. The best size would be the one that came stock with your bike. Remember to always check what is the width limit that your bike/fork/brakes can take.

Can we choose motor and rim color?

Unfortunately, we are already offering lots of options for customers in relation to the wheel size and type of motor, so we decided to simplify things regarding color and keep fully black rims and motors for this campaign. Any decent bike shop can re-lace the motor to your rim of preference, so it shouldn't be a big deal if a full rim match is critical for you.

What accessories can I run with the kit?

The battery comes with a fully ready accessory output wire. By getting the correct accessory and wire harness, you can run:

  • Handlebar-mounted minimalist display
  • Handlebar-mounted throttle (not in EU due to local regulations)
  • High-efficiency front and rear lights will be available in the near future
  • Left and right brake sensors
What does the WiFi do?

Once you set up the WiFi, you can choose for the powertrain to update itself automatically when charging at home. This way you don’t have to worry about it, and it’ll always be up to date. We also gather battery health/usage data to understand your battery better and use this information to improve the product through firmware updates while also providing a world-class customer support if any issues should arise.

What is the weight limit of the kit?

Our motors are rated to 130 kg (286 lbs) of load capacity. The bike is designed to the same spec.

Can I upgrade my product after I make my first purchase?

YES. Just like our electric skateboard product, you are not fixed to what you first get. Many of our customers start with the option that fits them best at the time of purchase, but then get upgrades later as they want to. For example, you can get extra batteries (and even connect them at the same time!), accessories, bigger battery, etc., all after using your initial product.

What if I change bikes/wheels?

All batteries are compatible with all bikes. All motors fit 100 mm x 9 mm dropouts except for the 16” (Brompton) and 20” (folding) pre-built wheels which fit 74 mm dropouts. If you change bikes, you should be able to easily swap the motor to the new bike. If you change bikes to a bike with a different wheel size but compatible dropout width, your local bike shop should be able to lace the correct rim size to your motor.  If you change bikes to a bike with a very different dropout (e.g. from a 28" to a Brompton), you might have to change the motor too. Contact us in such a scenario first so we can assess your case and get you the best solution!

How do I know which size of frame is a good fit for me?

Bike sizing is a matter of ergonomics but to some extent, personal preference too. If you are familiar with conventional bike geometry, just take a look at our geometry chart. If you are still unsure don’t hesitate to contact us! In addition, local bike shops are great places to try out bikes of different sizes and get a feel for what “reach” and top tube height you like, while also enjoying good coffee and getting to know your local bike community!

Does it have regenerative braking?

Rolling resistance was a high priority for us when designing the powertrain, because our intention is that our customers use the bike also without the battery from time to time. Therefore, we included a one-way clutch in the motors which eliminates all resistance from the motor when rolling forward but disables the possibility of regenerative braking.

How is the bike on handling uphill terrain?

Uphill performance depends on how steep the hill is and the total weight of bike plus rider. The motor is a big help though, but sometimes people will need to pedal harder to get it up steep hills. No damage can be done to the motor or system by pushing the limits though, as it is all handled automatically by our fantastic control system.

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?

The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. Duties/VAT/GST is to be paid before we can deliver your Unlimited ebike product. We will send a payment link with invoice overview and ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship your product.

I live in Spain or Europe, can I pick it up myself?

YES. For our last crowdfunding we had backers come pickup all over from Europe! In fact, we did a little delivery party with our local backers from Barcelona. Beers, riding, and good times! Please reach out if you are a local backer and want to meet and pick it up yourself so that we can plan for this!

My bike box arrived damaged. What should i do?

If there is visible damage to your Unlimited box that appears to have damaged the product in any way, please notify the courier immediately as they are held responsible for all damage caused in transit. Request documentation from them stating that you have received a box with visible damages. You will need this for insurance purposes to qualify for a replacement bike or any affected components.

Why is my bike or kit spec’d with a component that differs from that listed on your campaign?

The Unlimited eBike Kit and Warp eBike are in production (with orders standing by for final quantity as we are waiting for the campaign!). Therefore, some components are subject to change if we find better, more suitable options. Once past this stage, we will continue to reserve the right to switch components for ones of equal or higher value. The purpose of this is to ensure that the customer continues to get the best product and there are no delays in delivery.

Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured?

They will be even better. We have a few tweaks and we are still to put final orders in, so we reserve the right to make modifications to improve the bike while keeping the cost. We’ve already made some upgrades based on thousands of miles of real world riding and feedback from test riders around the world.

Why did we take so long on our last campaign and why will that be different this time? 

Being first timers last time was a huge learning experience in so many ways. We had to develop EVERYTHING, because we did not use any standard off-the-shelf common/cheap components, and even though we know we could, it was a lot harder than we initially thought. We faced countless technical challenges with the battery management system, motor control algorithms, wireless communication, bad supplier choices, the list is long. We had to learn our way around Asia and develop relationships with the suppliers and a whole supply chain for a product that didn’t exist down to the smallest component. We had to learn about international trading and even how political situations or pandemics can affect the whole operation! Above all that, we had to learn our way on how to run a company with very little resources

Thankfully, we have all that now, the tech is working great and being improved daily because we have firmware upgrades and remote diagnostics. Our team is now super experienced and our suppliers love working with us. Owning all the tech allows us to evolve fast to other vehicles and this is what we did with this new product, we are very far into the product development and basically only waiting for the success of the campaign to commit to tooling and costly stuff!

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

If you change your mind after the campaign is closed, we will refund you 75% of the amount on your Indiegogo campaign contribution. That said, sometimes customers ask for a refund at a time where it might be difficult (for example, after we have placed orders with the manufacturers) so we reserve the right to refund or not.

Can I change my order?

Yes, it is possible to upgrade or downgrade your product. If we are still in the campaign period, the best way is to ask for a refund is through your profile on Indiegogo where you’ll find a “refund” button. And then “back” a new perk/make the order again. If the order is locked and you are transferred to our database, you can always order upgrades, but if you want changes in your order that are not upgrades we will charge an additional 50EUR fee.

 

Chat with us if you need help making a decision or figuring out if it works on your bike! We are here to help and answer any questions!

click here to chat

 

 

 

Disclaimer

As all products offered in the campaign are still in production, Unlimited reserves the right to change specifications such as colors, size/geometry and other features in order to improve the product or delivery schedule.

We have access to assembly and distribution facilities in Europe (HQ), Hong Kong, LA and Detroit, and have designed a logistics structure to ensure minimal costs and timely delivery. We reserve the right to make adaptations if unexpected changes arise.
story_txt:
The campaign is now closed! If you want to order the product please head to: unlimitedev.com  EU & USA STREET LEGALEU 250 W & 25 km/hUSA 750 W & 22 mph Why pay thousands more for a new bike?Use the bike you already own to make the perfect eBike!  The Unlimited eBike Kit is designed and assembled in Barcelona, Spain. This is our second generation product and we are already in production. If you contribute to our campaign, you will get your perk, guaranteed.  REALLY EASY SETUP!Full installation video: https://youtu.be/drpxKGxenoM 
Unlimited in the news:
​
  It's never been this easy to make ANY bike electric. Wireless pedal (PAS) sensor means it fits on any bike without complicated wiring. Forget 36V or even 48V. Our proprietary, fully-integrated, HIGH-VOLTAGE 52V battery is hyper efficient and allows us to pack the most mileage and power into the lightest package. No other eBike comes even close! We monitor every parameter so you get the most torque and reliability. Turns ON & OFF automatically, a multicolor LED button, our APP dashboard and optional (standard on XR+) display show all the stats like speed, distance and battery. Integrated WiFi means the system is constantly monitored while charging and updated to the latest and greatest. It will also notify you when the charge is ready to go! Does not need to live in a garage, made tough for the rigors of commuting. A dedicated EU & US based customer support team to help you and guide you through any questions. Shoot us an email at ig@unlimitedev.com
 1.- Choose your Kit**Range and Power vary depending on weight, terrain, riding style and local regulations.Everything you need in the box. 2.- Get your Add-ons!Keep your battery and speed in check with the stealth screen!Rocket yourself uphill by simply pushing the throttle with your thumb!There are extra goodies for every case & taste! Grab yours! Am I getting a good deal? ABSOLUTELY!To get a bike with similar specs and technology would cost you thousands! Use the bike you already have and make it a high-end eBike for a fraction of the price!   Does it fit my bike? YES!Check out our Does it fit my bike? page for detailed specifications.Check the 3 items below just to make sure:OPEN DROPOUTS. Your front forks or frame (rear motor) need to accept the standard axle with open dropout (where the wheel is attached). Wheel axles come in quick-release (most common) or bolt-on (fixie, bmx, Brompton, cruisers, older bikes).Dropout width: the distance between the inner faces of the fork must be 74 mm or 100 mm. Please make sure our motors will work with your bike. REAR MOTOR (OPTIONAL): If you are interested in a rear motor, frame and drivetrain requirements are as follows.- Dropout: 135 mm open width (not compatible with Brompton/folding or "Track/Fixie" bikes)- Drivetrain: cassette (Shimano HG spline - usually 7-12 gears) or threaded freewheel (usually <7 gears or single speed). WHEEL SIZE. We build the motor wheel to any of the below wheel sizes 16” to 29", great for city, trekking, mtb, gravel or road bikes. We will send you a survey (and help you figure it out) after the campaign is done.  BRAKES. Disc or rim compatible. So no issues here! Check out our Does it fit my bike? page if you still  have questions.  Delivery timelineSince we are leveraging our technology base and well-established supply chain, we are certain we can stick to this timeline. Proven Team and TechnologyBorn in Barcelona in 2016 out of a group of good friends, the Unlimited team is dedicated to transforming the future urban mobility. With really strong technical backgrounds (including a PhD in engineering, 3 masters in engineering, and an MBA from MIT), the Unlimited crew teamed up to build cutting-edge electric vehicles.  We initially launched an electric skateboard conversion kit via crowdfunding in 2016 that quickly sold out, has been completely fulfilled and gets rave reviews. eSkate is considered the most demanding electric vehicle application in regards to vibration, impact resistance, power and energy density. Since 2018, Unlimited partnered with Loaded Boards (unlimitedxloaded.com) to offer top rated electric skateboard conversion kits and complete boards.“We couldn't have picked a more passionate, dedicated and capable team to partner with. Since day one it's been a pleasure to work with them and we look forward to a bright future together” Don Tashman - CEO @ Loaded We learned a lot from our first crowdfunding, and we’re incredibly thankful for the backers who believed in our vision. Our backers where with us the whole way as we learned how to manufacture and deliver our new technology, and we couldn’t have done it without their encouragement and support.Now we decided to get much further along in the design and manufacturing process before launching. With the Unlimited Electric Skateboard, we hadn’t even met our manufacturer when we launched. This time we’ve been working with them for four years straight, and they’ve been a part of our new powertrain design since day one. We are already into the tooling phase for the product, which means we are testing the initial mechanical parts straight from the factory. We’ve tested multiple electrical designs, optimizing for international certifications and long-term quality. And our firmware and software development is well underway, which means the prototypes you see in the videos are actually working! In short, we’re in the final stages of manufacturing and delivering the Unlimited eBike, and it’s going great.Of course, with any new product and the current global situation there are factors that we cannot foresee. For your peace of mind, this is not our first product and we have years of experience with a well established global supply chain. We’re inviting you into the process with us, so you’ll get to see how it all works. We’ll be posting lots of updates during the final phases of development and manufacturing, and we’re excited to share the journey with you.  Duties, VAT and Taxes. We are doing everything possible in order to reduce costs to our backers and streamline delivery. As such, the perks do not include Duties, VAT/GST or Taxes as these depend on many factors. Duties/VAT/GST are to be paid before we can deliver your Unlimited eBike kit or WARP eBike. We will send payment links, invoice overview and ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship. In the EU, VAT is 21%In the US, Duty is 5% and Sales Tax depends on each state.  Latest Articles:                   CUSTOMER TESTIMONIALS PR LINKShttps://electrek.co/2020/05/27/unlimited-e-bike-kit-diy-ebike-conversion-simple/https://www.netzwelt.de/news/178729-fahrrad-e-bike-unlimited-ebike-kit-verspricht-umbau-binnen-minuten.htmlhttp://www.cnet.com/news/skateboard-electric-unlimited-x-loaded-conversion-kit/https://electrek.co/2019/07/09/unlimited-loaded-new-electric-skateboard-kit/https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinion/why-you-should-back-the-eon-a-powertrain-that-makes-any-skateboard-electric-2936978https://newatlas.com/eon-electric-skate-drive/44466/https://uncrate.com/unlimited-x-loaded-electric-skateboard-conversion-kits/ FAQIs this a donation or will I actually get a kit/bikeAll crowdfunding projects have a certain associated risk. There are all kinds of projects, companies and people uploading stuff everyday. When you are checking out a crowdfunding project, it's a great idea to do some due diligence so you can judge how trustworthy the campaigners are.
This is Unlimited’s second crowdfunding project. We learned a TON from our last campaign, which we fully delivered with a product that was significantly better than we initially offered, in every way. It took time and it was incredibly hard, for us, our families and for our dear backers. Thanks to that experience, we are now able to offer a super good product that leverages all the technology we developed, but also do better in terms of pricing, where we sell, timeline and overall execution of the project.
At Unlimited, we are 1000% committed to delivering to our backers. We are a Techstars-backed company! Fully running since 2016 and we have been delivering top-of-the-line products and supporting our customers and backers every single day for 3 years now. Late in 2018 we partnered with the best longboard brand in the world: Loaded Boards. We’ve been working on this eBike product for more than a year (4 if you consider that the tech was developed in the skateboard!) and we now partnered with Detroit Bikes, one of the largest manufacturers of bicycles in the US! They have the experience and track record of making great bikes.
We are here for the long run and we will take any necessary steps to deliver!Does it fit my bike?The Unlimited eBike Kit really is compatible with almost any bike. If your bike has a quick release or bolt-on front axle (the thingy that holds the wheel to the fork), chances are it will work. Some exceptions include bikes with high-end suspension forks (as they have thru-axles) or very weird/vintage wheel sizes.How does it all work?The Unlimited eBike Kit   makes any bike a pedal-assisted bike. This means it will provide electrically powered assist when you pedal. The pedal sensor detects your pedalling motion and immediately tells the motor controller to drive the motor via Bluetooth 5 Low Energy. Simple? It is! You can fine-tune how it all feels through our mobile app!What happens if I don’t have the handlebar-mounted screen?You can use the Unlimited eBike Kit without any screen. You can also mount your smartphone on the handlebar and open our app which includes a super sleek dashboard. The screen saves you from draining the battery in your phone and also gives you quick access to information and options so it’s great to have though!What range can you get?Unlimited! with pedaling!. It pedals just like a normal bike and there is no motor drag. With pedal assist, typical riders can expect around 20-50 miles of assisted riding, depending on how the use the energy, the gradient, wind, and several other factors. Range figures are estimates and not a guarantee that you will achieve them.Can I use the bike without the battery?YES. The motor is completely drag-free and feels like a normal hub when rolling. Our intention is that people can still enjoy the analog bike when they feel like it without complicated changes! Just remove the battery and make sure the motor wire is safely grabbed with the provided clips so it’s not hanging around and you’re good to go.How frequently do you need to charge the battery in the pedal sensor?If you commute daily the battery will need recharging every 3-6 months depending on how long your commute is.How easy is it really to install the pedal sensor?We know most pedal sensors can be a pain to install with wires, alignment, and connectors. For these reasons we are convinced that our pedal sensor is a game changer, it literally takes no longer than 5 seconds to install.Does the pedal sensor need to be on the left or right crank arm specifically?You can install it in whichever crank arm you think works best for you or your bike, it does not matter which side. You can configure this from the app.What are the dimensions of the pedal sensor?The pedal sensor is 75 mm x 30 mm x 13 mm.What are the dimensions and weight of each battery?The SL battery is 220 mm x 84 mm x 51 mm. Height is increased by 12 mm when the mounting baseplate is considered. Weight is 1.1 kg.
The XR battery is  356 mm x 84 mm x 51 mm. Height is increased by 12 mm when the mounting baseplate is considered. Weight is 1.9 kg.What are the electrical specs of the batteries?All cells utilized are top quality Samsung or LG 18650 cells.
The small battery is a 52 V, 151 Wh small little piece of dense energy!
The big battery is also 52 V but 353 Wh, also super dense for its size!
You can note that voltage is higher than in most other ebikes and this enables a higher efficiency system =).Is the powertrain waterproof?YES! The system is sealed to IP65 rating!Is the kit strictly for front wheels?The front wheel is clearly the easiest to swap and the most similar among existing bike standards. But we understand that some people (especially for mtb use) might want a rear motor so we have added it as an add-on.What if I run out of battery?If you run out of battery, you can just pedal the bike normally. Rolling resistance was a high priority for us when designing the powertrain, because our intention is that our customers use the bike also without the battery from time to time. Therefore, we included a one-way clutch in the motors which eliminates all resistance from the motor when rolling forward. It feels like a normal wheel!What about spare parts?Any part directly related to the electric powertrain you can get from us aftermarket. We are a fully operational company supporting thousands of customers for our electric skateboard product. In case you get the fully assembled Unlimited Warp eBike from us, all components not related to the electric powertrain are fairly standard and any local bike shop will be able to help you out!Do I need a license to use this electric powertrain?No, both the Unlimited eBike Kit and the Unlimited Warp eBike are no different than any other eBike out there in that sense, which don’t require a license in the US and EU. Note you can’t run a throttle in the EU.Can I change the tire that comes with the kit?YES. It is a standard bicycle tire for the wheel size you selected. You can change it whenever you want to the tire of your personal preference or have a local shop do it for you.What tire sizes do you recommend for the kit?Tire size is, to some extent, related to rim width and riding purpose. Tire diameter needs to be in accordance with your wheel size, but you can use different widths depending on what you want. The best size would be the one that came stock with your bike. Remember to always check what is the width limit that your bike/fork/brakes can take.Can we choose motor and rim color?Unfortunately, we are already offering lots of options for customers in relation to the wheel size and type of motor, so we decided to simplify things regarding color and keep fully black rims and motors for this campaign. Any decent bike shop can re-lace the motor to your rim of preference, so it shouldn't be a big deal if a full rim match is critical for you.What accessories can I run with the kit?The battery comes with a fully ready accessory output wire. By getting the correct accessory and wire harness, you can run:

Handlebar-mounted minimalist display
Handlebar-mounted throttle (not in EU due to local regulations)
High-efficiency front and rear lights will be available in the near future
Left and right brake sensors
What does the WiFi do?Once you set up the WiFi, you can choose for the powertrain to update itself automatically when charging at home. This way you don’t have to worry about it, and it’ll always be up to date. We also gather battery health/usage data to understand your battery better and use this information to improve the product through firmware updates while also providing a world-class customer support if any issues should arise.What is the weight limit of the kit?Our motors are rated to 130 kg (286 lbs) of load capacity. The bike is designed to the same spec.Can I upgrade my product after I make my first purchase?YES. Just like our electric skateboard product, you are not fixed to what you first get. Many of our customers start with the option that fits them best at the time of purchase, but then get upgrades later as they want to. For example, you can get extra batteries (and even connect them at the same time!), accessories, bigger battery, etc., all after using your initial product.What if I change bikes/wheels?All batteries are compatible with all bikes. All motors fit 100 mm x 9 mm dropouts except for the 16” (Brompton) and 20” (folding) pre-built wheels which fit 74 mm dropouts. If you change bikes, you should be able to easily swap the motor to the new bike. If you change bikes to a bike with a different wheel size but compatible dropout width, your local bike shop should be able to lace the correct rim size to your motor.  If you change bikes to a bike with a very different dropout (e.g. from a 28" to a Brompton), you might have to change the motor too. Contact us in such a scenario first so we can assess your case and get you the best solution!How do I know which size of frame is a good fit for me?Bike sizing is a matter of ergonomics but to some extent, personal preference too. If you are familiar with conventional bike geometry, just take a look at our geometry chart. If you are still unsure don’t hesitate to contact us! In addition, local bike shops are great places to try out bikes of different sizes and get a feel for what “reach” and top tube height you like, while also enjoying good coffee and getting to know your local bike community!Does it have regenerative braking?Rolling resistance was a high priority for us when designing the powertrain, because our intention is that our customers use the bike also without the battery from time to time. Therefore, we included a one-way clutch in the motors which eliminates all resistance from the motor when rolling forward but disables the possibility of regenerative braking.How is the bike on handling uphill terrain?Uphill performance depends on how steep the hill is and the total weight of bike plus rider. The motor is a big help though, but sometimes people will need to pedal harder to get it up steep hills. No damage can be done to the motor or system by pushing the limits though, as it is all handled automatically by our fantastic control system.Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT/GST?The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before purchasing. Duties/VAT/GST is to be paid before we can deliver your Unlimited ebike product. We will send a payment link with invoice overview and ask for a final delivery address confirmation before we ship your product.I live in Spain or Europe, can I pick it up myself?YES. For our last crowdfunding we had backers come pickup all over from Europe! In fact, we did a little delivery party with our local backers from Barcelona. Beers, riding, and good times! Please reach out if you are a local backer and want to meet and pick it up yourself so that we can plan for this!My bike box arrived damaged. What should i do?If there is visible damage to your Unlimited box that appears to have damaged the product in any way, please notify the courier immediately as they are held responsible for all damage caused in transit. Request documentation from them stating that you have received a box with visible damages. You will need this for insurance purposes to qualify for a replacement bike or any affected components.Why is my bike or kit spec’d with a component that differs from that listed on your campaign?The Unlimited eBike Kit and Warp eBike are in production (with orders standing by for final quantity as we are waiting for the campaign!). Therefore, some components are subject to change if we find better, more suitable options. Once past this stage, we will continue to reserve the right to switch components for ones of equal or higher value. The purpose of this is to ensure that the customer continues to get the best product and there are no delays in delivery.Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured?They will be even better. We have a few tweaks and we are still to put final orders in, so we reserve the right to make modifications to improve the bike while keeping the cost. We’ve already made some upgrades based on thousands of miles of real world riding and feedback from test riders around the world.Why did we take so long on our last campaign and why will that be different this time? Being first timers last time was a huge learning experience in so many ways. We had to develop EVERYTHING, because we did not use any standard off-the-shelf common/cheap components, and even though we know we could, it was a lot harder than we initially thought. We faced countless technical challenges with the battery management system, motor control algorithms, wireless communication, bad supplier choices, the list is long. We had to learn our way around Asia and develop relationships with the suppliers and a whole supply chain for a product that didn’t exist down to the smallest component. We had to learn about international trading and even how political situations or pandemics can affect the whole operation! Above all that, we had to learn our way on how to run a company with very little resources
Thankfully, we have all that now, the tech is working great and being improved daily because we have firmware upgrades and remote diagnostics. Our team is now super experienced and our suppliers love working with us. Owning all the tech allows us to evolve fast to other vehicles and this is what we did with this new product, we are very far into the product development and basically only waiting for the success of the campaign to commit to tooling and costly stuff!Can I get a refund?Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...
If you change your mind after the campaign is closed, we will refund you 75% of the amount on your Indiegogo campaign contribution. That said, sometimes customers ask for a refund at a time where it might be difficult (for example, after we have placed orders with the manufacturers) so we reserve the right to refund or not.Can I change my order?Yes, it is possible to upgrade or downgrade your product. If we are still in the campaign period, the best way is to ask for a refund is through your profile on Indiegogo where you’ll find a “refund” button. And then “back” a new perk/make the order again. If the order is locked and you are transferred to our database, you can always order upgrades, but if you want changes in your order that are not upgrades we will charge an additional 50EUR fee. Chat with us if you need help making a decision or figuring out if it works on your bike! We are here to help and answer any questions!click here to chat   DisclaimerAs all products offered in the campaign are still in production, Unlimited reserves the right to change specifications such as colors, size/geometry and other features in order to improve the product or delivery schedule.We have access to assembly and distribution facilities in Europe (HQ), Hong Kong, LA and Detroit, and have designed a logistics structure to ensure minimal costs and timely delivery. We reserve the right to make adaptations if unexpected changes arise.

story:
My name is Dom Lupo and I help care for my 82 year old mother in St. Louis County. I say help because she helps to care for me also. I have been out of work for over 3 years and we both are completely supported by my mom’s social security, $1000.00 a month.

Last Christmas 2012 my mom nearly died from a major infection that left her with heart valve damage. She cannot walk very far or really do much of anything without getting very tired in a short amount of time.

Last week our only vehicle died and is not repairable yet I need to be able to transport my mom to doctors’ visits and be able to pick up her medications as well as be able to transport her in emergencies. I also need to continue looking for work.

This is why I’m reaching out to this community for help. We have found a vehicle that our mechanic has check out and said it was a good buy. It’s a 2002 Chevy Cavalier. We are looking at needing $5500.00.

I know that there are others that might be in the same situation I am in and if you can’t give money please pass this on to others that might be able to help. If by chance we surpass our goal we will be able to buy a better car. We are very grateful for any help we can get.

Thank you Dom  Lupo

story:
IMPORTANT:  The campaign has been successfully funded in 145%, but we have EXTENDED IT!


To pre-order:

1. click "select a perk" on the right side

2. choose the package ("Gearbox" or "Gearbox for fat bike/e-bike") and follow the instructions


The prices will be lifed on a regular basis, to be fair to those, who contributed at the earlier stage. So, the sooner you pre-order, the better price you get.


What is the Efneo Gearbox?

It is a 3-speed bicycle front gearbox that can replace your awkward front derailleur.

The Efneo look inspired by brands like Porsche and Apple makes it the most elegant and sleek bicycle gearbox on the market.


How it works?

Efneo is a planetary gearbox. One chainring rotating at three different speeds on each gear. It is an equivalent to a 28/40/50T front crankset. 

This video shows how it works:


What is important is that the gear ratios are pretty much the same as you would expect from a standard 3 chainring derailluer system. That makes it comfortable - the gaps between gears are not too big, not too small.

Please remember one thing. The Efneo Gearbox, like almost all other planetary gearboxes available on the market, has one specific feature:
  • you can upshift with full load (e.g. you can push the pedals with all your strength and change the gear to the higher one).
  • when you want to downshift, you need to stop pushing for a fraction of a second to let the gear change. It's very easy to get accustomed to it and after a while you will do it without thinking about it.

Kickass features

There are at least FIVE reasons why you should have the Efneo Gearbox on your bike:

If you like it - please share this campaign link on your Facebook, Twitter, Google+ profiles. You will find the widgets in the left upper corner or below the main video. Just click :) or share the link below. Thank you! 
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/3-speed-front-bicycle-gearbox-efneo/

And here you have a great article from a commuter blogger (fully independent, we do not know this guy). He says in his own words why he thinks the Efneo Gearbox would make his every day riding experience better:
http://ok-lah.blogspot.com/2015/02/efneo-3-speed-front-bicycle-gearbox.html


Efneo on media

You can easily find tens of articles on Efneo in many languages if you google it. We have chosen some for you:

If you want more, just google "efneo" and take a look at other articles from all over the world!
And remember to visit our own web site:  www.Efneo.com  :-)


Perks


Is it for me?

Efneo gearbox is dedicated for all kinds of bicycles excluding off-road applications like MTB, downhill, dirt, etc.

It is perfect for a city/urban bike, for trekking, hybrid, folding, recumbent & trike.

If you have an e-bike with a rear wheel engine, the Efneo Gearbox is also for you. After installing the Efneo Gearbox you'll get a super-comfortable e-bike with better weight balance.

It is a perfect upgrade for a single-speed bike. With the Efneo Gearbox your beautiful bike still looks clean and cool, and riding gets easier.


Remember - the Efneo Gearbox is not dedicated for off-road applications (MTB, downhill, dirt, trial, etc.). Sorry. We have done our best to make the gearbox reliable and robust, but if you want to do things like this:


better choose some other stuff ;-)

It will not work properly with a fixie bike that has no freewheel in a rear wheel. However - it works perfectly with a single-speed and still looks so clean and cute!


Efneo Gearbox on e-bike

If you have an e-bike with a rear wheel engine, you can have even more advantages with the Efneo Gearbox. The gearbox affects positively your bike's range.

The battery consumption is the highest in three situations:

  1. when starting
  2. when climbing uphill
  3. when cruising at maximum speed

In all these cases the gearbox helps you to support your engine and reduce the battery consumption considerably, so that you improve your bike's range:

  1. when starting you can downshift easily to the first gear and add some power from your muscles much easier than with a big front chainring (remember - you cannot do this with a derailleur if you do not downshift before stopping; and we forget to do this so often...)
  2. the same is with climbing uphill - you can help your engine without getting too tired (hmm - that was the reason to buy an e-bike - not to get too tired :-)
  3. when cruising at speed around 20mph/35kph it's very difficult to add any torque with a chainring of about 40T; you need a bigger front chainring to pedal effectively and to support your engine; here we come with our third gear that is an equivalen to 50T (the biggest front chainring used in popular bicycle models is usually 46T)

Obviously, you can also improve your range by purchasing a bigger battery :-). But even in this case if your battery finally turns off, it's always much better to have a multi-gear system on your bike!


How to put it on my bike?

We assume 90% of our customers will simply take the gearbox to the nearest bike shop to install it, but if you really like doing things yourself, take a look at the "how to install" video and see how easy it is:


Take a look here if you want to know how to change a bottom bracket:

Video tutorial "How to replace a BB"


Does it fit my bike?

Efneo gearbox fits bike frames used for city, urban, single-speed, hybrid, trekking, as well as trikes & recumbent. 

Yes, it also fits bikes with a rear derailleur, no problem (see our movie!)

It fits most of the folding bicycles (but for example not Strida, with an eccentric bottom bracket). If you have any doubts, send us the full name of your bicycle (brand and model) or a photo of the bottom bracket (email: wiktor@efneo.com). We will reply ASAP. 


Product options available

You can choose:
  • Colour: black or silver
  • Shifter type: rapidfire (like on our movie "how it works") or grip-shift.
  • Crank length: 170 mm
We will ask you to choose the options about two months before deliveries by e-mail.

What's next?

This is how the timeline looks like:


We are planning deliveries for August 2015.


Risks and challenges

After a series of tests we are 100% confident the product works as we promise it works, and is durable.

The gearbox will be manufactured with our Japanese manufacturing partner, famous for its highest quality and reliability of its products. This way we are reducing the risks that are always emerging when passing from the "development phase" to the "manufacturing phase".

However, even the best tests are only tests. We are fully engaged in constant development and enhancement of the product after delivering it to you. If it turns out the product has any "child age problems", please contact us immediately and we will do our best to solve the problem (including exchange of the gearbox or even money refund, if no other solution is available).

Based on our testing, we believe the risk that the project fails in a way that we simply do not deliver the product is very low. We are not a big, mature organization, but we have been working on this project for over three years and have spent too much time and money to let it fail.


Product details

For all the product details, look here. Definitely READ THIS, if you consider ordering!


FAQ's

For product specific FAQ, take a look here.


Why we need your support?

We have fully functional samples of the Efneo Gearbox that you can see on our movies. They have successfully gone through on-road tests of durability and functionality. We will soon be ready for production.

Though we have big ambition, we are a small company and only have the capacity to finance limited lots of production, and that elevates our operating capital costs.

You can help us to increase the volume ordered in a factory so that we can start from an affordable level of manufacturing costs per unit.

As we mentioned above, the objective of the Indiegogo campaign is not to finance product development process. We have already invested almost four years of our work and over half million USD in this project.

The reason we need your support is to put the biggest possible first order in a factory (and in fact there are more than one factory - the other is for cranks, the other for gears, the other for shifters etc.). Some of them have so called MOQs (Minimum Order Quantity).

To lower our operating capital costs we decided to offer the gearbox on Indiegogo for a much discounted price!

And here you can read this insightful article on Efneo evolution within these years. You can see there photos of prototypes even from 2012 :)

http://www.solidsmack.com/design/the-efneo-cycling-gearbox-project/

Believe me - it costs huge amount of cash and work to make a leap from the garage stage in 2012 to this sleek and clean product that you can see now!

To sum up - we will deliver the gearboxes to the contributors no matter how much we raise on Indiegogo.


Shipment costs

Shipment is FREE for:

  • United States and Canada
  • European Union
  • Australia
  • Japan
  • Taiwan

Your shipment will be sent from a local distributor by post. All costs (shipment, taxes, duties) are included in your perk.

This is how people are contributing now - almost half of our contributors are coming from the United States, but there are also people from Germany, UK, Netherlands, Australia, Canada and other places :)


For other countries than mentioned on the list above we need to add shipping costs. If you want to back us, please contact me (email: fm@efneo.com) to let you know, what the cost is and if we can afford covering it.


Newsletter subscription

You can subscribe to our newsletter here (you can easily unsubscribe at any time).


Who we are

We are a family - father and three sons. Our father is the inventor - he created the gearbox and made first prototypes. And we are doing our best to build Efneo as a strong brand delivering innovative products that make your ride cool and fun!

Franek (CEO) - I am an experienced manager with over 10 years of managerial career in strategy, sales and marketing field. You can read more about my professional background on my LinkedIn profile http://pl.linkedin.com/in/fmigaszewski 

Stefan (Product Inventor) - our father, "natural born inventor". The gearbox idea came to his mind a couple of years ago and together with us (sons) he worked on it to make the idea come true.

Wiktor (Manufacturing Director) - I worked for multinational companies like Mars and Whirlpool and now I decided to focus fully on our own business. I am responsible for our cooperation with the subcontractors and for patent submissions.

Fryderyk (Designer) - I am happy to inherit a lot of my father's inventive talent, they say ;-)
story_txt:
IMPORTANT:  The campaign has been successfully funded in 145%, but we have EXTENDED IT!To pre-order:1. click "select a perk" on the right side2. choose the package ("Gearbox" or "Gearbox for fat bike/e-bike") and follow the instructionsThe prices will be lifed on a regular basis, to be fair to those, who contributed at the earlier stage. So, the sooner you pre-order, the better price you get. 
What is the Efneo Gearbox?
It is a 3-speed bicycle front gearbox that can replace your awkward front derailleur.


The Efneo look inspired by brands like Porsche and Apple makes it the most elegant and sleek bicycle gearbox on the market.
How it works?
Efneo is a planetary gearbox. One chainring rotating at three different speeds on each gear. It is an equivalent to a 28/40/50T front crankset. 
This video shows how it works:
What is important is that the gear ratios are pretty much the same as you would expect from a standard 3 chainring derailluer system. That makes it comfortable - the gaps between gears are not too big, not too small.Please remember one thing. The Efneo Gearbox, like almost all other planetary gearboxes available on the market, has one specific feature:
you can upshift with full load (e.g. you can push the pedals with all your strength and change the gear to the higher one).
when you want to downshift, you need to stop pushing for a fraction of a second to let the gear change. It's very easy to get accustomed to it and after a while you will do it without thinking about it.



Kickass features
There are at least FIVE reasons why you should have the Efneo Gearbox on your bike:



If you like it - please share this campaign link on your Facebook, Twitter, Google+ profiles. You will find the widgets in the left upper corner or below the main video. Just click :) or share the link below. Thank you! 
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/3-speed-front-bicycle-gearbox-efneo/
And here you have a great article from a commuter blogger (fully independent, we do not know this guy). He says in his own words why he thinks the Efneo Gearbox would make his every day riding experience better:http://ok-lah.blogspot.com/2015/02/efneo-3-speed-front-bicycle-gearbox.html

Efneo on media

You can easily find tens of articles on Efneo in many languages if you google it. We have chosen some for you:







If you want more, just google "efneo" and take a look at other articles from all over the world!And remember to visit our own web site:  www.Efneo.com  :-)


Perks




Is it for me?


Efneo gearbox is
dedicated for all kinds of bicycles excluding off-road applications like MTB,
downhill, dirt, etc.
It is perfect for a
city/urban bike, for trekking, hybrid, folding, recumbent & trike.
If you have an
e-bike with a rear wheel engine, the Efneo Gearbox is also for you. After installing the Efneo Gearbox you'll get a super-comfortable e-bike with better weight balance.

It is a perfect upgrade for a single-speed bike. With the Efneo Gearbox your beautiful bike still looks clean and cool, and riding gets easier.


Remember - the Efneo Gearbox is not dedicated for off-road applications (MTB, downhill, dirt, trial, etc.). Sorry. We have done our best to make the gearbox reliable and robust, but if you want to do things like this:

better choose some other stuff ;-)
It will not work properly with a fixie bike that has no freewheel in a rear wheel. However - it works perfectly with a single-speed and still looks so clean and cute!

Efneo Gearbox on e-bike
If you have an e-bike with a rear wheel engine, you can have even more advantages with the Efneo Gearbox. The gearbox affects positively your bike's range.
The battery consumption is the highest in three situations:

when starting
when climbing uphill
when cruising at maximum speed

In all these cases the gearbox helps you to support your engine and reduce the battery consumption considerably, so that you improve your bike's range:

when starting you can downshift easily to the first gear and add some power from your muscles much easier than with a big front chainring (remember - you cannot do this with a derailleur if you do not downshift before stopping; and we forget to do this so often...)

the same is with climbing uphill - you can help your engine without getting too tired (hmm - that was the reason to buy an e-bike - not to get too tired :-)
when cruising at speed around 20mph/35kph it's very difficult to add any torque with a chainring of about 40T; you need a bigger front chainring to pedal effectively and to support your engine; here we come with our third gear that is an equivalen to 50T (the biggest front chainring used in popular bicycle models is usually 46T)

Obviously, you can also improve your range by purchasing a bigger battery :-). But even in this case if your battery finally turns off, it's always much better to have a multi-gear system on your bike!

How to put it on my bike?
We assume 90% of our customers will simply take the gearbox to the nearest bike shop to install it, but if you really like doing things yourself, take a look at the "how to install" video and see how easy it is:

Take a look here if you want to know how to change a bottom bracket:
Video tutorial "How to replace a BB"

Does it fit my bike?



Efneo gearbox fits bike frames used for city, urban, single-speed, hybrid, trekking, as well as trikes & recumbent. 
Yes, it also fits bikes with a rear derailleur, no problem (see our movie!)
It fits most of the folding bicycles (but for example not Strida, with an eccentric bottom bracket). If you have any doubts, send us the full name of your bicycle (brand and model) or a photo of the bottom bracket (email: wiktor@efneo.com). We will reply ASAP. 


Product options available
You can choose:


Colour: black or silver


Shifter type: rapidfire (like on our movie "how it works") or grip-shift.

Crank length: 170 mm

We will ask you to choose the options about two months before deliveries by e-mail.

This is how the timeline looks like:



We are planning deliveries for August 2015.

tests we are 100% confident the product works as we promise it works, and is durable.
The gearbox will be manufactured with our Japanese manufacturing partner, famous for its highest quality and reliability of its products. This way we are reducing the risks that are always emerging when passing from the "development phase" to the "manufacturing phase".

However, even the best tests are only tests. We are fully engaged in constant development and enhancement of the product after delivering it to you. If it turns out the product has any "child age problems", please contact us immediately and we will do our best to solve the problem (including exchange of the gearbox or even money refund, if no other solution is available).Based on our testing, we believe the risk that the project fails in a way that we simply do not deliver the product is very low. We are not a big, mature organization, but we have been working on this project for over three years and have spent too much time and money to let it fail.

For product specific FAQ, take a look here.

functional samples of the Efneo Gearbox that you can see on our movies. They have successfully gone through on-road tests of durability and functionality. We will soon be ready for production.

ambition, we are a small company and only have the capacity to finance limited lots of production, and that elevates our operating capital costs.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Corie Mattar (pictured here) and I am an In Home Care Provider for people with disabilities. I help them with in-home services, as well as travelling to pharmacies, grocery stores and transporting clients to and from medical appointments. 

My clients are severely disabled, or Veterans with disabilities, unable to get around on their own. They are also fiercely independent, and in my opinion, that keeps them more active and happy.

What We Need

We need funds for help with car rentals, gas and tolls, and hotel costs, specifically for long distance client transportation (local trips are already covered).

One of my clients (we'll call her Jane) lives in South Lake Tahoe, but gets treated at Stanford Medical Center in Palo Alto. It's a 452 mile round trip. Jane has severe pelvic pain caused by her Multiple Sclerosis. As you may expect, Jane is extremely uncomfortable riding to her appointments in my old SUV.

We rent a car for the trips, and Jane pays as much as possible for expenses, but since she only gets $950 per month from SSD, it doesn't cover the total cost.

She cannot live closer as she is on her own, and living costs in that area are very high.

To that end, your donations in this first campaign will go for car rentals, gas money and bridge tolls and one or two nights in a hotel while Jane has several appointments (she schedules at least 3 appointments at a time to save travel time and money). 

Each trip will cost approximately $500, depending on what kind of deals are available for hotel and cars. This campaign will get Jane and another client two visits each.

Jane has a surgery scheduled for 2 weeks from now and will also need a follow-up visit. Another client has a need for at least two visits as well.

The Impact

At this time, I must drive my 1996 Ford Explorer as my only mode of transportation for my clients. While it is a decent SUV, its seats are uncomfortable and do not afford my clients the ability to stretch out or change positions. It also gets about 14 MPG, so gas costs are extremely high.

Your donations will allow for a much more comfortable ride for people like Sue, who currently has to spend several days in bed, just recovering from each trip.

Risks & Challenges

My SUV causes such pain for people like Sue. Yet they never complain. They are only ever kind. It makes me want to do better for them, and to do that, I need your help. 

The state of California pays me $9 per hour to do this job. I get 4-20 hours per week to work for each client (currently I have 3 clients, for a total of 28 paid hours per week (I actually work about 50 or more hours per week, depending upon how much travel is involved). The state then cuts 10% of the hours for austerity measures. I have gone through a background check, been fingerprinted and went through a two day orientation process in order to be an IHSS Provider. 

If this first crowdfunding is successful, I will create a second for a vehicle upgrade in order to avoid the high cost of car rentals.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially, no worries. We need the word to spread, so please consider sharing this information on your social networks. Indiegogo makes this easy by providing share tools.

Also, if you have an 'in' with a car rental company or hotels in the Stanford area, contact me. ALL help is appreciated!

Most of all, THANK YOU for reading. I really appreciate it.
