story:
CAPACITA is more than just a bike or a rider or a motor, it’s the seamless integration of all things “go” finished up with the features designed to make your two-wheeled life as simple and seamless as possible. From taking your kids to school, to hauling heavy cargo, to riding 40 miles without breaking a sweat, to the peace of mind that comes from GPS security tracking – our CAPACITA's packed with perks to keep you happy in the saddle.
 

 
 
If you are going to replace car trips with your electric bike shouldn’t it contain the same basic safety and convenience features as a car? We thought so too and that is why Capacita comes standard with integrated lights, space for cargo and storage, an integrated lock, and has power assist so you never arrive anywhere sweaty. The Capacita cargo bike rides just like a regular sized bike yet can handle big cargo loads with ease. Smart, safe, stylish, and comfortable, Capacita finally lets you leave your car in the garage.
 
 
From Palo Alto to San Francisco, from Brooklyn to the Bronx and back, with 40 miles of power your rides are no longer limited by your legs. Let your imagination plan your route and see where it takes you.
 

 

Anti-theft GPS tracking so you’ll never lose your ride.

Theft is one of the worst things that can happen to a bike (and its rider). We integrated GPS tracking into the Capacita so even when it’s out of sight, it’s never out of mind and, if the unthinkable happens, you’ll be able to point the cops right to your ride.

 

Cargo for Days

We built this thing from the ground up with cargo in mind. What cargo? All of it! Kids, gear, kegs, cats, the whole nine yards. The racks can hold a total of 175 lbs so all your carrying needs are covered.

* Total Payload Capacity 300lbs

Room for everything and more

The high capacity front basket lets you load up your bike without sacrificing stability. With plenty of room for a briefcase, a case of beer, or all the stuff for setting up Steve’s surprise party – you can keep your back free of packs and still arrive with everything you need.

We even built an integrated lock holder!

 

Integrated automatic headlights and taillights activate at the first sign of low-light, and the automatic brake light helps keep you visible on the road, in traffic, and wherever your adventures take you. No hassle, no headaches, just illumination when you need it.

 

Don't have space or a plug in your garage? Worry not! You can remove the battery to charge up in your living room, office, or anywhere else.

The battery we're using is the high capacity Samsung 42V, 10Ah

Comfort is Key

We designed CAPACITA to be comfortable under any load. CAPACITA fits riders from 5' to 6'4" and we gave it an adjustable stem. Adjustable stems can give you a seemingly infinite number of riding positions. We recommend finding the one that feels best and sticking to that. Just a quick adjustment and you'll be on your way.

 

Precious cargo requires high quality stopping power in rain or shine. We're using high performance disc brakes to make sure that you can stop on a dime regardless of cargo or conditions.

 

Who needs a heavy front suspension? The CAPACITA sports super-wide 24x2.35 tires. That means you'll cruise off bumps, and cracks like they're not even there. It'll be like riding on a cloud.

 

Power where you need it

No complicated and ugly crank-drive, no clunky-transmission, just effortless power right where you need it. We test rode some front wheel motors currently on the market and couldn’t stand the way it affected steering and traction. Our rear-mounted motor keeps the bike balanced and delivers performance directly to the rear wheel, so it’s all “grip” and “go”, no hiccups or false starts. For CAPACITA, we're using the tried, tested, and true Bafang 350W motor.

 

 

Full Mechanical Specs:

Frame: Alloy Pure Cycles E-Cargo Frame
Fork: Pure Cycles alloy fork w/disc brake mount
Headset: 1 1/8" Threadless Semi-Intergrated
Crankset: Alloy, 48t chainring
Bottom Bracket: Square taper sealed cartridge w/ integrated torque sensor
Pedals: 9/16 Alloy w/ tread inserts
Shifter: Sram X4 8 speed trigger shifter
Rear Derailleur: Sram X3
Freewheel: Sram PG-820 11-32t cassette
Chain: KMC X8.93
Handlebar / Stem: Pure Cycles alloy bar / alloy adjustable stem
Grips: Silicone
Saddle: Pure Cycles
Seat Post: Micro adjust alloy, 27.2 x 350mm
Seat Clamp: Alloy Quick-Release
Wheelset: Pure Cycles 20mm hole rims w/  disc front hub; 42v/350w rear electric hub
Tires: WTB Thickslick 24 x 2.35
Brakes: Tektro M-300 disc
Brake Lever: Tektro alloy 4-finger lever
Kickstand: Dual Leg
Bell: Included

 

Electronics Specs

Samsung Battery - 42V, 10 Ah, 40 cells
350W, 42V Rear Hub Bafang Motor
Integrated, Automatic Front and Rear Lights
Payload Capacity: 300 lbs (rear rack: 175 lbs, running boards: 40 lbs per side)
Class 1 E-Bike (assist only, speeds up 20 lbs)
Range: 20-40 miles
22.5" Cargo Rear Rack 
16.75" Foot Platforms
Torque sensor
Custom App Included
Motor Cut Off Sensors (Safety)
Key fob
On/off button on bike 

*While we don't expect anything major, all specs are subject to change.

 

 

We teamed up with some friends to bring you the coolest e-bike accessories we could find.

Outer Shell Adventure

Outer Shell stands against disposable culture and makes durable gear with a warranty. As a small two-person operation, they have a complete perspective from designing to testing to manufacturing. Each phase is given the same meticulous attention to detail. All products, except for the Dry Bags, are made in San Francisco, CA! The extra large pannier was created especially for the extended rear rack on the Capacita and you have the option to buy the bags as a set or only one side. The front bag fits the Capacita's front basket perfectly and is very useful for storing your small accessories (wallet, phone, keys, lights, food, dogs? etc...)

Thousand

As a long time cyclist, Gloria was never a fan of wearing a bicycle helmet. She thought they were too bulky, too “sci-fi”, too hard to lug around. But after losing a friend to a fatal bike accident, she knew she needed to change. 

;

Hiplok

All Hiplok locks are designed and developed in the UK by a small dedicated team of innovators and bike riders. From the patented adjustable belt fastening on their wearable chain locks to the CLIP + RIDE on the D-locks and ultra-reflectivity of the SUPERBRIGHT Series, they believe the small details make a big difference to the enjoyment of the ride. Their new DX E-Bike lock was developed with the e-bike specifically in mind as it is one of the strongest locks on the market and comes with both a chain and u-lock so that you can lock all parts of the bike.

 

Pure Cycles was founded with one sole mission: to get more people on bikes. For 7 years, Pure Cycles has designed, developed, and delivered over 150,000 of the coolest bikes on the market, around the world. It all began in a dorm room in Madison, Wisconsin, the founders looking out at bike racks below and wondering why there were so few bikes in general, and so few cool bikes, specifically. Asking around campus, the founders kept coming back to the same sticking points - people wanted to ride, but they wanted bikes that were simple, affordable, and (maybe most importantly) looked awesome.

Pure Fix Cycles was born to make the bikes younger generations were seeking. What began as a quest to make the perfect campus bike, expanded as did the company. The office moved to Los Angeles, the team grew, advocacy and charity became priorities, and the brand expanded internationally, and soon Pure Cycles had cultivated a large team of passionate bike riders and a loyal customer base.

Today, as Pure Cycles, the brand offers bikes that span several disciplines and occasions. Electric bikes, road bikes, commuter bikes, Pure Cycles is always cooking up new ideas because their community always find new places and ways to ride! From the successful Kickstarter to breathe life into their e-bike, the Volta, to the top-secret newness peeking over the next horizon, each and every development furthers their goal that started it all - to get more people on bikes.

After 4 years of studying Computer Science at Columbia, Jordan returned home ready to launch the bike business with his buds. Since then he’s overseen the tech side of things, building the website, turning Pure Cycles into one of the premier web-retailers in the bike space, and ensuring that our customer service is always the best in the industry. 

It was during Michael and Austin’s college career at UW Madison that they realized the shortage of cool, affordable bikes available on the market. When they returned to LA and launched Pure Cycles, Michael took the reins on all things fiscal. Crunching numbers, forecasting financials, and oiling the machine that would become the best bike company in the country has kept him busy (and happy) for the last 7 years.

With an eye for quality and an instinct for international relations, Austin is responsible for our production relationships, assembly facilities, and the logistics of running a worldwide enterprise out of a dorm room. We’ve come a long way since those early days and Austin’s been scaling up our operations with every new development to keep us on the top of our game. He's also wicked good at karaoke.

 

Warranty

Sweet new bike, same amazing warranty.

Just like the rest of our rides, Capacita's a bike we're proud to stand behind and know that you'll be proud to own. We're confident in our construction, design, and engineering - and you'll share that confidence with our 24-month warranty on all the electrical components, including the battery. This is a bike that'll keep you rolling for years, and if not, we'll make it right. Ride easy, we've got your back. Plus, we warranty all of our bike frames and forks for life!

 

Risks and challenges

As a company, we thrive on challenges. We recognize that with the design, development, and introduction of any new product there are hurdles that we’ll face but, unlike most Indiegogo projects, we’ve been developing Capacita for 4 years prior to this roll out. We’ve also successfully designed, developed and deployed over 10 completely new models since our humble beginnings as a one-model bike company including VOLTA - The Smartest E-Bike ever.

After 7 years and all of those rollouts (over 150,000 bikes!) we have a deep understanding of the sticking points in the process and a well-oiled machine for overcoming the obstacles that pop up along the way. We have wonderful relationships with our manufacturers, supply chain, and everybody involved in the process of bringing these bikes to fruition, so we’re confident in our ability to deliver, on time and as promised. 

We’re committed to making this process as transparent as possible to our supporters, so we’ll keep you in the loop regarding any and all developments, decisions, and possible delays, and we’re committed to our guarantee that these bikes will be rolling into people’s homes this year. 

We appreciate your support on this dream of ours, and we’re thrilled to have your help in making Capacita a reality.

 

Press? Check out our press kit! 

FAQs

 

If you could not find what you're looking for here, please email us at support@purecycles.com and/or leave us a comment on Indiegogo. We will get back to you ASAP!

What is Pedal Assist?

No throttles, no accelerator, just the motor seamlessly backing you up when you push the pedals. Your leg power is supplemented by the motor, every time your feet go around. Stop pedaling and the motor backs off too. Simple.

What sizes does it come in?

The Capacita comes in one size: perfect. 24" wheels help keep the bike low enough for smaller riders, and the adjustable seat post raises the saddle up for taller ones. Additionally, the adjustable stem allows for a rider of any height to feel upright and comfy. We've had test pilots from 5'0" to 6'4" cruise comfortably for miles.

Who is going to build this thing?

The bike will arrive 90% assembled and all that will be required to get the bike riding will be to put on the front wheel, the handlebar, the seat post and saddle, and the pedals. Simple! We do suggest that before your first ride you take the bike to your local bike shop to ensure the brakes are tuned properly and all bolts are tight!

Is the bike waterproof?

You know it! Well, it's weatherproof. Rainproof. You can't ride along the bottom of the ocean, or take it in the pool, but if there's water in the sky or on the road, you'll pedal on just fine.

What is the weight limit on the front rack?

Your imagination*, plus 45 pounds.
*Your imagination, while limitless, weighs nothing.

Does the bike come standard with the front basket and the extended rear rack?

Yes, it does! They are both included!

How much noise does Capacita make?

That depends on how loudly you go, "Weeeeeeee!". The chain drive makes a bit more noise (chainy sounds and freewheel clicks when you coast, just like an ordinary bike), but these aren't mopeds - you won't wake the neighbors.

What's the motor's top speed?

20 mph! For legal reasons, the power on the bike will tap out at 20 mph but you can, of course, pedal faster to push beyond that 20mph limit. This is a class 1 e-bike (only type that is legal in NYC!).

What brand is the motor?

BAFANG, a leading manufacturer of e-mobility components.

Why did you choose a 350W motor?

Because 250W just didn’t feel like enough “oomph” with the added cargo that Capacita is built to lug around. 350W provides plenty of power while still hitting our goals for weight, appearance, and affordability.

What's the weight limit on the Capacita?

275 lbs

What is the total payload capacity for the bike?

350 lbs

How much weight can the rear rack hold?

175 lbs

How much weight can each side platform running boards hold?

Up to 40 lbs per side

Does the Capacita come with a kickstand?

Yes! It is a dual leg kickstand.

How long will the battery last before it needs replacing?

Battery life depends on use and conditions and, even with proper care, rechargeable batteries won't last forever. Conservatively, our Li-Ion battery will last about 500–750 cycles.
A partial charge/ discharge counts fractionally against those numbers; so running the battery down halfway then recharging it completely uses up one half of a charge cycle.
“End of useful life” refers to the point at which a battery can no longer supply 70% of its original rated capacity in ampere- hours. After this point, the aging process will accelerate and the battery will need to be replaced.
So, it'll depend on how often you ride and charge - but expect more than 500 charge cycles before you need to stress about batteries.

How does Capacita get 40 miles of range?

The short answer is science.
The long answer is, thanks to its light weight and 24" wheels, acceleration doesn't require the huge spikes in power you'll need on other e-rides. The pedal-assist system, high-quality torque sensor, and high-quality controller mean there's no wasted power when you don't need it. And, lastly, our development of adaptive power modes means the bike sips from the battery as needed.
The results of all that engineering elbow-grease is an e-bike that can roll for 40 miles in eco-mode and 20+ miles in power-mode. This bikes got a big brain for a reason.

What colors does the Capacita come in?

Initially, matte black, silver, and hi-vis yellow. When we hit our goal, though, we may be able to roll out more!

How is pedal assist adjusted and can you describe the experience of the "levels" of pedal assist as it relates to battery life, range, and the feel of the ride (e.g. going up a hill, pedaling from a stop position, etc)?

As you pedal, the motor senses the force you're applying (thanks to the torque-sensor in the bottom bracket) and supplements your effort by powering the rear wheel. The amount of electric backup the motor provides will depend on your power mode (bike, eco, or power).
In terms of battery use vs. power, the more support you use, the more battery you'll use too. That adjustment is made by selecting the power mode that's right for your ride. Power mode:
Feels like: "Push the pedals and just fly!"
Range: We tested a bit over 20 miles
Eco Mode:
Feels like: "Wow, I don't remember my commute being this easy, I should ride every day!"
Range: We tested a bit over 40 miles
Bike Mode:
Feels like: "Just like riding a bike."
Range: As far as your legs will take you

Can you remove the front basket?

Yes!

Where is your store? I live in LA and would love to test drive the prototype.

Awesome! Our HQ is in Burbank at 713 N. Victory Blvd, 91502
If you're interested in a test ride, please contact us at support@purecycles.com and we'll set something up for you!

Does this bike have gears? Why does an electric bike need gears?

The bike has 8 gears with the 1x8 Sram trigger shifter setup. Electric bikes should have gears because although the electric motor takes away much of the strain, it is still useful to have gears whenever you decide to pedal while cruising, trying to get more exercise, carry more gear, or extend your range. The combination of the 8 gears and the pedal assistance from the rear motor means you can always find the most efficient gear and pedal level to carry a lot of gear and go the distance!

Is the app for iOS only or is there also going to be an Android app as well?

The app will work for both iOS and Android

Will the bike be able to support attaching various kid bike trailers (both the ones that attach at the wheel and seat post)?

It'll really depend on the spec of the trailer/tow-along. Seatpost mounted trailers should work just fine, but the wheel mounted ones will come down to the trailers' mounting set-up, how much axle they need, whether the mount inside or outside the dropout, etc...
We'll be sure to try some out to figure out what plays nicely and what doesn't once we've got some in shops (and places that have various styles of trailers).

How much will a replacement battery cost?

New batteries will cost $399.

Is it possible to check how much battery is left?

Yep! The phone app will show you much charge you have left, so you can ride comfortably knowing you'll make it all the way home!

Are you guys setting up the GPS with every country? Or do we do it ourselves?

We've got it all worked out so all you'll need to worry about is where you want to ride! The GPS/anti-theft stuff is all worked out on our end, wherever you are in the world.

Is it possible to ride Capacita if I forgot my phone one day by accident or lost it?

Absolutely! The bike is still operable via the fob that will come with every bike (think of it like your car keys).

Will the bike have a firmware updates? i.e. Optimize battery/engine usage in different modes, release create new modes, etc…

Yup! We'll be improving the software right along with the hardware and we'll push updates out to riders so everyone can enjoy an improved experience!

How easy is it to adjust the seat up and down, are any tools needed?

Super easy and just like a standard bike! You'll need an allen key to loosen (and re-tighten) the seat post collar, then just raise or lower the saddle to your desired height!

Is it possible to turn on the lights manually without the auto light sensor kicking in?

Yes! Or you can let them do their thing automatically when the road gets dark!

Which type of lock do you recommend? Does a U-Lock fit through the rear wheel, the rear frame triangle, and around a possible pole? Which locking systems are you currently using and how?

Great question! We recommend using a chain and U-lock combination like the Hiplok E-DX that we are offering as one of the perks. The noose chain and DX shackle combine to give you extended locking options and maximum protection. For a technique breakdown, check out this "how to lock up your ride" post we wrote up a few years ago! ( https://www.purecycles.com/blogs/bicycle-news/9...).

About GPS — How much will it cost in the United States and other countries to maintain the service?

In the US and worldwide it'll be about $49 per year, but we're working hard on getting that number down! We plan to give our backers a couple months free in the beginning :)

Would a baby bike seat or bike trailer work with the Capacita? — If so, are there any types of baby seats or preferred brands/models that would work better?

Yes! We designed the extended rear rack so that two child seats can fit but we can’t yet confirm if this will be possible yet.
We love the Thule Yepp Maxi seats!

How do you recommend locking/securing the front wheel?

Above you'll see our overall locking recommendations, and when it comes to the front wheel you'll just want something to secure it to the frame or a stable/permanent fixture.
If you lock your rear wheel and frame to the bike rack, then you can use your second lock to secure the front wheel to the frame or the front wheel to the bike rack! For wheel to frame, you're probably looking at a chain lock to give you the reach. For wheel to rack a u-lock will work just fine!

What plugs are provided for charging? Is it only American, would I need an adapter?

Capacita will plug into the wall and charge from a 110V (US) or 220V (International) outlet and it'll ship with the standard plug of your country, so you shouldn't need an adapter!

Does Capacita have a red rear reflector?

All our bikes ship with reflectors in the box so you can hit the road legally and the Capacita will be no exception! They don't look very cool in photos, so they're not on the prototype, but you can mount yours right on the seatpost, or wherever you prefer to have it pointing behind you.
Capacita also has the integrated and automatic taillight, and that'll provide even better rear visibility than a reflector.

What's the power output on the motor?

350 Watts

Will we void our warranty if we paint our bikes?

That's kind of a tough one. If you take a brush and put some paint on the frame, that shouldn't have any effect on the bike and you'll still be fine. If you (or a paint shop) take the bike apart, paint it, and can't put it back together or damage something in the process, that wouldn't be covered. Basically, you'll just want to be careful and not damage the components or electronics. For most people, that'll just mean not trying to paint the bike, but if you've got the chops to do it without any damage, there shouldn't be a problem putting some paint on there!

How will the warranty be handled for people not in the US?

Overseas warranties will be routed through our local dealers and distributors. We'll still have you covered, wherever you are.

What is the warranty policy?

24-month warranty on all electrical parts (motor, battery, etc..) and lifetime warranty on frame and fork.

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, or VAT?

The backer is responsible.

How much is the shipping fee?

The shipping cost is different for each model and each country. Please refer to the perk details.

Will I be able to buy replacement parts or spare parts?

All parts on the Capacita can be bought at our online store at an affordable price. In case something happens to your bike, we’ve produced a selection of helpful video tutorials on how to fix the most common issues.

If I buy only the bike now and the campaign ends will I still be able to come back later (before the bike ships) and buy the accessories for the same price (pannier bags, front bag, extra battery, etc…)?

Yes, we will send out emails before your bike ships and offer last minute offers on our accessories and extra bikes as well.

Are you working on any other Capacita specific accessories?

Yes! We have a lot of cool accessories that we are developing now, and we will be offering these to all backers after the campaign ends but before your bikes ship. Currently, we are developing a railing system for the rear rack that will provide stability for children sitting on the rear deck. We are also working on a comfy rear rack deck pad for kids to sit on and a ring/handlebar that kids can hold onto while sitting on the deck pad.

How is the price so affordable?

We’re selling our cargo e-bike at a huge discount to guarantee we can start up production. We can sell Capacita at this affordable price, because you are buying directly from us, the manufacturer, and cutting out all intermediaries

Why is shipping so expensive to Europe?

There is a lot of uncertainty with new looming import regulations for importing electric bikes from China into the EU. The EU is currently threatening a new anti-dumping measure that would add a huge tax to all e-bikes imported from China into Europe and we need to tread lightly until this outstanding issue is resolved. If the anti-dumping duty does come into effect, then we will refund the difference collected on the high shipping costs.

How will the warranty be handled for people not in the US?

Overseas warranties will be routed through our local dealers and distributors. We'll still have you covered, wherever you are.

Why does the bike that is being ridden in the video look different than in the other photos of the bikes on the page?

We have been developing this bike for past 3 years and there have been many samples made and specs changed to better the ride and performance of the bike. Since we made the video 6 months ago, we have made the following exciting changes!


Rear hub motor (previous design had a front hub motor). The rear hub motors provides better control and a better feel of the power coming from the system. We also added a slightly larger battery to power the 350W motor.
Front and rear disc brakes (previous design had drum brakes). Disc brakes giving superior braking performance that is required when using an electric bike (especially one that is built to carry a lot of cargo!)


8 speed Sram trigger shifter gearing (previous design was a single speed bike). The combination of the 8 gears and the pedal assistance from the rear motor means you can always find the most efficient gear and pedal level to carry a lot of gear and go the distance!


Fat 24” x 2.35” WTB Thickslick tires. WTB opened a custom mold just for the Capacita and these fat tires are going to add a great look to the bike and make the ride extremely comfy.


Removable foot platforms. The foot platforms will allow for kids on the back of the bike to comfortably rest their feet. The platforms will also help with securing rear pannier bags.


Extended rear rack. This new design will allow for the rider to carry more gear (or children)!


Extended wheelbase. This new, slightly longer wheelbase will allow for larger riders to be comfortable on the bike.


New headtube design. The new headtube design now hides all motor cutoff cables and brake cables for a nice, clean look.

How long is the extended rear rack?

22.5"

How long are the foot platforms?

16.75" each

Does the Capacita contain motor cut off sensors on the brakes so that the motor can’t be engaged while braking?

Yes! We are all about safety.

What is the length of the wheel base? Will it fit on my car rack?

49" so the bike will fit in most car roof racks!

Why did you choose a your motor and how does compare to the RadWagon?

Capacita is using a 350W motor (instead of a 750w motor like RadWagon) and the power feels incredibly strong even with cargo included for the following reasons:

  • Capacita is approx. 20 lbs lighter than the RadWagon. The design is more streamlined - actually looks stylish :). A lighter bike can use a smaller and lighter motor.
  • Smaller 24” wheels take less power to turn and accelerate vs. 26” wheels on the RadWagon.
  • Capacita uses a torque sensor (vs a cadence sensor that rad power uses) to deliver power when it is necessary (when you actually need it - the more pressure put on the pedals, like going up a hill, the more power you will receive. Vs. a cadence sensor which gives you power the faster you push the pedals).
  • Capacita is pedal assist only so you are doing some of the work vs. RadWagon where most people are using a throttle (which takes more juice).
How can you see battery % level?

The battery % can be accessed three different ways: (1) via your phone app, (2) via lights on the battery casing, and (3) via a light on the on/off button on the downtube of the bike.

Can somebody easily steal the battery?

Nope! The battery comes with a key so you can lock it to the bike!

What is the total length of the bike?

74.5”

What is your refund policy?

We are subject to Indiegogo's refund policy.  Click here to read more about refunds.
story_txt:
CAPACITA is more than just a bike or a rider or a motor, it’s the seamless integration of all things “go” finished up with the features designed to make your two-wheeled life as simple and seamless as possible. From taking your kids to school, to hauling heavy cargo, to riding 40 miles without breaking a sweat, to the peace of mind that comes from GPS security tracking – our CAPACITA's packed with perks to keep you happy in the saddle.   If you are going to replace car trips with your electric bike shouldn’t it contain the same basic safety and convenience features as a car? We thought so too and that is why Capacita comes standard with integrated lights, space for cargo and storage, an integrated lock, and has power assist so you never arrive anywhere sweaty. The Capacita cargo bike rides just like a regular sized bike yet can handle big cargo loads with ease. Smart, safe, stylish, and comfortable, Capacita finally lets you leave your car in the garage.  From Palo Alto to San Francisco, from Brooklyn to the Bronx and back, with 40 miles of power your rides are no longer limited by your legs. Let your imagination plan your route and see where it takes you. 

 

Anti-theft GPS tracking so you’ll never lose your ride.
Theft is one of the worst things that can happen to a bike (and its rider). We integrated GPS tracking into the Capacita so even when it’s out of sight, it’s never out of mind and, if the unthinkable happens, you’ll be able to point the cops right to your ride.


 

Cargo for Days
We built this thing from the ground up with cargo in mind. What cargo? All of it! Kids, gear, kegs, cats, the whole nine yards. The racks can hold a total of 175 lbs so all your carrying needs are covered.

* Total Payload Capacity 300lbs


Room for everything and more
The high capacity front basket lets you load up your bike without sacrificing stability. With plenty of room for a briefcase, a case of beer, or all the stuff for setting up Steve’s surprise party – you can keep your back free of packs and still arrive with everything you need.
We even built an integrated lock holder!


 

Integrated automatic headlights and taillights activate at the first sign of low-light, and the automatic brake light helps keep you visible on the road, in traffic, and wherever your adventures take you. No hassle, no headaches, just illumination when you need it.


 

Don't have space or a plug in your garage? Worry not! You can remove the battery to charge up in your living room, office, or anywhere else.
 
The battery we're using is the high capacity Samsung 42V, 10Ah

Comfort is Key
We designed CAPACITA to be comfortable under any load. CAPACITA fits riders from 5' to 6'4" and we gave it an adjustable stem. Adjustable stems can give you a seemingly infinite number of riding positions. We recommend finding the one that feels best and sticking to that. Just a quick adjustment and you'll be on your way.

 

Precious cargo requires high quality stopping power in rain or shine. We're using high performance disc brakes to make sure that you can stop on a dime regardless of cargo or conditions.

 

Who needs a heavy front suspension? The CAPACITA sports super-wide 24x2.35 tires. That means you'll cruise off bumps, and cracks like they're not even there. It'll be like riding on a cloud.

 

Power where you need it
No complicated and ugly crank-drive, no clunky-transmission, just effortless power right where you need it. We test rode some front wheel motors currently on the market and couldn’t stand the way it affected steering and traction. Our rear-mounted motor keeps the bike balanced and delivers performance directly to the rear wheel, so it’s all “grip” and “go”, no hiccups or false starts. For CAPACITA, we're using the tried, tested, and true Bafang 350W motor.

 



 
Full Mechanical Specs:
Frame: Alloy Pure Cycles E-Cargo FrameFork: Pure Cycles alloy fork w/disc brake mountHeadset: 1 1/8" Threadless Semi-IntergratedCrankset: Alloy, 48t chainringBottom Bracket: Square taper sealed cartridge w/ integrated torque sensorPedals: 9/16 Alloy w/ tread insertsShifter: Sram X4 8 speed trigger shifterRear Derailleur: Sram X3Freewheel: Sram PG-820 11-32t cassetteChain: KMC X8.93Handlebar / Stem: Pure Cycles alloy bar / alloy adjustable stemGrips: SiliconeSaddle: Pure CyclesSeat Post: Micro adjust alloy, 27.2 x 350mmSeat Clamp: Alloy Quick-ReleaseWheelset: Pure Cycles 20mm hole rims w/  disc front hub; 42v/350w rear electric hubTires: WTB Thickslick 24 x 2.35Brakes: Tektro M-300 discBrake Lever: Tektro alloy 4-finger leverKickstand: Dual LegBell: Included
 
Electronics Specs
Samsung Battery - 42V, 10 Ah, 40 cells350W, 42V Rear Hub Bafang MotorIntegrated, Automatic Front and Rear LightsPayload Capacity: 300 lbs (rear rack: 175 lbs, running boards: 40 lbs per side)Class 1 E-Bike (assist only, speeds up 20 lbs)Range: 20-40 miles22.5" Cargo Rear Rack 16.75" Foot PlatformsTorque sensorCustom App IncludedMotor Cut Off Sensors (Safety)Key fobOn/off button on bike 
*While we don't expect anything major, all specs are subject to change.
 

 

We teamed up with some friends to bring you the coolest e-bike accessories we could find.
Outer Shell Adventure
Outer Shell stands against disposable culture and makes durable gear with a warranty. As a small two-person operation, they have a complete perspective from designing to testing to manufacturing. Each phase is given the same meticulous attention to detail. All products, except for the Dry Bags, are made in San Francisco, CA! The extra large pannier was created especially for the extended rear rack on the Capacita and you have the option to buy the bags as a set or only one side. The front bag fits the Capacita's front basket perfectly and is very useful for storing your small accessories (wallet, phone, keys, lights, food, dogs? etc...)

Thousand
As a long time cyclist, Gloria was never a fan of wearing a bicycle helmet. She thought they were too bulky, too “sci-fi”, too hard to lug around. But after losing a friend to a fatal bike accident, she knew she needed to change. 
;
Hiplok
All Hiplok locks are designed and developed in the UK by a small dedicated team of innovators and bike riders. From the patented adjustable belt fastening on their wearable chain locks to the CLIP + RIDE on the D-locks and ultra-reflectivity of the SUPERBRIGHT Series, they believe the small details make a big difference to the enjoyment of the ride. Their new DX E-Bike lock was developed with the e-bike specifically in mind as it is one of the strongest locks on the market and comes with both a chain and u-lock so that you can lock all parts of the bike.

 

Pure Cycles was founded with one sole mission: to get more people on bikes. For 7 years, Pure Cycles has designed, developed, and delivered over 150,000 of the coolest bikes on the market, around the world. It all began in a dorm room in Madison, Wisconsin, the founders looking out at bike racks below and wondering why there were so few bikes in general, and so few cool bikes, specifically. Asking around campus, the founders kept coming back to the same sticking points - people wanted to ride, but they wanted bikes that were simple, affordable, and (maybe most importantly) looked awesome.
Pure Fix Cycles was born to make the bikes younger generations were seeking. What began as a quest to make the perfect campus bike, expanded as did the company. The office moved to Los Angeles, the team grew, advocacy and charity became priorities, and the brand expanded internationally, and soon Pure Cycles had cultivated a large team of passionate bike riders and a loyal customer base.
Today, as Pure Cycles, the brand offers bikes that span several disciplines and occasions. Electric bikes, road bikes, commuter bikes, Pure Cycles is always cooking up new ideas because their community always find new places and ways to ride! From the successful Kickstarter to breathe life into their e-bike, the Volta, to the top-secret newness peeking over the next horizon, each and every development furthers their goal that started it all - to get more people on bikes.

After 4 years of studying Computer Science at Columbia, Jordan returned home ready to launch the bike business with his buds. Since then he’s overseen the tech side of things, building the website, turning Pure Cycles into one of the premier web-retailers in the bike space, and ensuring that our customer service is always the best in the industry. 

It was during Michael and Austin’s college career at UW Madison that they realized the shortage of cool, affordable bikes available on the market. When they returned to LA and launched Pure Cycles, Michael took the reins on all things fiscal. Crunching numbers, forecasting financials, and oiling the machine that would become the best bike company in the country has kept him busy (and happy) for the last 7 years.

With an eye for quality and an instinct for international relations, Austin is responsible for our production relationships, assembly facilities, and the logistics of running a worldwide enterprise out of a dorm room. We’ve come a long way since those early days and Austin’s been scaling up our operations with every new development to keep us on the top of our game. He's also wicked good at karaoke.


 
Warranty
Sweet new bike, same amazing warranty.
Just like the rest of our rides, Capacita's a bike we're proud to stand behind and know that you'll be proud to own. We're confident in our construction, design, and engineering - and you'll share that confidence with our 24-month warranty on all the electrical components, including the battery. This is a bike that'll keep you rolling for years, and if not, we'll make it right. Ride easy, we've got your back.  Plus, we warranty all of our bike frames and forks for life!
 
Risks and challenges
As a company, we thrive on challenges. We recognize that with the design, development, and introduction of any new product there are hurdles that we’ll face but, unlike most Indiegogo projects, we’ve been developing Capacita for 4 years prior to this roll out. We’ve also successfully designed, developed and deployed over 10 completely new models since our humble beginnings as a one-model bike company including VOLTA - The Smartest E-Bike ever.After 7 years and all of those rollouts (over 150,000 bikes!) we have a deep understanding of the sticking points in the process and a well-oiled machine for overcoming the obstacles that pop up along the way. We have wonderful relationships with our manufacturers, supply chain, and everybody involved in the process of bringing these bikes to fruition, so we’re confident in our ability to deliver, on time and as promised. We’re committed to making this process as transparent as possible to our supporters, so we’ll keep you in the loop regarding any and all developments, decisions, and possible delays, and we’re committed to our guarantee that these bikes will be rolling into people’s homes this year. We appreciate your support on this dream of ours, and we’re thrilled to have your help in making Capacita a reality.
 
Press? Check out our press kit! 
 
FAQs
 
If you could not find what you're looking for here, please email us at support@purecycles.com and/or leave us a comment on Indiegogo. We will get back to you ASAP!  What is Pedal Assist?  No throttles, no accelerator, just the motor seamlessly backing you up when you push the pedals. Your leg power is supplemented by the motor, every time your feet go around. Stop pedaling and the motor backs off too. Simple.  What sizes does it come in?  The Capacita comes in one size: perfect. 24" wheels help keep the bike low enough for smaller riders, and the adjustable seat post raises the saddle up for taller ones. Additionally, the adjustable stem allows for a rider of any height to feel upright and comfy. We've had test pilots from 5'0" to 6'4" cruise comfortably for miles.  Who is going to build this thing?  The bike will arrive 90% assembled and all that will be required to get the bike riding will be to put on the front wheel, the handlebar, the seat post and saddle, and the pedals. Simple! We do suggest that before your first ride you take the bike to your local bike shop to ensure the brakes are tuned properly and all bolts are tight!  Is the bike waterproof?  You know it! Well, it's weatherproof. Rainproof. You can't ride along the bottom of the ocean, or take it in the pool, but if there's water in the sky or on the road, you'll pedal on just fine.  What is the weight limit on the front rack?  Your imagination*, plus 45 pounds.*Your imagination, while limitless, weighs nothing.  Does the bike come standard with the front basket and the extended rear rack?  Yes, it does! They are both included!  How much noise does Capacita make?  That depends on how loudly you go, "Weeeeeeee!". The chain drive makes a bit more noise (chainy sounds and freewheel clicks when you coast, just like an ordinary bike), but these aren't mopeds - you won't wake the neighbors.  What's the motor's top speed?  20 mph! For legal reasons, the power on the bike will tap out at 20 mph but you can, of course, pedal faster to push beyond that 20mph limit. This is a class 1 e-bike (only type that is legal in NYC!).  What brand is the motor?  BAFANG, a leading manufacturer of e-mobility components.  Why did you choose a 350W motor?  Because 250W just didn’t feel like enough “oomph” with the added cargo that Capacita is built to lug around. 350W provides plenty of power while still hitting our goals for weight, appearance, and affordability.  What's the weight limit on the Capacita?  275 lbs  What is the total payload capacity for the bike?  350 lbs  How much weight can the rear rack hold?  175 lbs  How much weight can each side platform running boards hold?  Up to 40 lbs per side  Does the Capacita come with a kickstand?  Yes! It is a dual leg kickstand.  How long will the battery last before it needs replacing?  Battery life depends on use and conditions and, even with proper care, rechargeable batteries won't last forever. Conservatively, our Li-Ion battery will last about 500–750 cycles.A partial charge/ discharge counts fractionally against those numbers; so running the battery down halfway then recharging it completely uses up one half of a charge cycle.“End of useful life” refers to the point at which a battery can no longer supply 70% of its original rated capacity in ampere- hours. After this point, the aging process will accelerate and the battery will need to be replaced.So, it'll depend on how often you ride and charge - but expect more than 500 charge cycles before you need to stress about batteries.  How does Capacita get 40 miles of range?  The short answer is science.The long answer is, thanks to its light weight and 24" wheels, acceleration doesn't require the huge spikes in power you'll need on other e-rides. The pedal-assist system, high-quality torque sensor, and high-quality controller mean there's no wasted power when you don't need it. And, lastly, our development of adaptive power modes means the bike sips from the battery as needed.The results of all that engineering elbow-grease is an e-bike that can roll for 40 miles in eco-mode and 20+ miles in power-mode. This bikes got a big brain for a reason.  What colors does the Capacita come in?  Initially, matte black, silver, and hi-vis yellow. When we hit our goal, though, we may be able to roll out more!  How is pedal assist adjusted and can you describe the experience of the "levels" of pedal assist as it relates to battery life, range, and the feel of the ride (e.g. going up a hill, pedaling from a stop position, etc)?  As you pedal, the motor senses the force you're applying (thanks to the torque-sensor in the bottom bracket) and supplements your effort by powering the rear wheel. The amount of electric backup the motor provides will depend on your power mode (bike, eco, or power).In terms of battery use vs. power, the more support you use, the more battery you'll use too. That adjustment is made by selecting the power mode that's right for your ride. Power mode:Feels like: "Push the pedals and just fly!"Range: We tested a bit over 20 milesEco Mode:Feels like: "Wow, I don't remember my commute being this easy, I should ride every day!"Range: We tested a bit over 40 milesBike Mode:Feels like: "Just like riding a bike."Range: As far as your legs will take you  Can you remove the front basket?  Yes!  Where is your store? I live in LA and would love to test drive the prototype.  Awesome! Our HQ is in Burbank at 713 N. Victory Blvd, 91502If you're interested in a test ride, please contact us at support@purecycles.com and we'll set something up for you!  Does this bike have gears? Why does an electric bike need gears?  The bike has 8 gears with the 1x8 Sram trigger shifter setup. Electric bikes should have gears because although the electric motor takes away much of the strain, it is still useful to have gears whenever you decide to pedal while cruising, trying to get more exercise, carry more gear, or extend your range. The combination of the 8 gears and the pedal assistance from the rear motor means you can always find the most efficient gear and pedal level to carry a lot of gear and go the distance!  Is the app for iOS only or is there also going to be an Android app as well?  The app will work for both iOS and Android  Will the bike be able to support attaching various kid bike trailers (both the ones that attach at the wheel and seat post)?  It'll really depend on the spec of the trailer/tow-along. Seatpost mounted trailers should work just fine, but the wheel mounted ones will come down to the trailers' mounting set-up, how much axle they need, whether the mount inside or outside the dropout, etc...We'll be sure to try some out to figure out what plays nicely and what doesn't once we've got some in shops (and places that have various styles of trailers).  How much will a replacement battery cost?  New batteries will cost $399.  Is it possible to check how much battery is left?  Yep! The phone app will show you much charge you have left, so you can ride comfortably knowing you'll make it all the way home!  Are you guys setting up the GPS with every country? Or do we do it ourselves?  We've got it all worked out so all you'll need to worry about is where you want to ride! The GPS/anti-theft stuff is all worked out on our end, wherever you are in the world.  Is it possible to ride Capacita if I forgot my phone one day by accident or lost it?  Absolutely! The bike is still operable via the fob that will come with every bike (think of it like your car keys).  Will the bike have a firmware updates? i.e. Optimize battery/engine usage in different modes, release create new modes, etc…  Yup! We'll be improving the software right along with the hardware and we'll push updates out to riders so everyone can enjoy an improved experience!  How easy is it to adjust the seat up and down, are any tools needed?  Super easy and just like a standard bike! You'll need an allen key to loosen (and re-tighten) the seat post collar, then just raise or lower the saddle to your desired height!  Is it possible to turn on the lights manually without the auto light sensor kicking in?  Yes! Or you can let them do their thing automatically when the road gets dark! Great question! We recommend using a chain and U-lock combination like the Hiplok E-DX that we are offering as one of the perks. The noose chain and DX shackle combine to give you extended locking options and maximum protection. For a technique breakdown, check out this "how to lock up your ride" post we wrote up a few years ago! ( https://www.purecycles.com/blogs/bicycle-news/9...). In the US and worldwide it'll be about $49 per year, but we're working hard on getting that number down! We plan to give our backers a couple months free in the beginning :)  Would a baby bike seat or bike trailer work with the Capacita? — If so, are there any types of baby seats or preferred brands/models that would work better?  Yes! We designed the extended rear rack so that two child seats can fit but we can’t yet confirm if this will be possible yet.We love the Thule Yepp Maxi seats! Above you'll see our overall locking recommendations, and when it comes to the front wheel you'll just want something to secure it to the frame or a stable/permanent fixture.If you lock your rear wheel and frame to the bike rack, then you can use your second lock to secure the front wheel to the frame or the front wheel to the bike rack! For wheel to frame, you're probably looking at a chain lock to give you the reach. For wheel to rack a u-lock will work just fine!  What plugs are provided for charging? Is it only American, would I need an adapter?  Capacita will plug into the wall and charge from a 110V (US) or 220V (International) outlet and it'll ship with the standard plug of your country, so you shouldn't need an adapter!  Does Capacita have a red rear reflector?  All our bikes ship with reflectors in the box so you can hit the road legally and the Capacita will be no exception! They don't look very cool in photos, so they're not on the prototype, but you can mount yours right on the seatpost, or wherever you prefer to have it pointing behind you.Capacita also has the integrated and automatic taillight, and that'll provide even better rear visibility than a reflector.  What's the power output on the motor?  350 Watts  Will we void our warranty if we paint our bikes?  That's kind of a tough one. If you take a brush and put some paint on the frame, that shouldn't have any effect on the bike and you'll still be fine. If you (or a paint shop) take the bike apart, paint it, and can't put it back together or damage something in the process, that wouldn't be covered. Basically, you'll just want to be careful and not damage the components or electronics. For most people, that'll just mean not trying to paint the bike, but if you've got the chops to do it without any damage, there shouldn't be a problem putting some paint on there!  How will the warranty be handled for people not in the US?  Overseas warranties will be routed through our local dealers and distributors. We'll still have you covered, wherever you are.  What is the warranty policy?  24-month warranty on all electrical parts (motor, battery, etc..) and lifetime warranty on frame and fork.  Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties, or VAT?  The backer is responsible.  How much is the shipping fee?  The shipping cost is different for each model and each country. Please refer to the perk details.  Will I be able to buy replacement parts or spare parts?  All parts on the Capacita can be bought at our online store at an affordable price. In case something happens to your bike, we’ve produced a selection of helpful video tutorials on how to fix the most common issues.  If I buy only the bike now and the campaign ends will I still be able to come back later (before the bike ships) and buy the accessories for the same price (pannier bags, front bag, extra battery, etc…)?  Yes, we will send out emails before your bike ships and offer last minute offers on our accessories and extra bikes as well.  Are you working on any other Capacita specific accessories?  Yes! We have a lot of cool accessories that we are developing now, and we will be offering these to all backers after the campaign ends but before your bikes ship. Currently, we are developing a railing system for the rear rack that will provide stability for children sitting on the rear deck. We are also working on a comfy rear rack deck pad for kids to sit on and a ring/handlebar that kids can hold onto while sitting on the deck pad.  How is the price so affordable?  We’re selling our cargo e-bike at a huge discount to guarantee we can start up production. We can sell Capacita at this affordable price, because you are buying directly from us, the manufacturer, and cutting out all intermediaries  Why is shipping so expensive to Europe?  There is a lot of uncertainty with new looming import regulations for importing electric bikes from China into the EU. The EU is currently threatening a new anti-dumping measure that would add a huge tax to all e-bikes imported from China into Europe and we need to tread lightly until this outstanding issue is resolved. If the anti-dumping duty does come into effect, then we will refund the difference collected on the high shipping costs.  How will the warranty be handled for people not in the US?  Overseas warranties will be routed through our local dealers and distributors. We'll still have you covered, wherever you are.  Why does the bike that is being ridden in the video look different than in the other photos of the bikes on the page?  
We have been developing this bike for past 3 years and there have been many samples made and specs changed to better the ride and performance of the bike. Since we made the video 6 months ago, we have made the following exciting changes!
Rear hub motor (previous design had a front hub motor). The rear hub motors provides better control and a better feel of the power coming from the system. We also added a slightly larger battery to power the 350W motor.Front and rear disc brakes (previous design had drum brakes). Disc brakes giving superior braking performance that is required when using an electric bike (especially one that is built to carry a lot of cargo!)
8 speed Sram trigger shifter gearing (previous design was a single speed bike). The combination of the 8 gears and the pedal assistance from the rear motor means you can always find the most efficient gear and pedal level to carry a lot of gear and go the distance!
Fat 24” x 2.35” WTB Thickslick tires. WTB opened a custom mold just for the Capacita and these fat tires are going to add a great look to the bike and make the ride extremely comfy.
Removable foot platforms. The foot platforms will allow for kids on the back of the bike to comfortably rest their feet. The platforms will also help with securing rear pannier bags.
Extended rear rack. This new design will allow for the rider to carry more gear (or children)!
Extended wheelbase. This new, slightly longer wheelbase will allow for larger riders to be comfortable on the bike.
New headtube design. The new headtube design now hides all motor cutoff cables and brake cables for a nice, clean look.
  How long is the extended rear rack?  22.5"  How long are the foot platforms?  16.75" each  Does the Capacita contain motor cut off sensors on the brakes so that the motor can’t be engaged while braking?  Yes! We are all about safety.  What is the length of the wheel base? Will it fit on my car rack?  49" so the bike will fit in most car roof racks!  Why did you choose a your motor and how does compare to the RadWagon?  
Capacita is using a 350W motor (instead of a 750w motor like RadWagon) and the power feels incredibly strong even with cargo included for the following reasons:

Capacita is approx. 20 lbs lighter than the RadWagon. The design is more streamlined - actually looks stylish :). A lighter bike can use a smaller and lighter motor.
Smaller 24” wheels take less power to turn and accelerate vs. 26” wheels on the RadWagon.
Capacita uses a torque sensor (vs a cadence sensor that rad power uses) to deliver power when it is necessary (when you actually need it - the more pressure put on the pedals, like going up a hill, the more power you will receive. Vs. a cadence sensor which gives you power the faster you push the pedals).
Capacita is pedal assist only so you are doing some of the work vs. RadWagon where most people are using a throttle (which takes more juice).

  How can you see battery % level?  The battery % can be accessed three different ways: (1) via your phone app, (2) via lights on the battery casing, and (3) via a light on the on/off button on the downtube of the bike. Can somebody easily steal the battery? Nope! The battery comes with a key so you can lock it to the bike!  What is the total length of the bike?  74.5”  What is your refund policy?  We are subject to Indiegogo's refund policy.   Click here to read more about refunds.

story:
Our minds support us everyday in making clear decisions and bring us control in our lives. Sadly, Alzheimer's disease strips individuals of that ability as it deteriorates the brain from the earliest to the severe stages of the disease.

Sigma Alpha Mu has come to raise money to support the Alzheimer's Association through The Judy Fund. Chabad U of M has also welcomed this fundraiser, and graciously put their support behind the Alzheimer's Association. Chabad has been a cornerstone in supporting the Jewish community and Jewish life on the University of Minnesota campus. With the hope to cure Alzheimer's disease, Sigma Alpha Mu and Chabad U of M have teamed up to support the research, care and advocacy efforts of those suffering with Alzheimer's disease.

Our unique fundraiser will peak on May 3rd at the Bike-4-Judy event in Minneapolis. Bike-4-Judy is a 15-mile bike ride that will bring together the University of Minnesota community members, local families, and biking enthusiasts to actively battle this debilitating disease that affects loved ones everywhere.

Proceeds will go to support The Judy Fund and Chabad U of M.

story:
HiMo H1 is the ultimate versatile e-bike – its cutting-edge foldable design makes it easy to carry and fits in a car, train, or even a backpack!

Thanks to its compact folding capabilities, you can conveniently bring your HiMo with you wherever you go.

We put the rider first with every design consideration – after 2 years of extensive research and development (and after many adjustments and moldings) – HiMo H1 is carefully crafted to perfectly complement its rider, both folded or unfolded. 

When folded, HiMo takes the shape of easy-to-carry box and when let loose is built to suit any rider’s posture, height, and body frame.

Padded Mesh Seat for ensured lasting comfort on every type of journey.

Foldable Handles allow for both compact transportability and a safe, sturdy ride.

Foldable Foot Pedals that easily snap into place when you're ready to ride.

 

We wanted to bring our riders the safest and most enjoyable e-bike riding experience possible, so we have equipped HiMo with the most robust materials we could find. HiMo H1's durable aluminum alloy frame, responsive digital braking system, and shock absorbent 7-inch tires ensure a safe, smooth, and comfortable ride. 

HiMo’s seamlessly welded aluminum alloy frame ensures durability on even the toughest of journeys. Combined with its scratch-proof paint, you needn't worry about denting or dinging it - it's sure to stand the test of time! 

HiMo’s Crystal Clear LED Display is user-friendly and easy to control – enabling the rider to quickly Power the Vehicle On/Off, Change Speeds, and turn the Headlights On/Off. 

HiMo H1's Display keeps track of your Speed, Battery Status, and Headlight Settings.

Control Power, Speed, and Headlight Settings with the tap of a button.

7-Inch Cushioned, Shock-absorbent Tires for Maximum Protection and Smooth Riding.

HiMo is equipped with a 180W brushless DC motor, rear-wheel drive, and an incredibly stable power system. 

Ride at full power for up to 30km on HiMo’s 7500mAh energy-efficient battery. 

HiMo’s user friendly removable battery is extremely easy to charge and maintain and at just 1.8kg, the battery is convenient for anyone to insert and remove.

HiMo goes with you everywhere, is environmentally friendly, and is an absolute joy to ride. 

Ideal for daily work commutes, cross country traveling, and exploring urban areas – we sincerely hope that HiMo H1 proves to be everything you want from your folding e-bike.

As with every part of HiMo we strived to make sure the battery is not only smart and long-lasting, but that it can stand anything you throw at it. With all of our power-protection features, you can rest assured that your HiMo's battery will last for years to come! 

We were very happy to win the German Reddot 2019 Award. Receiving such recognition really does help motivate us to continue making innovative products, that can really help make a difference in the world!

You can take advantage of our Super Early Bird discount price to start your journey as soon as HiMo H1 launches. Of course, exploration on the road is even more pleasant with a partner – so we are offering a 2 HiMo bike Super Early Bird discount package as well. 

 

Shanghai HiMo Electric Technology specializes in the research, development and production of two-wheeled electric vehicles! We strive to provide the best comprehensive digital solutions for green, urban mobility. Our aim is to give people a smart and convenient way of getting around, all while having more fun!

With a rise in consumers needs, HiMo has been at the forefront of leading the vast tech and digital solutions that are allowing us to create limitless opportunities. We’re committed to setting the trend in smart, eco-friendly vehicles, and to be the leading brand in the two-wheeler vehicle industry! 

Every part of HiMo is carefully crafted; with over 200 parts, 40 molds and countless adjustments we've gone through countless iterations in the past two years. With every adjustment, every mold and every new part we kept improving the HiMo that no detail too small has been overlooked. 

 

 

 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

1. What does our scooter come with?

1 Charger + 1 Standard Kit + 1 Instruction Card + 1 Warranty Card + 1 Certification

2. How's the battery life? How is it guaranteed?

80% capacity after 500 cycles, 1500 charge times + original warranty 18 months, 3 years battery life.

3. What is the warranty and after sales service for electric scooters?

18 Months Battery Warranty; Controller, main wiring harness, frame charger: 12 months warranty; Instrument, headlamp, rotating brake handle, 6 months warranty; Fragile parts, artificial reasons do not include the scope of warranty

4. Are the motor frame and battery sealed and waterproof?

Both motor and battery are sealed, and they are splashproof.

5. Are there different plug types for different countries and regions?

Himo H1 will have US, UK, EU and CN plugs to meet the specific needs of different regions

6. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

we cover all additional taxes, duties or VAT, you only need pay for shipping fee.

7. Can I bring this on the plane?

The batteries is removable so you may remove the batteries and check in the e-bike. The batteries could be send to your destination via post.

story:
I visited Glasgow in December for Christmas Shopping and received three 'bus lane' enforcement charges within one hour whilst looking for somewhere to park.

I never saw any signs and see that many others have had similar issues in Glasgow and in Cities throughout the UK.

If you have received a charge like this or would like to try and put a stop to them then please support this campaign.

story:
Visit www.babelbike.com/discounts for more details!


 

        














Babel Electric Motor Model

Electric Motor

Shimano STEPS 250W w/Start mode automatic downshift

Battery

High capacity Shimano Li-ion 36v, 11.6Ah, approx. recharge time 4 hours

Gears

Shimano 11 sp internal gear hub

Gear range

409%

Shifting

Shimano Di2 Electric w/computer display

Crankset

Shimano STEPS lightweight alloy

Chainring

Shimano STEPS steel 44T

Pedals

Composite Platform with reflectors

Brakes

Shimano Hydraulic

Wheel rims/spokes

Alloy 36H, Mavic rim rear/DT Swiss stainless steel

Tyres

Continental Contact 2/e Contact

Safety

ASC Advanced Safety Cell, Foot Protection System

Lighting

Ride on automatic light system

Security Pack

Kryptonite D lock, PinHead © security nuts, SmartWater © marking, entry in company database 

Other

Alloy kickstand, front/rear and wheel reflectors, phone holder and USB charger

Prices and specifications liable to change without notice

Babel Non-Electric Model

Gears

Shimano Alfine 8 sp internal gear hub

Gear range

307%

Shifting

Shimano Alfine 8 sp Rapidfire Plus w/optical gear indicator

Crankset

Shimano Alfine lightweight alloy

Chainring

Shimano Alfine alloy 39T

Pedals

Composite Platform with reflectors

Brakes

Shimano Hydraulic

Wheel rims/spokes

Alloy 36H, Mavic rim rear/DT Swiss stainless steel

Tyres

Continental Contact 2/e Contact

Safety

ASC Advanced Safety Cell, Foot Protection System

Lighting

Ride on automatic light system

Security Pack

Kryptonite D lock, PinHead © security nuts, SmartWater © marking, entry in company database

Other

Alloy kickstand, front/rear and wheel reflectors, phone holder

Prices and specifications liable to change without notice


The Babel Bikes are built throughout with high quality components including Shimano Steps motor, with Di2 gear change (Babel Electric bikes only), Alphine Hub gears and Hydraulic disk brakes. They are also fitted with a lot of components that most bikes don't even have, such as a custom made seat, wing mirrors, indicators, hazard flashers, seat belts, auto-alarm system etc. And of course included in the cost is the price of all the safety tests - features that are unique to the Babel. So in short, the Babel Bikes may not be the cheapest bikes on the market - they are, however, the safest. And for Indiegogo buyers there are BIG savings to be made whilst the campaign is running (up to £500 off) whilst UK income tax payers (in regular employment) can benefit further from the UK Govts Cycle to Work Scheme' - see www.babelbike.com/discounts for full details, then come back to THIS page and buy the '£103 Perk' to secure this option. Alternatively you can purchase the '£104' option  to help spread the payments - again, see details at www.babelbike.com/discounts and then return to THIS page to place your order.


On launch the Babel Bike will be availble in a range of colours - from bright yellow to cool blue. You will be able to specify your personal choice prior to delivery.


We aim to deliver our Babel Bikes to our first customers in May 2016 and have created a detailed schedule in order for this to occur. Our team are experienced members of the cycle industry and between them have created hundreds of thousands of bicycles before. We have highly experienced manufacturing partners and factories in China and Taiwan lined up already. There is of course much work to do in the year ahead, but we have a first class team and will keep you fully posted on progress over the course of the coming year. The Babel Bike has two international patents pending.



Any questions? We're always happy to chat. Call us at our London office on (+ 44) 020 3287 5994.  (9am in New York time is 2pm London time).

With thanks to H.E Services, Diggerland and Green Man and Van for their kind help with our safety testing.

story:
WELCOME TO OUR FAMILY!!

A HIGH PERFORMANCE BIKE THAT HAS EVER BEEN BUILD IN THE WORLD!


             

                             

                                                                               


PASSIONATE,DEDICATION,EFFORT,PERSISTENCE & FAMILY all are components that help build the QUADRACYCLE of what it is today!

Help me spread this joy WITH ALL of YOU! Of the birth of a revolutionize bicycle that would revolution the bicycle industry! The Quadracycle! A NEW Patent technology:

INTERNATIONAL PATENT


THE QUADRACYCLE! A MULTI-TASKER! NOTHING BEFORE SEEN! NOTHING TO COMPARE AT! ONE AND ONLY! FOR THE PEOPLE! AND for EVERYONE who wants to enjoy a good cycling fun!

THE  Quadracycle is designed to be unique! One of a kind then most regular bicycles. Designed to be different,durable,powerful, all muscle and FUN!




THE WORLD'S most advance patent technology in the bicycle industry! It enables any person skill of art to make or use the invention!

A MULTI-TASKER! THE FOUR wheels may provide stability to carry gear such as surfboard or other sporting equipment, grocery or even a second rider on the quadracycle!


        " # 1 QUADRACYCLE OF THE WORLD!" 


          "BABY IN THE COMFORT ZONE!"

  "SAFE BABY ON BOARD!"

  EVEN WITH SPEED YOUR BABY WOULD BE SAFE! 


Who I am.

Hello everyone! My name is RJ Jimenez. My passion of cycling had drove me to the next level. When I ride my bicycle I felt free. I felt like freedom embraced me each time I give in. However, that was not enouph. I wanted to give in more and then a sudden though appeared before me. What if I can extend that freedom and feel more free. What if I can lift up my arms without balancing my entire body while riding a bicycle. What if I can feel the fresh breeze of the air be more fresh and strong. Ever since then the thought did not left me. I did not slept. I did not focus. All I though was I had to do something. Not just for me but for EVERYONE. What does the world need I keep asking myself. I found an aluminium tube at work and keep taping the tube in my arm for months. I could not rest until I found the reason why. I FOUND it! I did not slept. The night sleep had left me. I work all night till 6 am at the prototype and at 7 am I had to work on my normal job. After 5 years of hard work, Testing and design it; I had finish it! I felt ALIVE!


The Impact

RJ 4 MACHINE IS READY TO IMPACT THE CYCLING COMMUNITY AND CHANGE THE WAY YOU RIDE! A POWERFUL AND MOST ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY HAS EVER BEEN CREATED!

IN DEPTH, AND COMPONENTS

 

                        THE FACE


THE FACE:

 A UNIQUE DESIGN THAT IS COMPLETELY DIFFERENT THAN STANDARD BICYCLES. MAKING IT UNIQUE AND HAVING A FACE FOR STABILITY AND PERFECT PERFORMANCE. A MOST ADVANCE TECHNOLOGY!

1.ALUMINIUM ALLOY 

2. STRONG, DOUBLE SUSPENSION 

3. DURABLE 

4. SPECIAL UNIQUE PATENT DESIGN

5.ALL MUSCLE


       TIRES / RIMS


TIRES AND RIMS:

ALL TERRAIN TIRES! 

ALUMINIUM ALLOY RIMS

TIRES 24 X 2.10



                         RJ 4 MACHINE SHOCKS

1)DO YOU SHIP WORLDWIDE?

NEED QUOTE. WANT SLOW BOAT.

 8) DOES MY PURCHASE HAS GUARANTEE?
YES YOUR QUADRACYCLE IS COVER FOR UP TO 6 MONTHS ONLY FRAME. ALTHOUGH THE FRAME IS COVER THAT IS IF IT GET BROKEN. YOU WILL RECEIVE A GUARANTEE FOR THAT.
9)WHEN WOULD I BE ABLE TO CHOOSE THE COLOR I WANT FOR THE QUADRACYCLE?
AT THE END OF THE CAMPAING. WE WOULD GIVE YOU A SURVEY AND THEN YOU WILL BE ABLE TO CHOOSE THE COLOR YOU WANT.
10) WHEN WOULD I RECEIVE MY PURCHASE?
ON MAY 2016 SHIPPING WOULD BEGIN AND DEPANDING OF WHERE YOU ARE LOCATED.THE DESTINED,ARRIVAL OF YOUR PURCHASE WOULD VARY DEPENDING ON YOUR SHIPPING ADDRESS.
11) IS MADE IN USA?
YES! ITS MADE AND ASSEMBLED IN USA!

Help me spread this joy WITH ALL of YOU! Of the birth of a revolutionize bicycle that would revolution the bicycle industry! The Quadracycle! A NEW Patent technology:
INTERNATIONAL PATENT




THE QUADRACYCLE! A MULTI-TASKER! NOTHING BEFORE SEEN! NOTHING TO COMPARE AT! ONE AND ONLY! FOR THE PEOPLE! AND for EVERYONE who wants to enjoy a good cycling fun!
THE  Quadracycle is designed to be unique! One of a kind then most regular bicycles. Designed to be different,durable,powerful, all muscle and FUN!





THE WORLD'S most advance patent technology in the bicycle industry! It enables any person skill of art to make or use the invention!

A MULTI-TASKER! THE FOUR wheels may provide stability to carry gear such as surfboard or other sporting equipment, grocery or even a second rider on the quadracycle!





        " # 1 QUADRACYCLE OF THE WORLD!" 

          "BABY IN THE COMFORT ZONE!"




  "SAFE BABY ON BOARD!"
  EVEN WITH SPEED YOUR BABY WOULD BE SAFE! 


Who I am.


Hello everyone! My name is RJ Jimenez. My passion of cycling had drove me to the next level. When I ride my bicycle I felt free. I felt like freedom embraced me each time I give in. However, that was not enouph. I wanted to give in more and then a sudden though appeared before me. What if I can extend that freedom and feel more free. What if I can lift up my arms without balancing my entire body while riding a bicycle. What if I can feel the fresh breeze of the air be more fresh and strong. Ever since then the thought did not left me. I did not slept. I did not focus. All I though was I had to do something. Not just for me but for EVERYONE. What does the world need I keep asking myself. I found an aluminium tube at work and keep taping the tube in my arm for months. I could not rest until I found the reason why. I FOUND it! I did not slept. The night sleep had left me. I work all night till 6 am at the prototype and at 7 am I had to work on my normal job. After 5 years of hard work, Testing and design it; I had finish it! I felt ALIVE!




The Impact
RJ 4 MACHINE IS READY TO IMPACT THE CYCLING COMMUNITY AND CHANGE THE WAY YOU RIDE! A POWERFUL AND MOST ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY HAS EVER BEEN CREATED!

FOR THE CONTRIBUTION OF $25 + SHIPPING YOU WILL RECEIVE (1) 20 X 30 POSTER. A MUST HAVE POSTER FOR AN EVERY QUADRACYCLE FANATATIC. DISPLAY IT AT YOUR STORE, DISPLAY IT AT YOUR HOME. ENJOY IT EVERY TIME YOU SEE IT. BUY IT FOR YOU OR GIVE IT AS A GIFT TO SOMEONE. 

~6TH PERK






RJ 4 MACHINE POSTER TO THE BEACH




FOR THE CONTRIBUTION OF $25 + SHIPPING YOU WILL RECEIVE (1) 20 X 30 POSTER. A MUST HAVE POSTER FOR AN EVERY QUADRACYCLE FANATATIC. DISPLAY IT AT YOUR STORE, DISPLAY IT AT YOUR HOME. ENJOY IT EVERY TIME YOU SEE IT. BUY IT FOR YOU OR GIVE IT AS A GIFT TO SOMEONE. 

~7TH PERK
FOR CONTRIBUTION OF $ 50,
YOU WILL RECEIVE:



 (2) RJ 4 MACHINE POSTERS
RJ 4 MACHINE POSTER AND RJ 4 MACHINE THE BEACH
FOR CONTRIBUTION OF $50+ SHIPPING. YOU WILL RECEIVE (2) RJ 4 MACHINE POSTERS: RJ 4 MACHINE AND RJ 4 MACHINE THE BEACH. A GREAT POSTER TO DISPLAY AT YOUR STORE, TO DISPLAY AT YOUR HOME. GREAT KEEPSAKE! GREAT GIFT FOR YOU OR FOR SOMEONE ELSE!


~8TH PERK
FOR CONTRIBUTION OF $ 39+ SHIPPING


FOR THE CONTRIBUTION OF $39+ SHIPPING.
 WOW! EYE CATCHING CAP!  YOU WILL RECEIVE AN OFFICIAL RJ 4 MACHINE CAP. A ONE SIZE FITS MOST! WITH THE BEAUTIFUL LOGO OF RJ 4 MACHINE. BE PART OF THE TEAM FAMILY AS YOU SHOW OFF A UNIQUE CAP THAT REPRESENTS A UNIQUE PRODUCT! THE QUADRACYCLE!
AVAILABLE IN DIFFERENT COLORS: BLACK AND WHITE


~9TH PERK



FOR CONTRIBUTION OF $ 47 +SHIPPING
IT'S OFFICIAL, YOUR PART OF THE TEAM FAMILY! PERFECT WEAR WITH BEAUTIFUL LOGO OF RJ 4 MACHINE! THIS IS A MUST HAVE AND OFFICIAL WEAR OF THE RJ 4 MACHINE. SHOW OFF YOUR SHIRT AND BE PROUD! BE PART OF THE TEAM FAMILY! AND ENJOY A NICE SHIRT OF A NEW PRODUCT ON MARKET! MAKE YOUR VOICE SHAKE THE EARTH AND SHOW OFF THIS SHIRT WITH YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY! ABSOLUTELY AWESOME! 







Questions and Answers.


1)DO YOU SHIP WORLDWIDE?

YES, WE NOW SHIP WORLDWIDE! LEAVE A COMMENT TO WHERE YOU ARE LOCATED AT AND WE WILL ADD A PERK AS INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING WITH YOUR SHIPPING QUOTE. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING PRICE VARIES PER COUNTRY. WE WILL GET BACK TO YOU AND ASK YOU TO PURCHASE YOUR SHIPPING. FOR INTERNATIONAL BUYERS ONLY.
EXAMPLE:
I AM JOHN AND LOCATED AT INDIA
NEED QUOTE. WANT SLOW BOAT.

2) I AM LOCATED OUTSIDE OF USA. HOW LONG WOULD I RECEIVE MY PURCHASE? 

ON MAY 2016 SHIPPING PROCESS WOULD BEGIN AND FOR INTERNATIONAL BUYER, WE WOULD SHIP IT VIA SLOW BOAT FOR SHIPPING TO BE A GOOD PRICE FOR THE CUSTOMERS AND CHEAPER. ALTHOUGH IT MAY TAKE UP TO 30-45 DAYS TO PORT ON DESTINED COUNTY. IF YOU WOULD LIKE AIR SHIPMENT THERE WOULD BE A PERK WITH A DIFFERENT COST FOR YOU IF YOU WOULD NOT WANT TO WAIT AN ADDITIONAL 30-45 DAYS.
2)CAN I LOCALLY PICK UP MY QUADRACYCLE?

YES! WHEN I AM READY I WILL LET EVERYONE KNOW OF WHERE THEY CAN PICK THEIR QUADRACYCLE LOCALLY.
3) CAN I DRIVE MY QUADRACYCLE IN NEW YORK?

YES! HOWEVER, DONT DRIVE IN THE SIDEWALK IN NEW YORK.
4) DOES IT FIT TO DRIVE IN THE SIDEWALK?

YES YOU CAN DRIVE IN THE SIDEWALK BUT MAY THE PEDESTRIANS HAVE THE FIRST PRIORITY.
5) CAN THE BIKE RANK CARRY MY QUADRACYCLE IN MY CAR?

YES! IT CAN!. WE WILL UPDATE PICTURES IN A FEW DAYS OF THE QUADRACYCLE IN A BIKE RANK. ALSO WE WOULD HAVE AN AVAILABLE QUAD RANK FOR THE QUADRACYCLES. 
6) HOW MUCH DOES IT WEIGHT?

IT WEIGHTS APPROXIMATE 55 OR 65 POUNDS OR MORE. IT ALL OF THE TIRES OR EXTRAS COMPONENTS THAT YOU CAN ADDAPT TO THE QUADRACYCLE. 
7) CAN IT CARRY MY SURFBOARD ON THE QUADRACYCLE?

YES! YOU CAN ADAPT YOUR SURF BIKE RANK IN THE QUADRACYCLE. WE WOULD UPDATE PICTURES WITH THE BIKE SURF RANK ON THE QUADRACYCLE.
 8) DOES MY PURCHASE HAS GUARANTEE?

YES YOUR QUADRACYCLE IS COVER FOR UP TO 6 MONTHS ONLY FRAME. ALTHOUGH THE FRAME IS COVER THAT IS IF IT GET BROKEN. YOU WILL RECEIVE A GUARANTEE FOR THAT.
9)WHEN WOULD I BE ABLE TO CHOOSE THE COLOR I WANT FOR THE QUADRACYCLE?

AT THE END OF THE CAMPAING. WE WOULD GIVE YOU A SURVEY AND THEN YOU WILL BE ABLE TO CHOOSE THE COLOR YOU WANT.
10) WHEN WOULD I RECEIVE MY PURCHASE?

ON MAY 2016 SHIPPING WOULD BEGIN AND DEPANDING OF WHERE YOU ARE LOCATED.THE DESTINED,ARRIVAL OF YOUR PURCHASE WOULD VARY DEPENDING ON YOUR SHIPPING ADDRESS.
11) IS MADE IN USA?

YES! ITS MADE AND ASSEMBLED IN USA!
12)HOW WOULD YOU GUARANTEE THAT I WOULD RECEIVE MY PURCHASE OF THE PERK I HAD CONTRIBUTE?

THE RJ 4 MACHINE HAS A GREAT TEAM! WE ALSO HAVE GREAT FRIENDS WHO CAN HELP US AND MAKE THE MANUFACTURE PROCESS BE MUCH EASIER AND  HELP US FULFILL THE PERKS! 


Other Ways You Can Help

WE THANK YOU FOR ALL THE CONTRIBUTIONS! YOU ARE MAKING THIS HAPPEN! YOU can also help us by spreading the word out! Help US spread the WORD: RJ 4 MACHINE IS ALIVE! SHOW THEM THE INDIEGOGO CAMPAIGN. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO SPREAD THE WORD OUT THRU THE SOCIAL NETWORKS! FRIENDS! FAMILY! COWORKERS! EVERYONE!  WE WOULD LOVE TO GET CONNECT WITH OUR PEOPLE AND SPREAD THE LOVE! WE couldn't have never made RJ 4 MACHINE possible if it wasn't for You. We appreciate all the HELP we can get even it's little. We appreciate it because all contribution are really a BIG part of the quadracycle. All are a BIG part in bringing LIVE the Quadracycle. We want for the people to enjoy the evolution of a new transportation: THE QUADRACYCLE.We want for the Quadracycle to take part of Your lives such as how it has impact my life and transform the way I ride! I had enjoy it I had fun! And I would like to share this experience with everyone! I know that you will LOVE the Quadracycle such as how I love it! It's GREAT! ITS FUN! AND IT'S Joyable! AND SAFE! All of you are a great part of making this possible! The experience would be fun!Just wait and see you will enjoy it! WELCOME TO THE TEAM FAMILY OF RJ 4 MACHINE!
FOR THE FUTURE... This is not the end but the beginning of something New and Wonderful! I would like to bring out new models and new projects for the people. I would like to get everyone connect by just one thing: The quadracycle! AND MANY MORE TO COME!  

LETS ALL MAKE SOME NOICE! AND LET'S ALL SHARE THIS CAMPAING BY USING THE INDIEGOGO SHARE TOOLS! LET'S ALL ENJOY THIS RIDE! "FUTURE, THIS IS IT! REMEMBER YOU DONT NEED BALANCE TO ENJOY YOUR CRUISE.
THANK YOU! ,
RJ 4 MACHINE FAMILY
 "EMBRACE A NEW RIDE OF TOMORROW"- RJ 4 MACHINE

THE MEGA, QUAD-FORMER WOULD BE SOLD WORLDWIDE ALL STORES NEAR YOU! 
Coming soon  2016 .....   :)
