story:
Overview

The Mobo Mity Sport is a revolutionary trike for kids 3-7 years old. Our goal is to provide kids with the world’s safest tricycle that will grow as they grow and provide years of value. Support our campaign to promote a safe, fun and fit lifestyle for this new generation.

 

 

                                                                                                                                                                                                     

 

 

 

Why We Created the Mobo Mity Sport

Mobo strives to provide a next-level riding experience for all children. With the Mobo Mity Sport we made sure to focus on bringing the safety that other tricycles were missing. Our rear-wheel steering mechanism gives children the ability to turn without fear of tipping. The adjustable frame grows with the child while giving you as a parent your money's worth. We believe children can have endless “WOW” moments while cruising with our Mobo Mity Sport. 

 

 

 

Can Your Trike Do This?

With quality you can trust, this stylish trike features a comfortable seat, chain less chassis,  comfortable air tires and a sturdy, adjustable frame that grows with your child. The Mobo Mity Sport plays an integral role in the development of your toddler's motor skills, muscle strength, and hand-eye coordination. While promoting healthy exercise, this unique tricycle delivers a safe and fun riding experience coupled with increased physical activity. Let your child take a Mobo Mity Sport out for a cruise and start an adventure today.

 

It Grows with Your Child

 

 

Mobo Philosophy

Mobo believes that all children, no matter the age, condition, or size, should have the opportunity to get out, have fun and stay fit by playing outside. We know the safer a child feels on a tricycle the more willing they will be to spend time riding it. As we teach kids the joy of outdoor play the hope is that it becomes a lifestyle they will keep even into adulthood. Being healthy should always bring a smile to a child's face and what better way to do that than with a fun and safe Mobo Mity Sport. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our CEO, Melody Hsieh-Hornstra, has always believed that all kids should have an exciting and happy first bike ride experience. When the children's favorite toy store, Toys R Us, closed 807 stores last year, our CEO’s dream to provide happiness and health for children was taken away. We didn’t know what to do! Suddenly thousands of customers who could see and try our wonderful trikes in person weren’t able to do that anymore. Not only did they take away children's smiles but they almost took away Mobo Cruiser as a business.

This setback did not take away our CEO’s passion because she still wanted to bring a fit and fun lifestyle for children.  We needed to get the word out, that’s why we decided to introduce you to the Mobo Mity Sport trike on Indiegogo. So here we are with a brand new product! The Mobo Mity Sport, the safest, and most innovative tricycle in the world!

So here we are with a brand new product! The Mobo Mity Sport, the safest, and most innovative tricycle in the world!

story:
Introducing Crono

Built to impress

Upgraded with a stronger TEKTRO system

Safety first! In addition to the coaster brake, every CRONO will be shipped with two brake calipers (front and rear) and two brake levers. To focus on the design, we preferred to use the coaster brake in our pictures and videos (delivered as well as calipers brakes)

 

STURMEY ARCHER 3-SPEED

I had the opportunity to talk with one of the managers and test all their products, and I really like them. He confirmed that this is the model we are going to use: 

 

This project really started out as a necessity. I am fairly tall, 6’6” to be exact, and it was really difficult to find an inexpensive bicycle that would fit me. One day it struck me that I could use my engineering background to build the perfect bike on my own. So, I bought a large frame and all of the parts required to build a budget fixie exactly as I wanted. After few months I started thinking about how I could improve it. I particular, noticed how difficult it was to keep all the parts clean and lubricated in a cold, rainy, and windy country like Scotland, or in a really warm and dry country like my hometown (Southern Italy). That's the day that I started this project, without even knowing it! After sharing my thoughts on how to improve the bike with several friends and family members, they started encouraging me to design it and put it into production. But I wasn’t quite sure where to start. So, I decided to save enough money to fly and visit different suppliers around the world to propose my drawings and ideas of the bicycle that I envisioned. A bike that is always ready to ride, beautiful, innovative and affordable. I received a lot of "we will let you know", but eventually I found people that really believed in the bike. I am thankful for their daily support. It's an unreal feeling to see a product for the first time, and know that's it, that’s the perfect bike. A product that transpired from a thought to a concept, from a concept to a design, from a design to a simply beautiful bicycle that is practical and easy to maintain. But we need your help to build and produce this bicycle for you. 

This picture of my grandfather from 1947 inspired me since the first day. After WWII he needed a job to start a better life. He met the owner of an insurance company and managed to procure a job as sale agent. To do this job, he needed a way to move door to door. Monetarily, buying a car or a motorcycle was out of the question. However, he owned an old female bicycle that was badly damaged. While he didn't have any formal training or mechanical skills, he figured out how to repair it and make it work perfectly. That bicycle, which I still own in my hometown, was the first way that my family was able to move around town effectively. Moreover, it played a vital role for him. It has made him feel useful, provided a better life for my family, and allowed me to chase my dreams today.

This is why I believe that two simple wheels are not just a transportation piece or a hunk of metal. I believe that it is an important part of your story. A story that is constantly evolving and can take you wherever you want to go. This is my story, about my family and the passion that we have for bicycles. And that's the reason why I really believe in this project. 

integrated LED rear light system.

story:
We Are Cherry

At Cherry, boarding is more than an activity, it's a movement pushed forward by riders and artists coming together to do what they love.

Our mission is to give the rider a premium longboard with one of a kind deck art that inspires them to go farther and go faster. Together We Are Cherry.

Details

  • Pressed from High-Quality Canadian Maple (7ply) 
  • 33" Long and 10" Wide 
  • High-Quality Art 
  • Clear Grip Tape
  • Trucks and Wheels (Included in 'Complete' Perk)
    • Trucks
      • 180mm (10" axle to axle)
      • Double Barrel Bushings 90a Duro
      • Reverse Kingpin
    • Wheels
      • 70mm
      • 78a Duro
      • Semi-Clear Red
      • Abec7 Bearings

 

The Artist

   

  Weston Meyer is the designer of the Cherry Bomb and a team member at Cherry.  He is a graphic designer, photographer, and a videographer.  As with many of his designs, the Cherry Bomb is simple and clean, showing an understanding of colors and design space.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Join the community and become a part of what we are doing.  Check out our social media accounts, like and share what you see.
    • Our Accounts
      • Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/CherryBoarding/
      • Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/cherryboarding/
      • Twitter- https://twitter.com/CherryBoarding
    Share this campaign with all your friends to help get the word out.

Risks and Challenges

Larger Companies

  • As a small brand, it is a challenge to compete in a market with larger companies who have more resources.

Building Community

  • Building community takes others getting involved, and this is something that must be built over time to reach the audience that Cherry has targeted.

 

 

The Team

story:
Our purpose-built features and technology–obsessively developed from the ground-up in order to address concerns over distance, safety and security–are baked right into the bike, so you don’t have to worry about a thing.

Flash isn't just an electric bike; it's an evolution in what a bike can be.

Campaign Update

 

Our Indiegogo campaign ended on July 11, 2017, but you can order Flash bikes and accessories on our own website, right now!

 

Features

 

 

Your current battery charge level, speed and pedal assist level are always visible on the high-resolution touchscreen, mounted inside the frame just below the handlebars.

The 500 watt geared rear hub motor provides 48 N.m. of torque. In English? Flash is quick off the line from a stop, and climbs up hills with ease. All with minimal pedal resistance.

 

 


Handlebar controls from left to right: 7-speed Shimano shifter, 3-level headlight control (top), electric horn (middle), turn signal (bottom), and grip throttle for the electric motor.

The high-intensity LED headlight and 360° running lights are custom designed as part of Flash’s integrated electrical system meant to keep you visible, day or night.

The rear brake light is triggered when you squeeze either brake lever, alerting everyone behind you of your change in speed and keeping you safe during sudden stops.

 

 

Use the high-resolution touchscreen to arm the security system, or simply turn off the bike.

In the case of theft, security alerts are sent immediately to your phone and we can help track it down with GPS location.

 

 

A 6-digit PIN code is required in order to disarm your Flash.

No need to look at your phone. The Flash app sends navigation info directly to your bike.

 

 

 

Testimonials

 

 

Perks & Upgrades

 

In an effort to keep Flash as affordable as possible–and keep the buying process as simple as possible–we are not offering a multitude of Perks with various modifications and upgrades for you to decipher with a spreadsheet and calculator.

Instead, our perks follow a simple structure: the earlier you order, the better pricing and shipping date you'll get.


Every perk features the same bike with all the features described below and on our website. All you have to decide on is your favorite color:

Shipping is limited to the United States only. Flash is not designed to work internationally, due to issues concerning certifications, regulations, and wireless performance.

 

** NEW CAMPAIGN PERK **

We have received lots of feedback from folks wanting fenders to keep themselves clean on their daily commute. So we went back to the drawing board and came up with a set of custom front and rear fenders, specifically designed to fit seamlessly with a Flash v1 bike (shown here on the factory floor). These fenders are available as a separate perk for just $50 plus free shipping and will ship separately. Attaching these to your bike takes seconds, with just a few screws and nothing to remove.

 

 

We’re excited to partner with OTTO DesignWorks to offer the OTTOLOCK—a compact and lightweight cinch lock that’s perfect for short-stay security and peace of mind—as a special Stretch Reward for our campaign backers.

If we reach $650,000 in contributions before our campaign ends on July 11, every bike ordered during our campaign will ship with a 30” black OTTOLOCK included, at no extra cost. Simple as that!

Weighing just 155g and made of stainless steel and Kevlar, OTTOLOCK is stronger than a cable lock and significantly lighter than a U-Lock. It’s the perfect item to toss in your bag (or even your pocket!) for when you need to secure your Flash and run a quick errand.

With our movement-sensitive alarm and OTTOLOCK working together to secure your Flash, theft opportunists will have to look elsewhere.

 

*** UPDATE ***

With just a few hours remaining in our campaign, we've reached our stretch goal! That means that as long as we remain above that target when the campaign ends tonight, every single Flash bike ordered during our campaign will ship with the OTTOLOCK included. Sweet!

 

Referral Rewards

Get your friends to contribute and you could earn a free Flash!


If just one of your friends claims a bike perk, you’ll come away with a t-shirt and an extra battery charger for your Flash. Refer a second bike, and you’ll also get a $100 gift card for Amazon.

 

How it works:

  1. Log into your Indiegogo account and visit our campaign page.
  2. Use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with your friends.
  3. When your friends click on your link and contribute to our campaign, Indiegogo will automatically credit you with the referral.

For more details on Indiegogo’s referral program, please read these instructions from Indiegogo.

 

Important details to make sure you get rewarded:

  • Referral rewards are limited to our campaign backers only. You must contribute to our campaign in order to qualify.
  • You must be logged into your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo’s share tools when generating a link to share with your friends. Otherwise, contributions cannot be attributed to you. Detailed instructions available here.
  • Your friends must use your shared link when contributing. Otherwise, contributions cannot be attributed to you. Unfortunately, we cannot honor any referrals that are not tracked via Indiegogo’s referral program.
  • Final referrals will be tallied on August 2. Orders cancelled on or before August 1 will not count toward your referral total. For orders cancelled after August 1, please see our refund policy.

 

T-shirts will be fulfilled soon after August 1. You'll receive a link to order your shirt from our website, and they'll ship just a few days after you order.

Battery chargers are limited to backers who have claimed a perk that includes a bike, and will be shipped together with your bike.

Amazon Gift Cards will be delivered via email as a digital coupon code, soon after August 1.

Free bikes will ship in March. Backers will be responsible for shipping costs (currently $150 for contiguous United States, $500 for Hawaii/Alaska).

 

 

Technical Specs

Timeline

 

 

Our Team

FAQs

Looking for more details? If the specs above don't answer your questions, check out our Help Center with tons of specific answers to questions on a range of topics, from bike fit, to battery usage, to service and warranty, and more.

Below are some of our more frequently asked questions:

 

Buying Flash

Will you ship outside of the United States?

Unfortunately, we do not ship internationally and we can't warranty the bike if it's used outside of the United States, as it isn't designed to work internationally. The details around that are very boring, but it's related to certifications, regulations, and wireless performance. Sorry!

 

How many frame sizes are there? Am I the right height and weight?

Flash is currently offered as a single one-size-fits-most frame, with a suggested rider’s height of 5’3” up to 6’2”.

It's also worth noting that we designed Flash with an angled down tube so that it's easier for people with shorter legs or physical limitations to get on and off.

Check out this Help Center article for lots of detailed sizing information.

 

Can I attach accessories like a rack or fenders?

Yes! Check out this list of compatible third-party accessories.

 

For what kind of riding is Flash intended? Can I take it mountain biking?

Flash is intended to be a great bike for light recreation, getting around town without your car, exploring on a Saturday afternoon, etc. We think Flash is fantastic for that sort of general use, but if you have other more specific biking needs, we'd rather be clear so that you don't end up with a different expectation as to how Flash should perform.

With that said, please understand that Flash was not built to be a cargo bike for hauling tons of gear, nor is it intended by design to be used for long-distance touring or towing. Flash performs best on pavement and can handle light trail use, but it's certainly not meant to be ridden as a mountain bike.

We love to ride Flash to and from the office every day, but if you're a hardcore bike commuter with specific needs around weight and specialized accessories, then Flash may not suit your needs.

 

How assembled is the bike when it arrives?

Flash arrives partially assembled. You'll need to spend about 15 minutes on final assembly, using some required tools (crescent wrench, allen wrench, torque wrench). You'll be doing things like attaching the wheels and pedals, and tightening the handlebars. Honestly, it's not too difficult and the manual will walk you through it. If you have any questions during final assembly, just let us know. If you're concerned about physical strength, a tech at your local bike shop can do it very quickly and easily.

 

What sort of return policy and warranty does Flash come with?

If, at any point during the first 30 days after you receive your Flash, you feel that the bike does not match how it was described to you on our website or through any communications with us, please contact us to discuss a return. Bike components are warrantied for 2 years. Electronics are warrantied for 1 year. Read our full warranty here.

 

Can I cancel my order for a refund?

Orders can be cancelled and refunded at any time prior to order fulfillment (when we ship the bike to you). The process and amount of refund both depend on whether our Indiegogo campaign has ended.

If our Indiegogo campaign is still active:
Please refer to Indiegogo's refund policy and instructions for requesting a refund.

If our Indiegogo campaign has ended:
Please contact us directly to request an order cancellation and a refund of your payment minus a 10% fee (to cover processing fees and Indiegogo platform fees).

 

Riding and Maintaining Flash

Can the battery be removed from inside of the frame?

Flash's battery is inside the bike frame (within the down tube, to be exact), and is not intended to be removed by the rider. We realize that some people prefer to be able to swap out the battery, but our preference is for a simpler and cleaner design. Putting the battery inside the frame also helps us keep Flash lighter and more affordable, and protects the battery from theft. Should the battery need service, it can be removed from the frame.

 

How do I charge Flash? And how long will it take?

For more details on battery usage and maintenance, check out these articles in our Help Center.

 

What do I do when my bike needs service?

For mechanical issues with general bike parts–including wheels/tires, brakes, cables, shifter, chain, cranks/pedals and seat–just head on in to your local bike shop. For any issues with electrical components–including the battery, motor, touchscreen, lights and handlebar controls–we'll work directly with you to resolve the issue.

 

App & Wireless Connectivity​

Is there an additional cost for the wireless service?

Nope! There is no additional cost for cellular service. You don't even need to set anything up. Every Flash arrives connected and ready to go. 

 

How does Flash's wireless connectivity work? Do I need to set that up?

Flash uses a combination of Bluetooth and wireless technology to connect with your phone and send you updates on battery and alert status, as well as provide turn-by-turn navigation.

In order to set up all of this functionality, the only thing you need to do is pair your phone with your Flash during initial setup. This allows the two to communicate securely and seamlessly. When you receive your Flash and launch the app on your phone, you'll be walked through the quick and secure pairing process. Once that is complete, you're good to go.

You don't need to do anything to set up your Flash's wireless connection. The bike arrives connected and ready to go, and it is completely separate from your own personal wireless account. You don't ever have to deal with it (or pay for it). Just get out and ride!

 

Will Flash's wireless coverage work in my area?

We use T-Mobile for Flash's wireless coverage in the United States. Please refer to T-Mobile's coverage map to check coverage in your area. Due to issues with certifications, regulations and wireless performance, Flash is not designed for wireless use outside of the United States.

 

Do I have to use the app in order to ride Flash?

When you first receive your Flash, you need to use the app for some initial setup, like creating your secure PIN code for the bike. After that initial setup, if you don’t want to use the app for anything else, you certainly don’t need to.

However, the app does provide you with some great features:

  • Live check-in on battery and security alert status, no matter where you are.

  • Arm/disarm Flash from any location.

  • Enter a destination on the app and Flash will guide you with turn-by-turn navigation.

  • Track your personal riding data, including overall distance and time.
story_txt:
Our purpose-built features and technology–obsessively developed from the ground-up in order to address concerns over distance, safety and security–are baked right into the bike, so you don’t have to worry about a thing.Flash isn't just an electric bike; it's an evolution in what a bike can be.Campaign Update Our Indiegogo campaign ended on July 11, 2017, but you can order Flash bikes and accessories on our own website, right now! Features  Your current battery charge level, speed and pedal assist level are always visible on the high-resolution touchscreen, mounted inside the frame just below the handlebars.The 500 watt geared rear hub motor provides 48 N.m. of torque. In English? Flash is quick off the line from a stop, and climbs up hills with ease. All with minimal pedal resistance.  Handlebar controls from left to right: 7-speed Shimano shifter, 3-level headlight control (top), electric horn (middle), turn signal (bottom), and grip throttle for the electric motor.The high-intensity LED headlight and 360° running lights are custom designed as part of Flash’s integrated electrical system meant to keep you visible, day or night.The rear brake light is triggered when you squeeze either brake lever, alerting everyone behind you of your change in speed and keeping you safe during sudden stops.  Use the high-resolution touchscreen to arm the security system, or simply turn off the bike.In the case of theft, security alerts are sent immediately to your phone and we can help track it down with GPS location.  A 6-digit PIN code is required in order to disarm your Flash.No need to look at your phone. The Flash app sends navigation info directly to your bike.   
Testimonials
 

 

Perks & Upgrades In an effort to keep Flash as affordable as possible–and keep the buying process as simple as possible–we are not offering a multitude of Perks with various modifications and upgrades for you to decipher with a spreadsheet and calculator.Instead, our perks follow a simple structure: the earlier you order, the better pricing and shipping date you'll get.Every perk features the same bike with all the features described below and on our website. All you have to decide on is your favorite color:Shipping is limited to the United States only. Flash is not designed to work internationally, due to issues concerning certifications, regulations, and wireless performance. ** NEW CAMPAIGN PERK **We have received lots of feedback from folks wanting fenders to keep themselves clean on their daily commute. So we went back to the drawing board and came up with a set of custom front and rear fenders, specifically designed to fit seamlessly with a Flash v1 bike (shown here on the factory floor). These fenders are available as a separate perk for just $50 plus free shipping and will ship separately. Attaching these to your bike takes seconds, with just a few screws and nothing to remove.  We’re excited to partner with OTTO DesignWorks to offer the OTTOLOCK—a compact and lightweight cinch lock that’s perfect for short-stay security and peace of mind—as a special Stretch Reward for our campaign backers.If we reach $650,000 in contributions before our campaign ends on July 11, every bike ordered during our campaign will ship with a 30” black OTTOLOCK included, at no extra cost. Simple as that!Weighing just 155g and made of stainless steel and Kevlar, OTTOLOCK is stronger than a cable lock and significantly lighter than a U-Lock. It’s the perfect item to toss in your bag (or even your pocket!) for when you need to secure your Flash and run a quick errand.With our movement-sensitive alarm and OTTOLOCK working together to secure your Flash, theft opportunists will have to look elsewhere. *** UPDATE ***With just a few hours remaining in our campaign, we've reached our stretch goal! That means that as long as we remain above that target when the campaign ends tonight, every single Flash bike ordered during our campaign will ship with the OTTOLOCK included. Sweet! Referral RewardsGet your friends to contribute and you could earn a free Flash!If just one of your friends claims a bike perk, you’ll come away with a t-shirt and an extra battery charger for your Flash. Refer a second bike, and you’ll also get a $100 gift card for Amazon. How it works:
Log into your Indiegogo account and visit our campaign page.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign with your friends.
When your friends click on your link and contribute to our campaign, Indiegogo will automatically credit you with the referral.
For more details on Indiegogo’s referral program, please read these instructions from Indiegogo. Important details to make sure you get rewarded:

Referral rewards are limited to our campaign backers only. You must contribute to our campaign in order to qualify.

You must be logged into your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo’s share tools when generating a link to share with your friends. Otherwise, contributions cannot be attributed to you. Detailed instructions available here.


Your friends must use your shared link when contributing. Otherwise, contributions cannot be attributed to you. Unfortunately, we cannot honor any referrals that are not tracked via Indiegogo’s referral program.

Final referrals will be tallied on August 2. Orders cancelled on or before August 1 will not count toward your referral total. For orders cancelled after August 1, please see our refund policy.
 T-shirts will be fulfilled soon after August 1. You'll receive a link to order your shirt from our website, and they'll ship just a few days after you order.Battery chargers are limited to backers who have claimed a perk that includes a bike, and will be shipped together with your bike.Amazon Gift Cards will be delivered via email as a digital coupon code, soon after August 1.Free bikes will ship in March. Backers will be responsible for shipping costs (currently $150 for contiguous United States, $500 for Hawaii/Alaska).  Technical SpecsTimeline  Our Team
FAQs
Looking for more details? If the specs above don't answer your questions, check out our Help Center with tons of specific answers to questions on a range of topics, from bike fit, to battery usage, to service and warranty, and more.
Below are some of our more frequently asked questions:
 
Buying Flash
Will you ship outside of the United States?
Unfortunately, we do not ship internationally and we can't warranty the bike if it's used outside of the United States, as it isn't designed to work internationally. The details around that are very boring, but it's related to certifications, regulations, and wireless performance. Sorry!

Flash is currently offered as a single one-size-fits-most frame, with a suggested rider’s height of 5’3” up to 6’2”.
It's also worth noting that we designed Flash with an angled down tube so that it's easier for people with shorter legs or physical limitations to get on and off.
Check out this Help Center article for lots of detailed sizing information.

story:
The BEST eBike on the planet.

- According to reviewers, customers & fans

 

"Top of the line. Best design I have seen in any electric bike."
- Darwin Cole (test rider & customer)
"I have been researching for nearly 5 years, but never spent the money until the FLX Bike came along. And, now I'm sold! We have 2 bike on the way now!"
- Nathan Long (happy customer x2)
"I am so flxing excited about these bike.... I just bought 2 after meeting with Pete in SF... This bike is built like a tank and is incredibly well thought out. Its also the perfect size, handles like a dream and best of all it does NOT look like an electric bike.. I absolutely love that when they think of something to make better they simply do it, there is no excuse and to me that means that they are looking out for us."
- Peter Mainwald (test rider & customer x2)
This is unparalleled to anything I've ever been part of when it comes to any sort of purchase.. The attention to detail on each bike part is borderline insane! And myself being a perfectionist, I love it. It's odd but I feel that I literally underpaid for the bike just because of the labor involved in making sure everyone who purchases a bike is the exact same thing you guys have dreamed about making and you do not want to let not 1 single person down... Keep up the awesome work!
- Rafael Astolpho (happy customer)
Holy crap! I thought I was a perfectionist. Dang. I continue to be blown away with your level of passion and work ethic. I'm telling everyone how inspiring team FLX is...  ;) thanks for all your hard work and attention to detail. Love to you. 
 - Maria Gianas﻿ (happy customer)

Sign Up for FLX News & Exclusive Perks enter your email

 What Makes FLX Special

FLX is powered by the same batteries as the Tesla Model S. It rocks a mid motor (in the crankshaft) for a smoother, more powerful ride. It's rugged and lightweight compared to all other e-bikes.

We've worked day and night for the past two years to build what fans are calling the best e-bike in the world. High-end components only available on bikes costing 3-4x more than FLX. Great design. Lightweight. Built to last. Huge power and range.

And most importantly, unbelievable customer support and community!

Only FLX offers three models:

  • Roadster - commute/cruise on roads
  • Trail - commute/cruise/adventure on and off roads, front suspension
  • Attack - downhill/adventure, 17A battery, full suspension

And loads of upgrades on our shop:
Suspension Seat Post ($35),   13A Spare Battery ($399),   17A Spare Battery ($650),   Rear Rack ($55),   Integrated Head/Tail Lights ($100),   Fenders ($50),   Smart Phone Mount ($20) Extra Battery Charger ($55) Boomerang GPS Anti-Theft ($199)

 

Sign Up for FLX News & Exclusive Perks enter your email

 

"It might just be the best electric bike option out there."
- The Upscout
"We've seen our fair share of ugly bikes whose batteries looked like they've been designed as ugly as possible on purpose, but with FLX, this has completely changed."  - Autoevolution
"A wonderful team... Creating affordable, yet functional E-Bikes!" - MtnBikeGeek
"The central motor has advantages over hub motors, because of the more even weight distribution and the ability to utilise the bike’s own gears to optimize torque in any speed." - Spycycle
“FLX can handle pretty much anything!"
- Ashton Smith (PRO MTB Rider)
See more in Facebook Reviews and the Video Gallery.

 

 

 

 

 

 

How will you FLX?

 



With 5 ride modes, you can get as much or as little exercise as you want. Studies show that e-bike users ride 80% more often and over twice as far than on regular bikes!



Say goodbye to those messes of wires and big bulky batteries. It's time to put some sexy back into your ride.



Get up steep hills without missing a beat. Your time is valuable. Spend it doing what you love, not fighting gravity.



What goes up must come down, and FLX is ready. Getting up the hill 3-4 times faster means you can squeeze in way more downhill action in one day.



Sometimes we could all use a little boost. FLX is there when you need it, just relax, hit the throttle and go. 

 
 

Awesome Features on All Models

Bofeili Mid-Drive Motor

A serious performer, it will leave bigger hub motors in the dust behind it. Using the bikes gears, it achieves optimum hill climbing, range, and speed.

Integrated Lithium Battery

More kilowatt hours than any other bike of its class. For the optional 17Ah extended battery, we sourced the highest capacity Panasonic cells in the world, the same ones used in the Tesla model S. Use the USB port to charge your iPhone around 70 times. 

Thumb Throttle

Don't feel like pedaling? Just hit the throttle and FLX will take you wherever you need to go. With throttle only, you can cruise at 20 miles per hour for incredible distances. 

Backlit LCD Display

Like a cockpit for your bike, see how fast you're going, how far you've ridden, average speed and battery life. You can program the speed limit to comply with local laws. 

Hydraulic Disc Brakes

We love you - don't die. All FLX models come standard with hydraulic disc brakes that cut the motor when applied.  Stay in control and out of trouble with more stopping power.

Shimano Gears

Shimano derailleur and 9 speed cassette work in synergy with the motor to deliver maximum acceleration and top speeds. Don't sacrifice performance. The advanced gearing gives you more than three times the torque range of traditional e-bikes with hub motors.

 

 

 

For more detailed specs, click here.

 

 

Sign Up for FLX News & Exclusive Perks enter your email

Roadster | Trail | Attack

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

ABOUT YOUR ORDER

FLX Bikes come standard in the following colors:

Roadster - Gloss White

Trail - Matte Black

Attack - Matte Black

If you want to pick your own color, please order on our website, as Indiegogo does not support bikes of color. 

 

 

 

Sign Up for FLX News & Exclusive Perks enter your email

 

Development Status

We've thoroughly tested 7 fully functioning prototypes and are now focused on: 

  • Making final tweaks to designs
  • Finalizing quality control systems
  • Developing accessories

Why we need your support:

We've been working on FLX for over a year. Unlike many of the larger technology projects on Indiegogo, Pete and Rob have completely funded the project themselves. It's been a long road and they've given up everything to bring their dreams to the world. Your support will allow us to offer you a better eBike and prove that affordable electric transportation is a reality.

So why should you support us?

  • You'll be the first to get a FLX. 
  • You want to save time and money on your transportation.
  • You want to contribute to a greener future.  

 

 

Video Review

See more video reviews in the Gallery.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Team FLX 

 

 

 

 

 

FAQS

General
Technical
Legal
Payments and Shipping

 

General

 

Paypal won't accept my payment, what do I do?

Good news, you can now buy your bike directly on the FLX website and checkout with any major Credit Card. Contact us at hello@flx.bike with any issues. 

 

 

Are you hiring?

Yes, we have several positions available. Check them out and apply here.

 

Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured?

 

No. They will be even better. We have a few tweaks to make and reserve the right to make modifications in the interest of making your FLX bike even better. Since the photos were taken, we've already upgraded the motor from 540 to 650w, added a USB port in the display, changed Microshift gears for Shimano, and plan to make a couple other upgrades before your bike is ready!

 

How do I choose the color?

 

We're going to be announcing one or two more color choices before the end of the campaign. When the campaign ends, we'll send you a survey where you can tell us your color choice and any other info we need to get you the bike. 

 

What range can you get from the 17A battery?

 

We use the same Panasonic cells that are in the Tesla Model S electric car. Due to their high energy density we’ve managed to get 612 watt hours into a relatively small battery pack. Watt hours are the figure you need to look at when figuring out how far an electric bike can go. The higher the watt hours, greater the range. Very few bikes feature a battery with such a high capacity as the FLX 17Ah battery. Combined with the more efficient mid motor we get 46 miles with the Roadster on full power.

 

What about the 13A Battery?

 

The 13Ah battery at 468 watt hours uses Samsung cells and is no slouch either. You can get around 35 miles in full power on the Roadster. The trail will be slightly less due to increased rolling resistance of the tires. 

 

Can I upgrade to a 17A battery?

 

Yes, we will offer a battery upgrade and extra batteries later in the campaign. Lock in your earlybird price on the bike and we'll email you when the battery perks are available. 

 

I'm short/tall/heavy, can I ride it?

 

We've tested the 19” frame with riders from 5'2” to 6'5” with no issues. Pete and Rob have been know to ride double on one bike, throttling up hills with over 360 lbs combined weight!

 

Test Rides?

 

Sorry, we're busy building bikes right now. Subscribe to FLX youtube for some awesome footage of real people on these bikes. You can check our face

 

Is there a warranty?

 

Yes! We use high quality components and are in this for the long run. All FLX bikes are protected by a one year warranty. Any parts that break or go defective are covered. We will ship replacement parts free of charge in this case. Note this does not include rider damage.

 

How do I get replacement parts?

 

We'll be opening an online store on http://flx.bike where you can purchase components, accessories and even bikes in the very near future. We're working hard to get these to you in the most efficient way possible.

 

Where can FLX bikes be serviced?

 

FLX bikes are designed to be very simple, and just like a normal bike. Any reputable bike shop will have the tools to work on a FLX and make any changes if needed. We will provide documentation and/or video of possible replacement processes to ensure quality work.

 

What colors are available?

 

Gloss white and matte black for now. We may incorporate a stretch goal for more colors.

 

 

 

Technical

How much do they weigh?

FLX bikes are very lightweight considering the technology packed in. Their weights with battery are as follows:
Roadster: 46 lbs
Trail: 51 lbs
Attack: 53 lbs

 

How much does the battery weigh?

 

FLX uses the highest capacity battery cells available. The battery pack weighs 6.6 pounds.

 

How do you charge the battery and how long does it take?

 

The Battery can be charged either on or off the bike. If you live in an apartment building you don’t need to lug it up all those stairs to charge it. Same thing at work, although this battery lasts so long you probably won’t need to bother with a charger in the office. It takes around 6 hours to charge with our 3A charger.

 

Will the charger work with 120V and 220V outlets around the world?

 

Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V and uses the same power cable that desktop computers use. Works in every country. 

 

Can you charge the bike by pedaling to increase range?

 

No, such a system defies the laws of physics and would decrease the overall range of the bike rather than increase it. Because the efficiency of dynamos and motors is only in the 80-90% range, such a system could only convert ~80% of the energy you put into pedaling into motion. On the other hand, if you simply used this energy to propel the bike, you can put almost 100% of that energy into motion. Put simply, the bike is simpler and will go further without this system. 

 

Why is your motor in the crank rather than in the rear hub like most electric bikes?

 

A mid drive motor system is incredibly efficient. By providing power at the crank it takes full use of the mechanical advantage of the bike’s gearing. Mid motors are known for delivering higher performance and torque when compared to a similar powered traditional Hub Motor.

Taking advantage of the bike’s own gearing system multiplies the motor’s power up to 3.1 times. This makes it more efficient when climbing hills and also achieving top end speeds. Battery life is extended due to increased efficiency and it also centralizes weight distribution which most importantly means more air when hitting those jumps!

Admittedly we’re really biased towards mid motors and that’s the point. We did plenty of research on them before the bike even took form on a drawing board. We think they’re far superior and that’s why we use them on our bikes.

 

Is there a water bottle mount?

 

Yes, there are braze-ons on the seat tube of the Roadster and Trail for standard water bottle cages. The Attack has the same braze-ons under the down tube. 

 

Are there Eyelets for fenders?

 

Yes, standard mounting eyelets for fenders front and rear.

 

Will you sell a rear rack?

 

There are mounting points for a rear rack and many aftermarket options will work. We also plan to offer a solution as a stretch goal, so tell your friends!

 

Can you remove the wheels if you need to put it in a car?

 

Absolutely. Both wheels are quick release and can be removed in approximately 25 seconds flat. Next...

 

What happens if I get a Puncture?

 

Go off road or ride high distances in the city and you get plenty of punctures right? Changing a flat on a FLX is exactly the same as on a standard bike. Hub motors make it way more complicated. Just saying.

 

How much maintenance does the motor require?

 

The motor is maintenance free. Our motor manufacturer has been making these types of motors for years so they’ve been thoroughly tested in the factory, in the field and with 1000’s of other customers. If needed the entire motor can also be removed and replaced simply by taking out a couple of bolts instead of dealing with the complexities of replacing a hub motor. Check it out. Nightmare.

 

 

 

Legal

Will this comply with the laws in Europe/Australia/Mars?

We chose the Bofeili mid motor for its flexibility and high power output. While it can operate for extended periods close to its 650w peak output, the motor is rated 250w, which means it complies with stricter EU regulations. Motors up to 250w nominal power are legal in most countries. The speed limit can be programmed and the throttle can be removed very easily to comply with local laws.

 

What’s the top speed of the Bike?

 

FLX bikes can easily achieve 25mph, for legal reasons, above 25mph the motor cuts out and it’s down to the rider how fast they can pedal. The bikes all have a speedometer in the display so you can see exactly how fast that is. The speed limit in the LCD display can be programmed in about 1 minute to comply with local laws. For off road use only, the speed limit can be removed to reach speeds of up to 30mph. 

 

Do I need a special license to operate one?

 

FLX bikes are legal and classified as an electric bike almost everywhere, and as such don't require a special license. There are a few jurisdictions with more specific laws and we recommend to check those before purchasing.

 

Do I need to wear a helmet?

 

They are required by law in some places and optional in other places.

 

Why are the riders not wearing helmets?

 

On one hand, helmets dramatically reduce fatal and long term head injuries from impact and it is advisable to wear them considering all the drivers texting around you! On the other hand, studies show that helmet laws can actually cause a large unintended negative health impact. We have no place to tell you how to ride, take the facts for what they are and make your own decision. Personally, we wear helmets when it makes sense for us.

 

 

 

Payments and Shipping

How much is shipping?

Free shipping to the US, $200 USD to Canada and Mexico, $799 USD international shipping.

 

Can I pick the bike up in SF and avoid the shipping charge?

Sorry, we'd love to meet you, but the bikes are shipped from our manufacturing partners by sea and land freight. We have to pay shipping on every bike. 

 

When does it ship?

 

We're shipping now!

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

 

The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% in the US and varies internationally. You can check this comprehensive list to get started.

 

Is there financing?

 

Yes, you can order your bike on our shop and checkout with Paypal Credit (Bill Me Later) to finance the purchase. The terms are very generous!

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.
story_txt:
The BEST eBike on the planet.
- According to reviewers, customers & fans 

"Top of the line. Best design I have seen in any electric bike."- Darwin Cole (test rider & customer)"I have been researching for nearly 5 years, but never spent the money until the FLX Bike came along. And, now I'm sold! We have 2 bike on the way now!"- Nathan Long (happy customer x2)"I am so flxing excited about these bike.... I just bought 2 after meeting with Pete in SF... This bike is built like a tank and is incredibly well thought out. Its also the perfect size, handles like a dream and best of all it does NOT look like an electric bike.. I absolutely love that when they think of something to make better they simply do it, there is no excuse and to me that means that they are looking out for us."- Peter Mainwald (test rider & customer x2)
This is unparalleled to anything I've ever been part of when it comes to any sort of purchase.. The attention to detail on each bike part is borderline insane! And myself being a perfectionist, I love it. It's odd but I feel that I literally underpaid for the bike just because of the labor involved in making sure everyone who purchases a bike is the exact same thing you guys have dreamed about making and you do not want to let not 1 single person down... Keep up the awesome work!- Rafael Astolpho (happy customer)
Holy crap! I thought I was a perfectionist. Dang. I continue to be blown away with your level of passion and work ethic. I'm telling everyone how inspiring team FLX is...  ;) thanks for all your hard work and attention to detail. Love to you.  - Maria Gianas﻿ (happy customer)
Sign Up for FLX News & Exclusive Perks enter your email What Makes FLX SpecialFLX is powered by the same batteries as the Tesla Model S. It rocks a mid motor (in the crankshaft) for a smoother, more powerful ride. It's rugged and lightweight compared to all other e-bikes.We've worked day and night for the past two years to build what fans are calling the best e-bike in the world. High-end components only available on bikes costing 3-4x more than FLX. Great design. Lightweight. Built to last. Huge power and range.And most importantly, unbelievable customer support and community!
Only FLX offers three models:


Roadster - commute/cruise on roads

Trail - commute/cruise/adventure on and off roads, front suspension

Attack - downhill/adventure, 17A battery, full suspension

And loads of upgrades on our shop:Suspension Seat Post ($35),   13A Spare Battery ($399),   17A Spare Battery ($650),   Rear Rack ($55),   Integrated Head/Tail Lights ($100),   Fenders ($50),   Smart Phone Mount ($20) Extra Battery Charger ($55) Boomerang GPS Anti-Theft ($199) Sign Up for FLX News & Exclusive Perks enter your email "It might just be the best electric bike option out there."- The Upscout"We've seen our fair share of ugly bikes whose batteries looked like they've been designed as ugly as possible on purpose, but with FLX, this has completely changed."  - Autoevolution
"A wonderful team... Creating affordable, yet functional E-Bikes!" - MtnBikeGeek"The central motor has advantages over hub motors, because of the more even weight distribution and the ability to utilise the bike’s own gears to optimize torque in any speed." - Spycycle“FLX can handle pretty much anything!"- Ashton Smith (PRO MTB Rider)See more in Facebook Reviews and the Video Gallery.      How will you FLX? With 5 ride modes, you can get as much or as little exercise as you want. Studies show that e-bike users ride 80% more often and over twice as far than on regular bikes!Say goodbye to those messes of wires and big bulky batteries. It's time to put some sexy back into your ride.Get up steep hills without missing a beat. Your time is valuable. Spend it doing what you love, not fighting gravity.What goes up must come down, and FLX is ready. Getting up the hill 3-4 times faster means you can squeeze in way more downhill action in one day.Sometimes we could all use a little boost. FLX is there when you need it, just relax, hit the throttle and go.   Awesome Features on All Models


Bofeili Mid-Drive Motor
A serious performer, it will leave bigger hub motors in the dust behind it. Using the bikes gears, it achieves optimum hill climbing, range, and speed.




Integrated Lithium Battery
More kilowatt hours than any other bike of its class. For the optional 17Ah extended battery, we sourced the highest capacity Panasonic cells in the world, the same ones used in the Tesla model S. Use the USB port to charge your iPhone around 70 times. 




Thumb Throttle
Don't feel like pedaling? Just hit the throttle and FLX will take you wherever you need to go. With throttle only, you can cruise at 20 miles per hour for incredible distances. 




Backlit LCD Display
Like a cockpit for your bike, see how fast you're going, how far you've ridden, average speed and battery life. You can program the speed limit to comply with local laws. 




Hydraulic Disc Brakes
We love you - don't die. All FLX models come standard with hydraulic disc brakes that cut the motor when applied.  Stay in control and out of trouble with more stopping power.




Shimano Gears
Shimano derailleur and 9 speed cassette work in synergy with the motor to deliver maximum acceleration and top speeds. Don't sacrifice performance. The advanced gearing gives you more than three times the torque range of traditional e-bikes with hub motors.

   For more detailed specs, click here.  Sign Up for FLX News & Exclusive Perks enter your email
Roadster | Trail | Attack
      

 
 

             ABOUT YOUR ORDERFLX Bikes come standard in the following colors:Roadster - Gloss WhiteTrail - Matte BlackAttack - Matte BlackIf you want to pick your own color, please order on our website, as Indiegogo does not support bikes of color.    Sign Up for FLX News & Exclusive Perks enter your email Development StatusWe've thoroughly tested 7 fully functioning prototypes and are now focused on: 
Making final tweaks to designs
Finalizing quality control systems
Developing accessories
Why we need your support:We've been working on FLX for over a year. Unlike many of the larger technology projects on Indiegogo, Pete and Rob have completely funded the project themselves. It's been a long road and they've given up everything to bring their dreams to the world. Your support will allow us to offer you a better eBike and prove that affordable electric transportation is a reality.So why should you support us?
You'll be the first to get a FLX. 
You want to save time and money on your transportation.
You want to contribute to a greener future.  
  Video ReviewSee more video reviews in the Gallery. 
 
 
 
 
 Team FLX 

 

    FAQS
GeneralTechnicalLegalPayments and Shipping
 General Paypal won't accept my payment, what do I do?Good news, you can now buy your bike directly on the FLX website and checkout with any major Credit Card. Contact us at hello@flx.bike with any issues.   Are you hiring?Yes, we have several positions available. Check them out and apply here. Will the production bikes be exactly like the ones pictured? No. They will be even better. We have a few tweaks to make and reserve the right to make modifications in the interest of making your FLX bike even better. Since the photos were taken, we've already upgraded the motor from 540 to 650w, added a USB port in the display, changed Microshift gears for Shimano, and plan to make a couple other upgrades before your bike is ready! How do I choose the color? We're going to be announcing one or two more color choices before the end of the campaign. When the campaign ends, we'll send you a survey where you can tell us your color choice and any other info we need to get you the bike.  What range can you get from the 17A battery? We use the same Panasonic cells that are in the Tesla Model S electric car. Due to their high energy density we’ve managed to get 612 watt hours into a relatively small battery pack. Watt hours are the figure you need to look at when figuring out how far an electric bike can go. The higher the watt hours, greater the range. Very few bikes feature a battery with such a high capacity as the FLX 17Ah battery. Combined with the more efficient mid motor we get 46 miles with the Roadster on full power. What about the 13A Battery? The 13Ah battery at 468 watt hours uses Samsung cells and is no slouch either. You can get around 35 miles in full power on the Roadster. The trail will be slightly less due to increased rolling resistance of the tires.  Can I upgrade to a 17A battery? Yes, we will offer a battery upgrade and extra batteries later in the campaign. Lock in your earlybird price on the bike and we'll email you when the battery perks are available.  I'm short/tall/heavy, can I ride it? We've tested the 19” frame with riders from 5'2” to 6'5” with no issues. Pete and Rob have been know to ride double on one bike, throttling up hills with over 360 lbs combined weight! Test Rides? Sorry, we're busy building bikes right now. Subscribe to FLX youtube for some awesome footage of real people on these bikes. You can check our face Is there a warranty? Yes! We use high quality components and are in this for the long run. All FLX bikes are protected by a one year warranty. Any parts that break or go defective are covered. We will ship replacement parts free of charge in this case. Note this does not include rider damage. How do I get replacement parts? We'll be opening an online store on http://flx.bike where you can purchase components, accessories and even bikes in the very near future. We're working hard to get these to you in the most efficient way possible. Where can FLX bikes be serviced? FLX bikes are designed to be very simple, and just like a normal bike. Any reputable bike shop will have the tools to work on a FLX and make any changes if needed. We will provide documentation and/or video of possible replacement processes to ensure quality work. What colors are available? Gloss white and matte black for now. We may incorporate a stretch goal for more colors.   TechnicalHow much do they weigh?FLX bikes are very lightweight considering the technology packed in. Their weights with battery are as follows:Roadster: 46 lbsTrail: 51 lbsAttack: 53 lbs How much does the battery weigh? FLX uses the highest capacity battery cells available. The battery pack weighs 6.6 pounds. How do you charge the battery and how long does it take? The Battery can be charged either on or off the bike. If you live in an apartment building you don’t need to lug it up all those stairs to charge it. Same thing at work, although this battery lasts so long you probably won’t need to bother with a charger in the office. It takes around 6 hours to charge with our 3A charger. Will the charger work with 120V and 220V outlets around the world? Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V and uses the same power cable that desktop computers use. Works in every country.  Can you charge the bike by pedaling to increase range? No, such a system defies the laws of physics and would decrease the overall range of the bike rather than increase it. Because the efficiency of dynamos and motors is only in the 80-90% range, such a system could only convert ~80% of the energy you put into pedaling into motion. On the other hand, if you simply used this energy to propel the bike, you can put almost 100% of that energy into motion. Put simply, the bike is simpler and will go further without this system.  Why is your motor in the crank rather than in the rear hub like most electric bikes? A mid drive motor system is incredibly efficient. By providing power at the crank it takes full use of the mechanical advantage of the bike’s gearing. Mid motors are known for delivering higher performance and torque when compared to a similar powered traditional Hub Motor.Taking advantage of the bike’s own gearing system multiplies the motor’s power up to 3.1 times. This makes it more efficient when climbing hills and also achieving top end speeds. Battery life is extended due to increased efficiency and it also centralizes weight distribution which most importantly means more air when hitting those jumps!Admittedly we’re really biased towards mid motors and that’s the point. We did plenty of research on them before the bike even took form on a drawing board. We think they’re far superior and that’s why we use them on our bikes. Is there a water bottle mount? Yes, there are braze-ons on the seat tube of the Roadster and Trail for standard water bottle cages. The Attack has the same braze-ons under the down tube.  Are there Eyelets for fenders? Yes, standard mounting eyelets for fenders front and rear. Will you sell a rear rack? There are mounting points for a rear rack and many aftermarket options will work. We also plan to offer a solution as a stretch goal, so tell your friends! Can you remove the wheels if you need to put it in a car? Absolutely. Both wheels are quick release and can be removed in approximately 25 seconds flat. Next... What happens if I get a Puncture? Go off road or ride high distances in the city and you get plenty of punctures right? Changing a flat on a FLX is exactly the same as on a standard bike. Hub motors make it way more complicated. Just saying. How much maintenance does the motor require? The motor is maintenance free. Our motor manufacturer has been making these types of motors for years so they’ve been thoroughly tested in the factory, in the field and with 1000’s of other customers. If needed the entire motor can also be removed and replaced simply by taking out a couple of bolts instead of dealing with the complexities of replacing a hub motor. Check it out. Nightmare.   LegalWill this comply with the laws in Europe/Australia/Mars?We chose the Bofeili mid motor for its flexibility and high power output. While it can operate for extended periods close to its 650w peak output, the motor is rated 250w, which means it complies with stricter EU regulations. Motors up to 250w nominal power are legal in most countries. The speed limit can be programmed and the throttle can be removed very easily to comply with local laws. What’s the top speed of the Bike? FLX bikes can easily achieve 25mph, for legal reasons, above 25mph the motor cuts out and it’s down to the rider how fast they can pedal. The bikes all have a speedometer in the display so you can see exactly how fast that is. The speed limit in the LCD display can be programmed in about 1 minute to comply with local laws. For off road use only, the speed limit can be removed to reach speeds of up to 30mph.  Do I need a special license to operate one? FLX bikes are legal and classified as an electric bike almost everywhere, and as such don't require a special license. There are a few jurisdictions with more specific laws and we recommend to check those before purchasing. Do I need to wear a helmet? They are required by law in some places and optional in other places. Why are the riders not wearing helmets? On one hand, helmets dramatically reduce fatal and long term head injuries from impact and it is advisable to wear them considering all the drivers texting around you! On the other hand, studies show that helmet laws can actually cause a large unintended negative health impact. We have no place to tell you how to ride, take the facts for what they are and make your own decision. Personally, we wear helmets when it makes sense for us.   Payments and ShippingHow much is shipping?Free shipping to the US, $200 USD to Canada and Mexico, $799 USD international shipping. Can I pick the bike up in SF and avoid the shipping charge?Sorry, we'd love to meet you, but the bikes are shipped from our manufacturing partners by sea and land freight. We have to pay shipping on every bike.  When does it ship? We're shipping now! Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT? The backer is responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It is 0% in the US and varies internationally. You can check this comprehensive list to get started. Is there financing? Yes, you can order your bike on our shop and checkout with Paypal Credit (Bill Me Later) to finance the purchase. The terms are very generous!Can I get a refund?Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here.

story:
For six years, Mayor Tom Barrett has held a Holiday Drive for troops serving overseas. City of Milwaukee employees, community partners, businesses and residents have risen to the challenge and collected thousands of toiletries, snacks, goodies and more to help bring a little holiday cheer to those far away from home during the holidays.

Through this annual effort, more than 2,000 goodie-filled boxes were shipped to Wisconsin troops serving our country overseas in places like Iraq, Afghanistan and Kosovo.

As more and more troops return home from overseas service every month, the focus of the Holiday Drive has shifted to what we can do to help veterans who have completed their service and are back home in our community. The 7th Annual Holiday Drive will benefit the Milwaukee Homeless Veterans Initiative.  

The Holiday Drive’s partnerships are growing, too. This year, County Executive Chris Abele is joining the effort to help make a larger impact and involve communities throughout the County.

We are grateful for all support and donations, but we ask that citizens donate only the items listed below. Items must be unopened and individually packaged. If you have items you'd like to donate that are NOT listed below, such as furniture or appliances, please contact the Milwaukee Homeless Veterans Initiative to see if they accept those items. 

Toothbrushes Dish Soap
Toothpaste Pack of Dish Towels
Dental Floss Pack of Wash Cloths
Pack of Razors Shower Curtain Liners
Shaving Cream Set of Shower Curtain Rings
Deodorant Toilet Paper
Bars of Soap Tissue
Shampoo Hot Pads
Conditioner Salt
Hand Cream Pepper
Combs Foil
Mouthwash Plastic Wrap
Can Openers Box of Baggies
Vegetable Peelers Spatula
Pack of Cleaning Sponges

story:
GoLite • EZ-EV Building • Creating a Light EV Future

The founders of GoLite have 80 years of combined experience in light electric vehicles. With 60% of all car trips less than 6 miles, we know local transportation is better on bikes or simple efficient electric vehicles. With our deep experience, we’ve mostly seen negative experiences with big-money venture capital, which focuses on scale, not quality. While we have designs for many types of light EVs, our first model is a hip urban electric vehicle. We aim to reach the marketplace in a far less expensive and more reasonable manner, we hope to inspire other upcoming light EV makers there is a more accessible pathway to commercialization for them too.

Help Us Democratize Vehicle Design + Manufacturing

We are looking for community support to bring our first model to market, and demonstrate commercialization of light electric vehicles is easier than most might imagine. While conventional thinking would require $3 million in venture capital funding, we aim to show we can make the journey with only 1% of those funds. Our experience tells us it can be done.

But we need your help to succeed on this path. We aim to complete our first Boxer (urban electric delivery vehicle) prototype with your support. When completed, the prototype will also serve as our sales model, to secure initial orders from customers, many are expected to be small business owners that want to deliver their goods to local customers in a 100% electric vehicle. (And we know the delivery business is exploding in these new Covid-19 times). Those expected orders are all that will be needed to set-up our first simple "micro-factory", with several new welders and assemblers on our team. 

We are offering a number of unique perks for contributors that are fueling our dreams for wonderful local mobility + movement, and demonstrating the future of democratized vehicle design + manufacturing. 

Should we secure less funding than desired, all money will go to the prototype / first sales model build and thus require additional time to reach production.

We Got This

As an automobile-dependant nation, we have reached an exciting new time where transportation is becoming highly fragmented - created all new vehicle categories - which offer to improve our communities and cities in a major way. 

The GoLite founders have seen a lot in our many years of experience. We’ve watched business leaders from other industries enter the transportation space, and in one case raise over $800 million from inexperienced venture capital, and then lose every dollar in 3 years. If we aim to rely on this approach to funding, our communities and cities will suffer for it. We can continue to watch companies with business leaders, tight with VC funders continue to raise money and deliver very little with it, or we can back the designers and engineers with the knowledge and passion, and help them go to market directly. 

The GoLite Boxer frame and running gear are complete - We now seek support to complete the body and interior.

The Founders

Erik Blatter - President | Design Lead - Over 30 years of experience in design and developing Light EVs. A GEM co-founder, Porteon and Pangea e-vehicle companies co-founder, designers of first open-air electric transit vehicle in Asia. School: Art Center College of Design

Gary Krysztopik - Tech Lead - 20 years senior engineer and program manager for US Navy underwater warfare division. Engineer and creator of numerous Light EVs over past 10 years - focused on democratized simple Light EV manufacturing. Gary's Zwheelz site

Dan Sturges - Marketing and LEV Systems Lead - Over 30 years experience with Light EV and future multimodal system design | development. GEM co-founder. Created first shared e-bike company, also an educator and journalist. Dan's website.

There Are Sum Risks

While the development funds we seek from you are extremely small for bringing a new electric vehicle to market, we are confident it’s what we require, as we are keeping our costs to the minimum. As designers and engineers first and foremost, it will be essential that we identify and onboard a business leader for our company. This search will take place over the time period we are completing our vehicle.

Initial feedback from local business owners regarding our Boxer design has been highly favorable, and we expect to receive orders for 10% of the first 200 units we plan to manufacture in our first 18 months of operation. There is a chance we will not receive this number of pre-orders and have to modify the design for the market needs, or pursue a different pathway to commercialization. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, we would appreciate any ideas of potential business customers in your city that may want to deliver their goods 100% electric in our Boxer delivery vehicle. Also, as mentioned, we seek to identify a business leader for our company, that will play a central role in building GoLite into a strong and meaningful company. This candidate may be younger, with an MBA degree, and one committed to sustainability and new models of companies that are less about maximum financial performance, and more about maximum community, city, and world improvement.
