story:
We have discovered an environmentally safe, superior electrical energy storage material showing the potential to store a thousand to tens of thousands of times more energy than today's technology.

We think this discovery might just be up there with technology breakthroughs from Albert Einstein, Nikola Tesla, Henry Ford, Thomas Edison, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs.

 

Hey, what can we say - we're scientists, we're excited!

The ZephiQ project brought to you by Crystalline Energy Research Corporation (CER) is more than just offering chargers capable of superior electrical energy storage. It is about transforming what is possible with electrical energy storage. Once our technology is fully developed it will radically improve people's lives and industries relying on batteries and stored energy. Products with our technology inside will store phenomenally more electrical energy in a drastically smaller size!

This project will have a very positive global impact and we need your support.  In exchange for your help we would like to offer you the ZephiQ chargers with the superior technology only we can put inside.

 ...........................................................................................................................

 

/// ZephiQ technology inside cell phone and laptop chargers

The table below shows the number of charges that would be available with this new technology inside our ZephiQ chargers. We selected various cell phones, tablets and laptop mAh ratings to come up with the ranges.  It all depends on your cell phone, tablet, or laptop energy ratings. You get the idea. We knew it was going to be massive - we even triple checked our math!

 

 CER ZephiQ mU
with 304 wH		 CER ZephiQ U
with 2061 wH		 CER ZephiQ LX
with 9590 wH
Cell phone # of charges 27 to 29 179 to 196 833 to 1330
Tablet / iPads # of charges 14 to 17 59 to 95 276 to 443
Laptop # of charges use laptop ZephiQ use laptop ZephiQ 124 to 164
  • ZephiQ mU (Micro USB) - recharge your micro USB acceptable cell phone.
  • ZephiQ U (USB) - recharge any phone or device capable of being charged via USB.
  • ZephiQ LX (Laptop Extreme) -  Laptop + separate built-in USB to charge your laptop and other USB capable device from one ZephiQ.

 ...........................................................................................................................

/// More WOW Factor

The possibilities are endless! 

  • Electric cars that can go 1000 miles on a single charge. - YES!
  • Electric trucks with the horse power that you expect in a truck. - YES!
  • Having back up power ready for you in times of power outages from a device that does not require fuel like a generator does. - YES!
  • Cure for sleepless nights - No, not yet! Even our scientists wake up in the middle of the night. Fortunately for us, they actually work through the night when they get ideas!

 What could you imagine with superior electrical energy storage in any device?

...........................................................................................................................

 

/// How does our technology compare to today's energy storage technology

"Warp Speed" anyone? (ok, so if you haven't guessed by now, we are a little techie!)

Our technology is based on a new composition (not based on Barium Titanate). Our new composition has created an advanced new crystal structure capable of massive energy storage.

When comparing our single layer ceramic disc capacitor (think of a capacitor as the container that holds electrical energy) to an industry standard Barium Titanate single layer ceramic disc capacitor (similar size), the results are phenomenal and exponentially greater!

If you're a science techie like we are and want to read the wiki about capacitance click here.

What does our discovery mean for you?

Our technology holds more electrical energy in a smaller, safer and more compact unit. Every battery and capacitor manufacturer should be able to take our technology and incorporate it into their products. Batteries and products using capacitors (which are in 99% of electronics) would now have massive amounts of stored electrical energy. For example, your cell phone battery that currently lasts 10 - 48 hours, could be replaced with our ZephiQ technology and would NOW last you over 350 hours.

The tables below compare just one of the many applications in our daily lives - external chargers (cell phone / tablet charging and laptop charging).

Compare the number of cell phone / tablet charges that will be available in the ZephiQ U vs. other products on the market advertising the largest mAh capacity. In addition the ZephiQ U will be 80% smaller than these other products.

 

 CER ZephiQ U

Turcom

Intocircuit Ankor Astro Pro2
Samsung with 2100 mAh rating 196 16 12 9
iPhone 5 / 4s with 1440 mAh rating 286 23 18 13
HTC with 2300 mAh rating 179 14 11 8
iPad / iPad2 with 6944 mAh rating 59 4 3 2
Google Nexus with 4325 mAh rating 95 7 6 4

Compare the number of Laptop charges that will be available in the ZephiQ Laptop Extreme (LX) vs. other products on the market advertising their largest mAh capacity. In addition the ZephiQ LX will be 50% smaller than these other products. The ZephiQ LX also comes with a built in USB charging port so you can also charge cell phone and tablets.

 

 CER ZephiQ Laptop Extreme (LX) Turcom Intocircuit Ankor Astro Pro2
Dell INSP 17-3721 with 5200 mAh rating 164 6 4 3
17"MacBK Pro with 7100 mAh rating 124 4 3 2
Samsung with 2100 mAh rating 913 16 12 9
iPhone 5 / 4s with 1440 mAh rating 1330 23 18 13
Google Nexus with 4325 mAh rating 443 7 6 4
The ZephiQ chargers provide so much more energy in a smaller size compared to these other charging units!

 

Depending on the ZephiQ charger you select it will come with:

ZephiQ mU includes (only for micro USB devices):

  • 1 micro USB charging connection
  • 1 wall cord
  • 308 wH

ZephiQ U includes:

  • 1 USB charging connection
  • 1 wall cord
  • 2061 wH.

ZephiQ LX includes:

  • 1 Laptop charging cord with universal plug and 6 different size tips to fit your laptop model.
  • 1 built in USB charging connection to charge devices via USB.
  • 1 wall cord
  • 9590 wH.

Want to know more about the science? We can share some information - just not the secrets!

More information

/// Our progress

We have discovered and tested the prototype materials and formulas.  We are ready to implement the Tier II R&D project plan.  The next steps include advanced R&D with additional equipment and a scale up of our facility and staff in order to optimize the materials' scientific properties.  Once we optimize the materials and formulas, we will prepare it for manufacturing. 

We are confident that the R&D will be successful and have a positive global impact. Our team’s experience in chemistry, materials science, electrical engineering, manufacturing, and research and development will help us bring this discovery to the world.

/// Use of proceeds

We are looking to raise these funds to accelerate the R&D timeline. Imagine looking at a world changing technology and saying “I helped support that project”! Your support will help us cover the cost of additional R&D equipment, materials and components, testing, and operations.

We have invested our own funds over the past 3 years for Tier I R&D to develop and prove that this technology is realistic.  We're confident in our prototype materials and in asking for your help.

/// Our values and mission

The ZephiQ project is very important to us. We believe this technology will change people’s lives and help the environment.  Our vision is to bring the imagination and dreams of the future to present day reality with new ways of storing electrical energy.  We believe all things are possible to those who say "What if? Why not? Let's try!" Our Mission is to develop state-of-the-art technological advancements that benefit all.

/// About us

The ZephiQ Project is brought to you by Crystalline Energy Research Corporation (CER). CER was founded to conduct dedicated research and development on innovative and revolutionary solid state ceramic hybrid composite capacitor materials.  Specifically, CER will focus on the material's use and applications for electrical energy storage components and systems as well as new advanced capacitors.  Connected with this R&D are increases in electrical energy storage efficiencies for electric vehicles and the associated charging infrastructures.

Additional information about the ZephiQ project is located at www.zephiq.com

/// FAQ

We are happy to answer questions about this project. Well except some like: What is it made of? How do you make it? Can I have a sample? To those questions our response is: Sorry, we wish we could, but we have to keep that a secret.

What is difference between a battery and ceramic capacitor?

A battery is a chemical generator that produces electrical energy as a result of chemical activity or a chemical reaction. A capacitor is an electrical device capable of storing electrical energy in the form of electrons. A capacitor is not a chemical generator.

Why does your new ceramic capacitor have the capability to store more electrical energy than regular ceramic capacitors?

Our new ceramic capacitor has the capability to store greater amounts of electrical energy because it has a massively higher dielectric constant than regular ceramic capacitors. One could even think of our new ceramic capacitor having a hyper dielectric constant.

What is the dielectric constant?

The dielectric constant is a unitless number that represents the capability of an insulating material, like that found in a ceramic capacitor, to store electric charge when a voltage is applied to the capacitor. The greater the dielectric constant, the greater the amount of electric energy able to be stored.

Can a ceramic capacitor catch fire or leak?

No, a ceramic capacitor is not able to catch fire or leak.

How long will a ceramic capacitor last when it is run through charging and discharging cycles?

Ceramic capacitors can last longer than 10 to 20 years in charging and discharging cycles.

How is your new ceramic capacitor different from an ultra-capacitor?

Our new ceramic capacitor operates in a temperature range of -70°C up to at least +250°C. Ultra-capacitors only operate in a temperature range of -30°C to +90°C and can only be charged with about 5 volts maximum. Our new ceramic capacitor will be able to be charged with thousands of volts when the materials and formulas are optimized.

What power standards does ZephiQ work with?

Primary power in is 120 VAC.

How will I charge my phone if it does not have a micro USB?

You will want to purchase the ZephiQ USB or the ZephiQ Laptop with built-in USB and use the USB charging cord provided with your device.

How will I charge my Laptop?

The ZephiQ laptop models will come with a universal charging cord and 6 different sized power tips. Select the tip that fits your laptop and simply attached the tip to the universal charging cord. Then plug one end of the charging cord into the ZephiQ and the other end into your laptop.

How do I recharge the ZephiQ?

Simply use the charging cord that came with your ZephiQ. Plug one end into the ZephiQ and then the other end into the wall outlet.

How long does it take to recharge the ZephiQ?

If the unit has been fully discharged, it may take an overnight charge (12 - 18 hours) to fully recharge. 

Shipping Questions?

We offer free ground shipping in the USA. There will be a $30 shipping charge (if a physical item is shipped), per order, for all international orders. Special fees, such as customs fees or country specific fees may apply. We will contact you directly if special fees apply and make arrangements with you.

For international orders, if you forget to include the $30 per device to your contribution, please make a new contribution via Indiegogo.  Email your original order confirmation and shipping confirmation to contact@zephiq.com.

We think this discovery might just be up there with technology breakthroughs from Albert Einstein, Nikola Tesla, Henry Ford, Thomas Edison, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs. 
 
Hey, what can we say - we're scientists, we're excited!

Once our technology is fully developed it will radically improve people's lives and industries relying on batteries and stored energy. Products with our technology inside will store phenomenally more electrical energy in a drastically smaller size!

story:
ACRON – a Swiss / German Revolution in e-Mobility!

New record-breaking smart e-Drive for e-Bikes, carrier tricycles, messenger bikes, spinning bikes etc.

Founding for Growth!

We intend to set up a large-scale series production, - at the same time enhancing Smart Control by full integration to your mobile or laptop at home.  As a private, team-owned development company we are currently looking for an independent crowd-based funding for this challenge. Be part of this incredible success story and contribute! The funding will be used for building up a assembly line and a material stock for the planned >1000 motors.

Test-Winning Technology from Switzerland and Germany!

After years of development, passing all relevant tests and approvals and after proving the durability in professional carrier tricycles (as used by Pizza delivery services and many others) with thousands of kilometers (in Gobax bikes), the ACRON e-Drive is now ready for the next step; -to move into large-scale series production.

The development of the ACRON-drive was a joint team-cooperation between a Swiss team (Electragil - engine hardware) and a German team (Pro Design - controller,  sensor technology).

The revolutionary concept of the ACRON e-Drive beat all competitors by lengths at its first market introduction and won a series of tests in many renowned European bicycle journals! The ACRON e-drive even beat no lesser than the current market leader - BOSCH !.

Natural Riding, a new Experience in Riding Dynamics

Core of the cutting-edge -technology of the ACRON-drive is the newly developed electronically controlled asynchronous motor. The most significant development being the newly developed electronic control featuringinfinite torque measurement and control.

“First time I was riding the Silent-e with the ACRON-drive, I was completely astonished!
I took a short tour through a village at high speed(>30mph) and on a steep up-hill passage,for the first time in my life had to brake in the turns whilegoing uphill!  It was really an amazing experience, but I actually never had the feeling that I was being supported by an electric motor. The bike only feels like you are having the best physical condition of your life. And another great thing I experienced was, that the ACRON controller gives you the ability to program a training workout with a specified supporting profile.
“ M. Ziegler, Germany

Starting to ride the Silent-e you hear no noise – and you feel no uncomfortable pushy motor activity – you only have the feeling that your physical performance is incredibly good, i.e. that YOU are doing extremely well! The ACRON is the one and only e-Drive with a seamless transition between muscle power and ful e-driven biking. With a range of up to 700 Watts (depending on the type of e-Bike, usage profile and local legal regulations) it is an incredibly rewarding riding experience andfun just the same for elderly people, young sportive bikers, mountain bikers and people who use the bike professionally (e.g. messengers and delivery services).

The ACRON smart e-Motor

The ACRON motor forms the basis for a large number of different e-bike solutions on the market. Its compact and powerful technology in combination with the smart control opens a totally new driving experience and an abundance of new applications.

The e-motor is located on the left side of the bottom bracket enclosed in a cast-aluminium housing. Surprisingly enough, this motor is not a direct drive but a planetary gear layout designed for improvement of power and comfort. The Swiss precision planetary gear works almost without noise and leads to an astonishingly (clockwork-like) smooth function of the motor.

The main motivation behind the sophisticated sensor technology was the idea to realize the same comfort while driving an e-Bike ‑just like driving a high-performance standard bike. In this extraordinary bike concept load transmission is direct; -working on a 10-gear sprocket cassette on the rear wheel (range 11-36), in order to cover all relevant operating speeds.

The ACRON motor is the first commercial solution in this field with an integrated Energy-Bus protocol which opens a new world in e-mobility. The energy bus is able to automatically control an unlimited number of parallel batteries, -plug and play- and thereby optimizes the energy usage of all available power sources.

The torque sensor is a key development within the ACRON project, ) computing approx. 280.000(!) measurements per full turn! This leads to coverage of the smallest change in force and leg position and thereby the resulting reaction of motor in real time mode(!). The biker obviously cannot feel these incredibly fast reactions of the motor and as a result, it feels like his own performance. The motor usually delivers 250W and 40Nm torque, but for selected applications it is designed to deliver up to 700W /100Nm torque.

Noteworthy enough is the use of two extremely slim Li-Ion batteries, which are fitted in a cradle on the left and right side of the center frame. These powerful companions operate in single or dual mode, each with 310Wh /36V. Charging time to full recharge is 2.5h with any energy bus charging station.

The ACRON motor successfully passed a 30mph endurance test and has also successfully passed the rigid German Motor Vehicles Ministry (KBA) homologation for carrier bikes and is ready for many other application in Europe, North America and Asia.

Google Glass integration as Additional Feature

The system architecture of the ACRON electronic propulsions systemhas the unique possibility to integrate future Google Glass applications, e.g to obtain information about the current performance, the most energy-efficient roads or many other informations, such as close-by charging stations; or even to locate roads especially suited for your personal workout scheme. First applications will be developed in 2014; ‑preferrably in close cooperation with Google Glass App - developers.

First Products are Ready to enter the Market Now!

The ultimate e-Bike on the Market: The Silent-e with ACRON smart e-Drive!


From smart City Bikes to “Fully” e-Mountain Bikes

The Silent-e was first presented on the EUROBIKE 2013 and is ready to be ordered and sold in 2014. The bike is a direct result of Thomas Klotzbuecher’s many years’ experience as bike-developer. Thomas was responsible for the Merida product lines in previous years. The team around Thomas designed the frame specifically for an e-Drive -taking advantage of this new dynamic concept for a perfect riding experience!

Based on the success of the first user of the ACRON drive, the Gobax -brand (Eurobike Award 2010, BrandNewAward 2012, Founder Price Baden-Wuerttemberg), the development of the Silent-e now offers proven cutting-edge-technology.


Team Competence for in the Silent-e Project

The Gobax-team is well-known in the biker scene, in consequencea guarantee factor for future developments. Robert Dorn, owner of Gobax and Thomas Klotzbuecher as product manager and developer for the same company were part of the most professional bike development teams in the past few years.

X-Intersected Tubes a special Innovation

The stunningly different frame of the Silent-e is a result of the aforementioned joint competence, which was developed on the one hand as a unisex design and for high stiffness and safety / comfort on the other. Key feature of the new frame is the massive main tube,-playfully intersected twice by the slimmer upper tube. This remarkable concept leads to an extremely stiff interconnection between rear and front part of the bike, which is absolutely necessary to cope with the new motor’s high output.. All of these technologies were first successfully introduced (and proven!) in professional Gobax carrier bikes.

Other high-tech features are a result of downhill offroad racing: massive machined parts for length adjustment, as a base for different derailer and gear equipment, professional front forks with massive 32mm diameter tubes as an answer to the most recent safety requirements as well as high performance hydraulic disk brakes with 203mm diameter.

To sum it all up, this bike was designed especially for integration of a powerful, highly dynamic e-Drive featuring the technical state-of-the-art of professional biking. Although the Silent-e may be regarded “merely ” as a general biking solution for the average biker, it’s feasibility for both, a professional “fully” mountain bike or a racing bike is obvious. .

The company’s current pipeline includes the “Silent Wave”, “Silent Surfer“, “Silent Transformer“ and the “Silent Racer”.

Technical Properties of the smart ACRON e-Drive

Motor

  • Available Versions:
    • 250 Watts (15 mph)
    • 330 Watts (30mph) and
    • up to 700 Watts (>35mph)
      (permanent power adjustable via the controller)
  • Integrated planetary gear drive
    • 40Nm max. torque
  • Support of a pedaling frequency of up to 110 rpm
  • Real-time high-precision measurement of system power, torque and velocity
  • Weight of the entire drive assembly: merely 4,5kg
  • Integrated EnergyBus standard

Controller

  • Simple, intuitive operation with a turn-click wheel
  • Combined segmented matrix display with high contrast, -optimized readability in all ambient light conditions
  • User-friendly menues and comfortable programming
  • Background lighting for night riding
  • Extendable Energy-bus functionality through the application interface

Batteries

  • 310 Watt-hours / 36 Volts
  • Li-Ion technology
  • Weight 2.2 kg each.
  • Unlimited number of energy-bus - conform batteries can be operated simultaneously
  • Batteries can be charged -mounted or unmounted
  • Integrated charging indicator

Charging Station

  • High-power charging station with 300Watts
  • Based on the Energy bus protocol, to be compliant to all new battery types on the market
  • Simultaneous charging of more than one battery
  • Adjustable charging profiles

ADVANTAGES OF THE ACRON DRIVE AT A GLANCE

  • Outstanding concept of power transmission to rear wheel over chain&sprockets
  • Silent drive - based on precision gear technology
  • Complete decoupling of motor and bottom bracket shaft (strictly decoupled load path)
  • Extremely sensitive torque measurement of forces (linear up to 40kg for each leg)
  • Consideration of current speed
  • Consideration of driving dynamics (inclination slope, braking action, leg force and leg position)
  • Flexible system platform based on the Energy-bus protocol
  • High system integration for real-time power control
  • Large stator diameter guarantees stabilityof constant high-torque
  • Low weight position: safe!Almost maintenance-free electric drive (>20.000miles)
  • Simplicity of frame integration

    Additional Information: Journals, Tests

    Winner of several e-Bike-tests in Europe!

    www.velojournal.ch

    Electragil
    ExtraEnergy

    E-Bike Finderhttp://www.e-bike-finder.com

the planned >1000 motors.

Test-Winning Technology from
Switzerland and Germany!

After years of development, passing all relevant tests and approvals and
after proving the durability in professional carrier tricycles (as used by Pizza
delivery services and many others) with thousands of kilometers (in Gobax bikes),
the ACRON e-Drive is now ready for the next step; -to move into large-scale
series production. 
The development of the ACRON-drive was a joint team-cooperation between a Swiss
team (Electragil - engine hardware) and a German team (Pro Design - controller, 
sensor technology).
The revolutionary concept of the ACRON e-Drive beat all competitors by
lengths at its first market introduction
and won a series of tests in many renowned European bicycle journals! The ACRON e-drive even beat no lesser than the current market leader - BOSCH !.

Natural Riding,
a new Experience in Riding Dynamics

Core of the cutting-edge -technology of the ACRON-drive is the newly
developed electronically controlled asynchronous motor. The most significant
development being the newly developed electronic control featuringinfinite torque
measurement and control. 
“First time I was riding the Silent-e with the
ACRON-drive, I was completely astonished! 
I took a short tour through a village at high speed(>30mph) and on a steep up-hill
passage,for the first time in my life had to brake in the turns whilegoing uphill!  It was really
an amazing experience, but I actually never had the feeling that I was being supported
by an electric motor. The bike only feels like you are having the best physical
condition of your life. And another great
thing I experienced was, that the ACRON controller gives you the ability to program
a training workout with a specified supporting profile. 
“ M. Ziegler, Germany
Starting to ride the Silent-e you hear no noise – and you feel no
uncomfortable pushy motor activity – you only have the feeling that your physical
performance is incredibly good, i.e. that YOU are doing extremely well! The
ACRON is the one and only e-Drive with a seamless transition between muscle
power and ful e-driven biking. With a range of up to 700 Watts (depending on
the type of e-Bike, usage profile and local legal regulations) it is an incredibly
rewarding riding experience andfun just
the same for elderly people, young sportive bikers, mountain bikers and people
who use the bike professionally (e.g. messengers and delivery services).

The ACRON smart e-Motor 

The ACRON motor forms the basis for a large number of different e-bike solutions
on the market. Its compact and powerful technology in combination with the
smart control opens a totally new driving experience and an abundance of new applications.
The e-motor is located on the left side of the bottom bracket enclosed in a
cast-aluminium housing. Surprisingly enough, this motor is not a direct drive
but a planetary gear layout designed for improvement of power and comfort. The Swiss
precision planetary gear works almost without noise and leads to an
astonishingly (clockwork-like) smooth function of the motor. 
The main motivation behind the sophisticated sensor technology was the idea
to realize the same comfort while driving an e-Bike ‑just like driving a high-performance
standard bike. In this extraordinary bike concept load transmission is direct; -working
on a 10-gear sprocket cassette on the rear wheel (range 11-36), in order to cover all relevant operating
speeds.
The ACRON motor is the first commercial solution in this field with an
integrated Energy-Bus protocol which opens a new world in e-mobility. The
energy bus is able to automatically control an unlimited number of parallel batteries,
-plug and play- and thereby optimizes the energy usage of all available power sources.
The torque sensor is a key development within the ACRON project, ) computing
approx. 280.000(!) measurements per full turn! This leads to coverage of the
smallest change in force and leg position and thereby the resulting reaction of
motor in real time mode(!). The biker obviously cannot feel these incredibly fast
reactions of the motor and as a result, it feels like his own performance. The
motor usually delivers 250W and 40Nm torque, but for selected applications it is
designed to deliver up to 700W /100Nm torque.
Noteworthy enough is the use of two extremely slim Li-Ion batteries, which are
fitted in a cradle on the left and right side of the center frame. These
powerful companions operate in single or dual mode, each with 310Wh /36V. Charging
time to full recharge is 2.5h with any energy bus charging station. 
The ACRON motor successfully passed a 30mph endurance test and has also successfully
passed the rigid German Motor Vehicles Ministry (KBA) homologation for carrier
bikes and is ready for many other application in Europe, North America and Asia.

Google Glass integration as Additional Feature

The system architecture of the ACRON electronic propulsions systemhas the unique
possibility to integrate future Google Glass applications, e.g to obtain information
about the current performance, the most energy-efficient roads or many other informations,
such as close-by charging stations; or even
to locate roads especially suited for your personal workout scheme. First
applications will be developed in 2014; ‑preferrably in close cooperation with Google
Glass App - developers. 

First Products are Ready to enter the Market Now!

The ultimate e-Bike on the Market: The Silent-e with ACRON smart
e-Drive!From smart City Bikes to “Fully”
e-Mountain Bikes

The Silent-e was first presented on the EUROBIKE 2013 and is ready to be ordered
and sold in 2014. The bike is a direct result of Thomas Klotzbuecher’s many years’
experience as bike-developer. Thomas was responsible for the Merida product
lines in previous years. The team around Thomas designed the frame specifically
for an e-Drive -taking advantage of this new dynamic concept for a perfect riding
experience!
Based on the success of the first user of the ACRON drive, the Gobax -brand
(Eurobike Award 2010, BrandNewAward
2012, Founder Price Baden-Wuerttemberg), the development of the Silent-e
now offers proven cutting-edge-technology.



Team Competence for in the Silent-e Project

The Gobax-team is well-known in the biker scene, in consequencea guarantee factor
for future developments. Robert Dorn, owner of Gobax and Thomas Klotzbuecher as
product manager and developer for the same company were part of the most professional
bike development teams in the past few years. 

X-Intersected Tubes a special Innovation

The stunningly different frame of the Silent-e is a result of the
aforementioned joint competence, which was developed on the one hand as a unisex design and for
high stiffness and safety / comfort on the other. Key feature of the new frame is
the massive main tube,-playfully intersected twice by the slimmer upper tube.
This remarkable concept leads to an extremely stiff interconnection between rear and front
part of the bike, which is absolutely necessary to cope with the new motor’s high
output.. All of these technologies were first successfully introduced (and
proven!) in professional Gobax carrier bikes.
Other high-tech features are a result of downhill offroad racing: massive
machined parts for length adjustment, as a base for different derailer and gear
equipment, professional front forks with massive 32mm diameter tubes as an
answer to the most recent safety requirements as well as high performance hydraulic disk brakes with
203mm diameter.
To sum it all up, this bike was designed especially for integration of a
powerful, highly dynamic e-Drive featuring
the technical state-of-the-art of professional biking. Although the Silent-e may
be regarded “merely ” as a general biking solution for the average biker, it’s feasibility
for both, a professional “fully” mountain bike or a racing bike is obvious. .
The company’s current pipeline includes the “Silent Wave”, “Silent Surfer“,
“Silent Transformer“ and the “Silent Racer”.


Technical Properties of the smart
ACRON e-Drive 


Motor 


Available Versions: 

250 Watts (15 mph) 
330 Watts (30mph) and 
up to 700 Watts (>35mph) 
      (permanent power adjustable via the controller)

Integrated planetary gear drive

40Nm max. torque

Support of a pedaling frequency of up to 110 rpm
Real-time high-precision measurement of system power,
     torque and velocity
Weight of the entire drive assembly: merely 4,5kg
Integrated EnergyBus standard

Controller


Simple, intuitive operation with a turn-click
     wheel
Combined segmented matrix display with high
     contrast, -optimized readability in all ambient light conditions
User-friendly menues and comfortable programming 
Background lighting for night
     riding
Extendable Energy-bus functionality through the application interface

Batteries


310 Watt-hours / 36 Volts
Li-Ion technology
Weight 2.2 kg each.
Unlimited number of energy-bus - conform batteries
     can be operated simultaneously 
Batteries can be charged -mounted or unmounted
Integrated charging indicator

Charging Station


High-power charging station with 300Watts
Based on the Energy bus protocol, to be compliant
     to all new battery types on the market
Simultaneous charging of more than one battery 
Adjustable charging profiles


ADVANTAGES OF THE ACRON DRIVE AT
A GLANCE


Outstanding concept of power transmission to rear
     wheel over chain&sprockets
Silent drive - based on precision gear technology
Complete decoupling of motor and bottom bracket
     shaft (strictly decoupled load path)
Extremely sensitive torque measurement of forces
     (linear up to 40kg for each leg)
Consideration of current speed
Consideration of driving dynamics (inclination slope,
     braking action, leg force and leg position)
Flexible system platform based on the Energy-bus
     protocol
High system integration for real-time power control
Large stator diameter guarantees stabilityof constant
     high-torque 
Low weight position: safe!Almost maintenance-free
     electric drive (>20.000miles)
Simplicity of frame integration


Additional Information: Journals,
Tests


Winner of several e-Bike-tests
in Europe!

www.velojournal.ch
Electragil
ExtraEnergyE-Bike Finderhttp://www.e-bike-finder.com

story:
Background

41 years ago (1980-1981), my grandfather Laurentiu Moldovan, a former professional rally car driver and Guinness World Record holder for the longest career as a motor racing driver, built and raced the first Formula Easter (single-seater race car) in Romania. The LGM1 was built while Romania was under communist leadership, making it difficult to access resources to complete such a project. His love for cars and racing manifested itself into the determination to build a vehicle that he could race during this difficult time in Romanian history. 

41 years later, former Romanian professional racing car driver and car journalist Edwin Keleti, discovered the remains of the LGM1 and set out to restore it to its original form. The restoration began in November 2020 and has been progressing everyday since. However, in order for the LGM1 to be restored completely, Edwin needs an additional €10,000 (approx. $15,000 CAD). Approximately €3000 will be given to the welder who has graciously helped Edwin throughout the project - free of charge. The remainder will be used for materials.

We have 41 days to fund the restoration of a 41-year-old race car!

The Project So Far

The LGM1 being built by my grandfather in 1980 and competing in the 1980-1981 season:

My grandfather, Laurentiu Moldovan, pictured with the LGM1 chassis:

Closer look at chassis:

My father and grandfather pictured with the LGM1 chassis:

Edwin Keleti as a child pictured to the right of my grandfather:

The LGM1 closer to completion:

My father, grandfather, and great-grandfather picture with the completed LGM1:

The LGM1 in a race:

Laurentiu Moldovan and the LGM1 being featured on the cover of the "Autoturism" magazine:

The Wreck: 

This is the state that the LGM1 was in when Edwin found it in 2020:

Reconstruction:

Sandblasting the chassis in order to remove 40 year-old paint:

Bodywork Reconstruction:

The fiberglass parts are original and in decent condition. 

There are certain parts that will need to be removed or added to regain the original shape, however the LGM1's nose will be reproduced according to original dimensions as it was missing from the wreck.

Chassis Reconstruction:

Significant damage and rust was found on the original chassis, so a great deal of work needed to be done.

This is the current state of the LGM1. Funding is needed to progress the project further.

Parts:

Here are some of the parts that Edwin has been able to find. These are the same as those used when my grandfather built the LGM1.

 

LGM1 in the Media

Observator

Autorally

TVR News

RallyMax

MotorClasic

Purpose

For me, this project is about honouring my grandfather. For others like Edwin and Romanian car enthusiasts, it is a way to remember and celebrate an important part of Romanian automobile history and ultimately bring the LGM1 back to life. The goal is for the LGM1 to race again one day in the near future.

Follow Along

To get a closer, behind-the-scenes look at the LGM1 project, visit the links below:

Facebook

Instagram

Website

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in the position to contribute financially, please consider sharing the LGM1 project over social media, through word of mouth, etc.

Anything helps. Thank you!

story:
Freedom:  Feel it. Flaunt it.

         Meet the new electric, stand-up ride where true performance meets stability and portability.

                                           FEATURES

         - Patented 3-Wheel Cambering Frame Design

         - Spring-Loaded, Quick-Click Frame Folding System

         - Progressive, Sine-Wave Controller with Auto Shut-Down

         - Direct Drive, Brushless Hubmotor

         - Quick-Swap Lithium Ion Battery w/ Removable Key Ignition

         - Custom Slick, Sticky Tires & Dual Rear Brakes

         - Super Ergonomic, Adjustable Mini Ape Handlebars

         - Twist-and-Go Throttle with Battery Charge Indicator

Why Freedom?

Bill: "I love it because I can use it to do some intense exercise, or go over the Brooklyn bridge! How cool is that or even go to my dentist..."

EASY AND INTUITIVE-  yet performs like nothing else on the market. Freedom is a new, agile &  dynamic ride - accessible to all.


Jörg: "The Electric Trikke is the only electric vehicle that combines sport and fun with personal transport."

THE FEELING. It's a sensation of independence, elation and effortless flow that rivals a fine powder run. 

Cheryl: "The movement. Power to go anywhere, nearly effortless, yet a great workout. Is there any other competition??? Needed more FUN in my life. Trikke delivered~!"

THE ADVENTURE.  The journey is the destination. Freedom lets you push limits, discover new places and open up your world in the most exhilarating way.

THE FUN.  Just add pavement.

  

Dennis: "I’m using mine to save gas, especially to run errands around town. It is by far, the smartest, most economical and coolest vehicle I've ever found. I'm addicted to its intuitive ride. This device is way ahead of the curve and has competitors in this market beat." 

THE SIMPLICITY. Less is more. Elegant design. Clean power. Lighter weight. Quick and easy to fold up and store in a car, train, bus or workplace.   

Jenard: "I use it to get to work. I park blocks away to get the free parking."


 (You can fit 3 Freedoms in the back of a hatchback)

THE STABILITY. No matter the speed - you're steady and balanced. Three sticky wheels on the ground at all times and our patented cambering (leaning) frame give you the confidence to lean as deeply into your turns as needed. 

THE FUNCTIONALITY.  It's amazing what you can carry with you.  

Roger: "It's also great for hitting all the 'hot spots' at Tailgate Parties! When I have multiple stops downtown or at the beach, I bring my electric Trikke along. I park ONCE, and use it to get my chores done in HALF the TIME, while not having to fight the traffic or look for additional parking."

THE VISIBILITY. Step up on Freedom and you’re already 10 inches taller. That’s a major safety benefit when it comes to being seen and seeing over and around cars, people, and whatever other obstacles life throws in your path.

Chris: "Makes your commute the favorite part of your day..."

THE FITNESS. Most of us spend far too much time sitting down. Freedom lets you stand up and get healthier with every trip around town. And if you really want to get in shape, Freedom can give you an insane, full-body strength and cardio work out when you propel without the motor - using your arms, core and lower body in a fluid, low impact motion.

Get up stand up ... stand up for your rides...

“From a fitness perspective, the Trikke is low impact and works your legs and upper body … It’s an enormous amount of fun.” TIME Magazine

“It’s simple, elegant, side-to-side rocking motion delivers a thorough all-body workout.” Los Angeles Times

"Incredibly stable on high-speed turns and safe on the steeps ... Trikke blasts the upper body, abs, legs in a superb all-body workout. By using the rhythmic back-and-forth dip-the-hip motion reminiscent of downhill skiing, you can make smooth S-turns along any paved surface." Men's Journal
FREEDOM FOR WHO? FOR ALL

From the cost-conscious student to the eco-conscious urban dweller, Freedom offers a way to move that’s easy on the wallet and good for the planet. Young daredevils can push Freedom to its high-performance limits, and older riders can appreciate the fun, stable ride. You won’t ever outgrow Freedom by TRIKKE. In fact, we know of a former US President in his 90s who still enjoys a good carve on his TRIKKE.


FREEDOM TO MAKE AN IMPACT

When you ride Freedom, you're taking a stand for your health and the health of the planet. Go ahead and lead by example. And have a great time while you’re doing it.

Why launch now?

After years of development, TRIKKE has put the best of everything we know into a new design of uncompromising quality, and we are now prepared to bring you Freedom at an extraordinary value.

All the design work has been completed. The prototypes have been tested. We’re currently running a small pre-production to bring Freedom up to top TRIKKE standards. With your help we can throttle up and get Freedom into final production. We’re ready. We hope you are too.

Celebrate Freedom

 Please join us and celebrate Freedom - our best vehicle Ever. (We've come a long way since our early models landed us on the cover of TIME Magazine....)

                            


Renderings and Specs 

What you've seen in the photos and videos have been prototypes. Below are some renderings and the specs of the final product. 




SPECIFICATIONS:


Perks:
Freedom Wing Trucker's Hat:

                                       

Freedom logo T-Shirt (please let us know male or female and your desired size)

The rest of the perks are Freedom electric carving vehicles... We think you know what those look like by now ;)

Rider testimonials above and below are of our earlier models (pre new, improved hub motor and controller and better price)

Jenard: I use it to get to work. I park blocks away to get the free parking. 

Frank: Poetry In Motion

Dennis: This device is way ahead of the curve and has competitors in this market beat.

Jörg: The Electric Trikke is the only electric vehicle that combines sport and fun with personal transport. No other electric vehicle is so agile, fast, light and flexible. All our customers, whether for business or pleasure are very satisfied with their Trikke electric. And even if the battery is empty, you can continue your journey with body movement. No other electric vehicle offers this opportunity! We love our E-Trikke ;-)

Chris: Makes your commute the favorite part of your day...

Wilson: I use the battery for tough uphills, wind, and fatigue. I so enjoy the feeling of speed when using the electric motor. It's a thrill I didn't experience on my T-8 unless coming down on hills. Difference is I can get the "need for speed" at any time.

Bill: I love it because I can use it to do some intense exercise, or go over the Brooklyn bridge!!! How cool is that or even go to my dentist...

Douglass:There is nothing like a little power assist when you just don't feel like getting out on your manual model. So much fun and great for bombing hills.

Dennis: I’m using mine to save gas, especially to run errands around town. It is by far, the smartest, most economical and coolest vehicle I've ever found. I can ride the bike paths here on the Vineyard and I must say, I have no trouble negotiating traffic while in Boston or Cambridge. I'm addicted to its intuitive ride. It turns on a dime and gives you a nickel back! The "wow" factor of passers by is also adoring. The other MAJOR factor is that you do not have to use the "juice" to make it go. You'll get a full body exercise rocking & rolling it. I like to mix it up, using the throttle to augment my body & maintain speed to maximize battery life.  Remember: if the battery quits you can still get home.

Cheryl: The movement. Power to go anywhere, nearly effortless, yet a great workout. Is there any other competition??? Needed more FUN in my life. Trikke delivered!

Roger: The Tribred Pon-e is handy for 'Major Events' where you have to find parking space BLOCKS (or even miles) away. Just unfold it and cruise (with all your stuff) to the site. It's also great for hitting all the 'hot spots' at Tailgate Parties! When I have multiple stops downtown or at the beach, I bring my electric Trikke along. I park ONCE, and use it to get my chores done in HALF the TIME, while not having to fight the traffic or look for additional parking. Just wish I could use the Trikke 'inside' the stores as well.....Humm, maybe one of those Blue Plackards with the wheelchair.....is the Ticket! Plus: while an E-Bike is a "Pain in the 'tookus'"; the Tribred Pon-e is "Up-Standing" FUN!

FAQs

How fast does it go? For a rider of 175 lbs (80 kgs) top speed will be about 15 mph (24 kph) on the flats.

How far can I go on a charge?  On electric-power alone, range is approximately 11 miles/charge on the 6.6 Ah battery that comes with the Freedom. If you upgrade to the 9Ah battery the range increases to approximately 15 miles. Some choose to get an extra battery as well to go further. Add your own carving propulsion and you could double that and get a killer workout.

Do I have to carve turns to make it go? Nope. Carving turns can make it go farther and faster and propel you without using the motor, but you can just cruise on all electric too.

Is the battery removable? Yep. You just twist the key all the way to the left and pull it straight up off the guide rail.

How long does it take to recharge the battery? A full recharge takes 4 hours from empty.

How do I recharge the battery? It comes with a charger that plugs into the wall outlet and into the battery.

What is the weight limit? We set the weight limit at 200 lbs (91 kgs). It will carry heavier riders, but we caution against heavy riders heading straight up steeper hills or doing jumps as this could damage the motor or the frame.

What is the warranty? Our warranty is one year from receipt of the vehicle for any manufacturing defects.

When you ride Freedom, you're taking a stand for your health and the health of the planet. Go ahead and lead by example. And have a great time while you’re doing it.
Why launch now?
After years of development, TRIKKE has put the best of everything we know into a new design of uncompromising quality, and we are now prepared to bring you Freedom at an extraordinary value.
All the design work has been completed. The prototypes have been tested. We’re currently running a small pre-production to bring Freedom up to top TRIKKE standards. With your help we can throttle up and get Freedom into final production. We’re ready. We hope you are too.


Celebrate Freedom

 Please join us and celebrate Freedom - our best vehicle Ever. (We've come a long way since our early models landed us on the cover of TIME Magazine....)
                            


Renderings and Specs 
What you've seen in the photos and videos have been prototypes. Below are some renderings and the specs of the final product. 








SPECIFICATIONS:

Perks:
Freedom Wing Trucker's Hat:                                       
Freedom logo T-Shirt (please let us know male or female and your desired size)
The rest of the perks are Freedom electric carving vehicles... We think you know what those look like by now ;)Rider testimonials above and below are of our earlier models (pre new, improved hub motor and controller and better price)
Jenard: I use it to get to work. I park blocks away to get
the free parking. 

Frank: Poetry In Motion
Dennis: This device is way ahead of the curve and has competitors in this market beat.

Jörg: The Electric Trikke is the only electric vehicle that combines
sport and fun with personal transport. No other electric vehicle is so agile,
fast, light and flexible. All our customers, whether for business or pleasure
are very satisfied with their Trikke electric. And even if the battery is
empty, you can continue your journey with body movement. No other electric
vehicle offers this opportunity! We love our E-Trikke ;-)

Chris: Makes your commute the favorite part of your day...
Wilson: I use the battery for tough uphills, wind,
and fatigue. I so enjoy the feeling of speed when using the electric motor.
It's a thrill I didn't experience on my T-8 unless coming down on hills.
Difference is I can get the "need for speed" at any time.
Bill: I love it because I can use it to do some
intense exercise, or go over the Brooklyn bridge!!! How cool is that or even go
to my dentist...
Douglass:There is nothing like a little power assist when you just
don't feel like getting out on your manual model. So much fun and great for
bombing hills.
Dennis: I’m using mine to save gas, especially to
run errands around town. It is by far, the smartest, most economical and coolest vehicle
I've ever found. I can ride the bike paths here on the Vineyard and I must say,
I have no trouble negotiating traffic while in Boston or Cambridge. I'm addicted to its
intuitive ride. It turns on a dime and gives you a nickel back! The
"wow" factor of passers by is also adoring. The other MAJOR factor is
that you do not have to use the "juice" to make it go. You'll get a
full body exercise rocking & rolling it. I like to mix it up, using the
throttle to augment my body & maintain speed to maximize battery life.  Remember: if the battery quits you can still get home.
Cheryl: The movement. Power to go anywhere, nearly
effortless, yet a great workout. Is there any other competition??? Needed more
FUN in my life. Trikke delivered!
Roger: The Tribred Pon-e is handy for 'Major
Events' where you have to find parking space BLOCKS (or even miles) away. Just
unfold it and cruise (with all your stuff) to the site. It's also great for hitting all the 'hot spots' at Tailgate Parties! When I have multiple stops downtown or at the beach, I bring my electric Trikke along. I park ONCE, and use it to get my chores done in HALF the TIME, while not having to fight the traffic or look for additional parking. Just wish I could use the Trikke 'inside' the stores as
well.....Humm, maybe one of those Blue Plackards with the wheelchair.....is the
Ticket! Plus: while an E-Bike
is a "Pain in the 'tookus'"; the Tribred Pon-e is
"Up-Standing" FUN!

FAQs
How
fast does it go? For a rider of 175 lbs (80 kgs)
top speed will be about 15 mph (24 kph) on the flats.

How far
can I go on a charge?  On electric-power alone, range is approximately 11
miles/charge on the 6.6 Ah battery that comes with the Freedom. If you upgrade
to the 9Ah battery the range increases to approximately 15 miles. Some choose
to get an extra battery as well to go further. Add your own carving propulsion and you could double that and get a killer workout.

Do I
have to carve turns to make it go? Nope. Carving
turns can make it go farther and
faster and propel you without using the motor, but you can just cruise on all
electric too.
Is
the battery removable? Yep. You just twist the
key all the way to the left and pull it straight up off the guide rail. 
How
long does it take to recharge the battery? A
full recharge takes 4 hours from empty.
How
do I recharge the battery? It comes with a
charger that plugs into the wall outlet and into the battery.
What
is the weight limit? We set the weight limit at
200 lbs (91 kgs). It will carry heavier riders, but we caution against heavy
riders heading straight up steeper hills or doing jumps as this could damage
the motor or the frame. 
What
is the warranty? Our warranty is one year from
receipt of the vehicle for any manufacturing defects.

story:
The Lockheed Martin/Boeing F-22 Raptor is a single-seat, twin-engine fifth-generation supermaneuverable fighter aircraft that uses stealth technology. It was designed primarily as an air superiority fighter, but has additional capabilities that include ground attack, electronic warfare, and signals intelligence roles.[5] Lockheed Martin Aeronautics is the prime contractor and is responsible for the majority of the airframe, weapon systems and final assembly of the F-22. Program partner Boeing Defense, Space & Security provides the wings, aft fuselage, avionics integration, and training systems.

The aircraft was variously designated F-22 and F/A-22 during the years prior to formally entering USAF service in December 2005 as the F-22A. Despite a protracted and costly development period, the United States Air Force considers the F-22 a critical component of U.S. tactical air power, and claims that the aircraft is unmatched by any known or projected fighter.[6] Lockheed Martin claims that the Raptor's combination of stealth, speed, agility, precision and situational awareness, combined with air-to-air and air-to-ground combat capabilities, makes it the best overall fighter in the world today.[7] Air Chief Marshal Angus Houston, former Chief of the Australian Defence Force, said in 2004 that the "F-22 will be the most outstanding fighter plane ever built."[8]

The high cost of the aircraft, a lack of clear air-to-air combat missions because of delays in the Russian and Chinese fifth-generation fighter programs, a U.S. ban on Raptor exports, and the ongoing development of the planned cheaper and more versatile F-35 resulted in calls to end F-22 production.[N 1] In April 2009, the U.S. Department of Defense proposed to cease placing new orders, subject to Congressional approval, for a final procurement tally of 187 operational aircraft.[10] The National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010 lacked funding for further F-22 production. The final F-22 rolled off the assembly line on 13 December 2011 during a ceremony at Dobbins Air Reserve Base.[11]

Since 2010 the F-22 has been plagued by unresolved problems with its pilot oxygen systems which contributed to one crash and death of a pilot. In 2011 the fleet was grounded for four months before resuming flight operations, but reports of oxygen systems issues have continued.[12] In July 2012, the Air Force announced that the hypoxia-like symptoms experienced were caused by a faulty valve in the pilots' pressure vest; the valve was replaced and changes to the filtration system were also made.

story:
SERPENT-C 

SERPENT-W

 

What makes the SERPENT-W's motor special is that it is a rear-mounted dual drive brushless motor, which can offer a peak-power of 1800W, pushing the Serpent-W to a top speed of 40 km/h（24.86 mile/h. It can go for 15 km（9.32 miles）from just one charge. So when it comes to casual transport or speedy transport, this motor never fails you!

SERPENT-C vs. Competitors

SERPENT-W vs. Competitors

 

The SERPENT-W has a super comfortable deck. It is ultra-tough yet feels soft when you step on it. Crafted out of Aluminum Alloy, it's one of the strongest boards on the market, giving you confidence during rides. The design was inspired by the Arc Reactor and shark gills, which explains the sharp look. It's also highly portable, since it has a hallowed design and has a handle for easy carrying.

 

You don't have to download APPs to be able to ride the SERPENT Series, it will be just you and the remote! No more complicated setups, you can start riding it once you receive it! And because this remote control is so well designed and crafted, you can have full control over the SERPENT Series!

story:
Brilrider Story:

Brilrider balance bikes are India's First, Favorite and highest selling balance bikes! 

I launched the Brilrider for my 1.5 year-old son Raghav back in 2011 in Bangalore, India. Since then Brilrider has achieved tremendous success in India and is currently India's most loved balance bike for the youngest of toddlers. Brilrider has an India design patent and is one of the best designed balance bikes in the world. 

The Brilrider is a revolution in the bicycle space, enabling babies / children as young as 18 month-5 years to start riding without trainer wheels or support! The Brilrider works on a very simple concept of working with the natural and instinctive capabilities of your child. The correct time to start babies on the Brilrider, is when they are able to walk steadily without falling often. Initially, your baby will just use the Brilrider to walk with, as its simple pedal-free and handlebar-limiter-free design enables the baby to walk without restriction. As the child gets confident walking and taking charge of his cool Brilrider, you will notice how he/she starts experimenting with his/her feet-up as he learns that the wheels offer him a faster mode of transport!

With 7 years of experience making the Brilrider the coolest balance bike, we are now launching the Brilrider Flight to the world!

Brilrider will enter the US market in 2019 with an all-new, feather-light model- Brilrider Flight! It comes with an all-new stunning fluid design with ergonomic angular footrests, airplane-grade aluminium frame, handlebar and seat stem and scintillating anodized, sand-blasted metallic finish! It weighs just 1.9 Kgs (4 lbs)- the lightest balance bike in the world, that even an 18 month-old baby can lift it! It comes with ultra-light 12" EVA puncture-proof tyres and we have even brought down the lowest seat position to just 11" from the ground. We want the youngest of babies and parents world over to experience the sheer joy of the Brilrider Flight Experience!

These are some customer submitted videos (some are also looped on NickJr and other national Televsion Channels)  just so you understand how loved the Brilrider brand is in India (Please note the Brilrider bike models in videos and some photos differ from the new Brilrider being launched):

 
 

 

 

The Brilrider Flight comes with an India Design Patent too!

What We Need & What You Get

Guaranteed Shipping and Free Shipping to USA backers! With a proven track record of delivering world class balance bikes, we have started this Indiegogo campaign, not because we need the funds to launch, but because we want to get the word out about our global launch early.

By backing us now, you will be helping us spread the word about this amazing new Brilrider Flight to parents around the world, and in return we are giving you the Brilrider Flight at prices that you will NEVER be able to get once it is launched in 2019! So this is win-win and we will be ever grateful to our early backers for helping us getting the buzz going well before launch. Since this is a flexible funding campaign, no matter how much money we raise, we WILL ship to all our backers. We take out the risk, as you are backing a new product from an established 54-year-old, well established family business!

We have the experience of delivering world-class products and are now offering the New Brilrider Flight to early, pre-launch backers at 99%- 50% off on the retail price of USD 160. Yes, if you back the Brilrider Flight you can get your hands on the Brilrider Flight at just $1- $80 per bike. Please note that the highly discounted perks are time-bound and will go fast! So be quick and claim your perks and spread the word!

The Impact

We want this bike to wow parents and toddlers world over and for this, we need your support no matter where you live in the world! Your money goes to a well established trusted family business that has delivered world-class products for children since 1964! So when you back the Brilrider Flight, you will get the best designed, most easy-to-assemble and easy-to-use balance bike for your baby. With a Brilrider Flight, Your Baby Can Balance*! 

Once you pick up a Brilrider Flight at these unbelievable prices, don't forget to share it with your friends who have 1-5 year-old kids too!

We have been perfecting the art of making the best balance bikes in the world since 2011! See the existing Brilrider models stocked in our warehouse below:

We showed the new Brilrider to the world at Interbike 2018 Reno-Tahoe, Nevada USA! The New Brilrider Flight was hands down the most loved balance bike at America's biggest cycling event. Every kid who dropped by wanted a Brilrider Flight!

Some photos of our booth and visitors at Interbike 2018:

It is the most easy bike to assmble! Watch the Assembly Video below:

More Customer Submitted Videos:

Even a 1.5 year-old can take control of the Brilrider with ease:

1.8-3 Years Old and Riding Like Pros!
 
 
 
 

Deliveries commence in two batches:

Late January / Early February 2019 and

March 2019 on first come first served basis

Free Shipping for US and India customers only (Free Shipping to India Customers may not apply to some perks) 

Customs duty and other taxes that may be applicable in country of import are to be borne by buyer (customer)

*Skill levels may vary, some children take to the Brilrider much later than indicated age

Warning: Adult supervision at all times during use is highly recommended. This is a two wheeler and use of helmet is highly recommended to prevent injury. By purchasing this product, the parent/customer indemnifies Bril, Bril India Pvt Ltd and all Brilriderassociates of any mental, physical, emotional or monetary liability to the child, parent or any third party that may arise due to use of this product.

More Customer Submitted Videos:

story:
About Us

Formula uOttawa is a student-run organization that represents the University of Ottawa. Our team of 40 students designs and builds an open-wheeled race car to compete in various divisions within competitions like Formula North and Formula SAE Michigan. Composed of students in multiple disciplines from engineering to business, the team commits thousands of hours solving challenges that prepare them for projects in their future workplace setting and career outside of school.  

How Does Your Donation Help? 

Every donation made helps us change our focus from fundraising to our passion of engineering and creating. Displayed in our budget, we’ve identified various fundraising goals and what we can accomplish with the respective amount of donations. Any amount moves us closer to continue our difficult project of engineering, designing and building our open-wheeled racecar.

By donating you will not only be helping build a car; you will be investing in the next generation of engineers, entrepreneurs, and leaders.  

The Team  

Composed of 40 students, Formula uOttawa is a completely extracurricular team where its members volunteer their time to pursue this project. With respect to that, it naturally attracts some of the most dedicated and driven students. Outside of the classroom, our Formula project provides them with experience in all levels of an engineering business. This experience gives student the confidence and knowledge needed in the world outside of the classroom.  

The Budget  

Our team has strategically set up a budget for goals reached during this campaign.  

 $1,000

  • Toolbox, deep socket kit
  • New steering components  
  • Redesign and build new rear suspension  

$3,000 

  • Everything from $1,000
  • Jack, jack stands 
  • Rims and wet tires for competition testing 

$5,000 

  • Everything from $3,000
  • Materials for redesign of more efficient intake 
  • Redesign body with carbon fiber
  • Soldering iron and filler, welding filler

$7,000

  • Everything from $5,000
  • New differential

story:
Cryptosteel is an indestructible stainless steel artefact which stores your confidential information without the use of third parties. Simply hand-assemble your private sentence from the supplied letter-blocks, enclose the data in the cold wallet and rest-assured of its safety.

Cryptosteel is fireproof, corrosion-resistant, acid-resistant and virtually uncrushable. Furthermore, the fact that the wallet operates entirely offline means that, unlike engraved plates with a QR code, no third party can access the owner’s personal data.


Cryptosteel is the result of a long process of design evolution through which our innovative team endeavoured to marry the enduring typographical legacies of the Renaissance Gutenberg Press with the material robustness of a military dog tag.

Human history has consistently demonstrated that one cannot rely on hard drives or electronic devices to safe-guard their private information and all of the world’s biggest, ostensibly most reliable institutions are prone to dissolution. In this context Cryptosteel is marked out as an ideal confidential information storage-system: even the worst disasters cannot destroy the cold wallet’s stainless steel construction (AISI 304). 

The wallet thus stands to benefit bitcoin and non-bitcoin users alike. Cryptosteel functions as an ideal place to store passwords of any kind as well as confidential family information. 

Think of the artefact as like a readily-accessible safe deposit box: you decide what goes in and out and you are the only one who can make any changes.  

The essence of Cryptosteel is peace of mind, and the security benefits of the wallet have only been enhanced as a result of our recent collaboration with the world-leading bitcoin security specialists, SatoshiLabs. As Cryptosteel Inventor,  Wojciech Stopinski, observed: 

“If we want to become our own banks, we need to protect our assets. That's where Trezor and Cryptosteel come in. Together we have created the everlasting bitcoin safe. SatoshiLabs took the original design and functionality of Cryptosteel and upgraded it, making it even better and with increased benefits to user"


Cryptosteel comes with more than 250 stainless steel letter blocks engraved on each side. Users are able to store up to 96 characters worth of confidential information in the cold wallet in minutes, guaranteeing the data’s safety without the need for specialized tools. 

Furthermore, the fact that storing information in Cryptosteel requires no third-party contact (even with us) means the user remains in full control of their own anonymity as well as the security of their data is throughout the process.

The final product, you are pledging for:


  • Container for up to 96 characters + stainless steel letter tiles
    variant one:
  • Unit "MNEMONIC" Master Mnemonic Seed BIP39 Ready. 250+ letter tiles
    variant two: 
  • Unit "ANY KEY" Upper and lower case and numbers. 320+ letter tiles

  • Private, off-line storage for private keys and passwords
  • Lightweight, stainless steel
  • Indestructible, acid­resistant, and uncrushable
  • Fireproof up to 1200 C, or 2100 F
  • Open-Hardware: blueprints available under CC License
  • Compatibility: Bitcoin and all cryptocurrencies
  • No tools necessary
  • Made in Poland

In this respect the artefact is ideal for use in the context of ultra-secure setups involving multisig wallets. As Director of SatoshiLabs, Alena Vranova, pointed out:  "Cryptosteel will come to be used as an “eternal backup” for future generations, adding that the cold wallet “represents an advanced form of the TREZOR Recovery seed card. it’s anonymous, offline and confidential but moreover, it’s really durable, resistant to fire or water.” 

click here to contribute in Bitcoin


Why are we crowdfunding?

Bitcoin users made this product for the Bitcoin community.

We are collecting funds for special tools for our assembly lines. Final product have to be accomplish with mechanical press with maximum pressure of 120 tones. This will allow us to obtain proper repeatability in a big production series and allow us to produce shallow-bended, deep-press elements with engraving.

We would like to raise money for tools and stamps so we can keep the price down for customers.

The Cryptosteel team innovated the cold wallet as a result of experiencing the same difficulties that you all have in attempting to identify a storage system guaranteed to fully safeguard your information. We believe that we have come up with the solution.  

Cryptosteel is an Open Source project and full blueprints will be made available on an Open Hardware basis. All monies raised through the crowdfunding campaign will be managed with full transparency and invested in specialized tools to expand our assembly line as well as in start-up costs so as to keep retail prices at a minimum.

In addition to pledges Cryptosteel also needs your attention and interest! 


Streach Goal: $10,000 Mutant Packaging for Cryptosteel

Visit "Updates" section for additional informations according to Streach Goal 



Our Friends and Supporters



Final Thank You and Links

The Cryptosteel team feel deeply grateful to all those who have taken the time to read about our campaign and contribute what they could to helping us get off the ground and spread the word about our project.

We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life and this campaign has been worth every minute thanks to all of our generous supporters. We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us to achieve. You are part of our “Cryptosteel” community.

If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us! Help us spreading the word!

If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of the below-linked social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube) and help us spread the word and get things started!
story_txt:
Cryptosteel is an indestructible stainless steel artefact which stores your confidential information without the use of third parties. Simply hand-assemble your private sentence from the supplied letter-blocks, enclose the data in the cold wallet and rest-assured of its safety.Cryptosteel is fireproof, corrosion-resistant, acid-resistant and virtually uncrushable. Furthermore, the fact that the wallet operates entirely offline means that, unlike engraved plates with a QR code, no third party can access the owner’s personal data.




Cryptosteel is the result of a long process of design evolution through which our innovative team endeavoured to marry the enduring typographical legacies of the Renaissance Gutenberg Press with the material robustness of a military dog tag.

Human history has consistently demonstrated that one cannot rely on hard drives or electronic devices to safe-guard their private information and all of the world’s biggest, ostensibly most reliable institutions are prone to dissolution. In this context Cryptosteel is marked out as an ideal confidential information storage-system: even the worst disasters cannot destroy the cold wallet’s stainless steel construction (AISI 304). 


The wallet thus stands to benefit bitcoin and non-bitcoin users alike. Cryptosteel functions as an ideal place to store passwords of any kind as well as confidential family information. 
Think of the artefact as like a readily-accessible safe deposit box: you decide what goes in and out and you are the only one who can make any changes.  
The essence of Cryptosteel is peace of mind, and the security benefits of the wallet have only been enhanced as a result of our recent collaboration with the world-leading bitcoin security specialists, SatoshiLabs. As Cryptosteel Inventor,  Wojciech Stopinski, observed: 
“If we want to become our own banks, we need to protect our assets. That's where Trezor and Cryptosteel come in. Together we have created the everlasting bitcoin safe. SatoshiLabs took the original design and functionality of Cryptosteel and upgraded it, making it even better and with increased benefits to user"



Cryptosteel comes with more than 250 stainless steel letter blocks engraved on each side. Users are able to store up to 96 characters worth of confidential information in the cold wallet in minutes, guaranteeing the data’s safety without the need for specialized tools. 
Furthermore, the fact that storing information in Cryptosteel requires no third-party contact (even with us) means the user remains in full control of their own anonymity as well as the security of their data is throughout the process.


The final product, you are pledging for:





Container for up to 96 characters + stainless steel letter tilesvariant one:
Unit "MNEMONIC" Master Mnemonic Seed BIP39 Ready. 250+ letter tilesvariant two: 
Unit "ANY KEY" Upper and lower case and numbers. 320+ letter tiles

Private, off-line storage for private keys and passwords


Lightweight, stainless steel


Indestructible, acid­resistant, and uncrushable


Fireproof up to 1200 C, or 2100 F


Open-Hardware: blueprints available under CC License


Compatibility: Bitcoin and all cryptocurrencies

No tools necessary
Made in Poland

In this respect the artefact is ideal for use in the context of ultra-secure setups involving multisig wallets. As Director of SatoshiLabs, Alena Vranova, pointed out:  "Cryptosteel will come to be used as an “eternal backup” for future generations, adding that the cold wallet “represents an advanced form of the TREZOR Recovery seed card. it’s anonymous, offline and confidential but moreover, it’s really durable, resistant to fire or water.” 
click here to contribute in Bitcoin








Why are we crowdfunding?
Bitcoin users made this product for the Bitcoin community.

We are collecting funds for special tools for our assembly lines. Final product have to be accomplish with mechanical press with maximum pressure of 120 tones. This will allow us to obtain proper repeatability in a big production series and allow us to produce shallow-bended, deep-press elements with engraving.
We would like to raise money for tools and stamps so we can keep the price down for customers.
The Cryptosteel team innovated the cold wallet as a result of experiencing the same difficulties that you all have in attempting to identify a storage system guaranteed to fully safeguard your information. We believe that we have come up with the solution.  
Cryptosteel is an Open Source project and full blueprints will be made available on an Open Hardware basis. All monies raised through the crowdfunding campaign will be managed with full transparency and invested in specialized tools to expand our assembly line as well as in start-up costs so as to keep retail prices at a minimum.
In addition to pledges Cryptosteel also needs your attention and interest! 


Streach Goal: $10,000 Mutant Packaging for Cryptosteel
Visit "Updates" section for additional informations according to Streach Goal 


Our Friends and Supporters





Final Thank You and Links


The Cryptosteel team feel deeply grateful to all those who have taken the time to read about our campaign and contribute what they could to helping us get off the ground and spread the word about our project.


We have spent the last few months working hard to bring our vision to life and this campaign has been worth every minute thanks to all of our generous supporters.  We will continue to keep you posted on what your donation helped us to achieve. You are part of our “Cryptosteel” community.


If you cannot donate but you are interested in helping, please contact us! Help us spreading the word!
If you love this product as much as we do then please take a moment to click on one of the below-linked social media buttons (Facebook, Twitter and YouTube) and help us spread the word and get things started!

story:
Hi!  I'm Tieta.  I just turned 1 last week and I didn't get a car for my birthday.

I come from a family of entrepreneurs.  My great-great-grandfather was a carpenter.  He built the original Rock Spring School and Center Grove Baptist Church in Rock Spring, GA.  He also built the building where my nana and I works. 

The building was originally my great-grandparents Service Station...I don't know what that is, but I'm told that it's pre-convenient store.  It was called  "Blevins and Son Phillips 66."  If you're old, you might remember it.

As time passed, it became a convenient store.  And, then, my nana had a video store...Noble Zone.  She talks about VHS.  I don't know what that is either, but she says it's like DVD only better.  Now, my mommie, nana and I are trying to get a resale shop going in the place.  It's not easy, but I do what I can.

My daddy is an entrepreneur, too!  He owns "Rodney's Salvage and Moving."  Bottom line...he deals with scrap metal and brings the good stuff he gets to our resale shop.  He works way too hard and puts in long hours and sometimes, he's even too tired to play with me!  But, I make him laugh and then he plays. 

My daddy drives a junk truck on his job.  My mommie says it cost too much gas to use everyday.  He can't afford to replace it.  I don't like to ride in it.  It doesn't have air-conditioning!  He needs a new one, but mommie says that's not the priority, right now.  I don't know what priority is either.  My mommie and nana say such big words.

I do know that sometimes, when we get ready to go, we don't go.  The truck doesn't always crank and has a lot of flat tires.  I don't know what would happen if I fell and needed to go to the hospital and the truck wouldn't crank or had a flat.  We borrow my granddaddys car sometimes, but it's not always available when we need it.

My nana had a car, but it stopped working.  So, we need $2500.00 to buy nana a car and mommie a car and fix daddy's truck.  Nana says it'll take years before the store can afford to buy a car.  So, I told her I'd see what I could do to get her and mommie a car.  All I can do is ask for you to send nana money.

My mommie had to get a "real" job.  Now me and nana are running the store.  We have to close, sometimes, when we should be open so we can take mommie to work.  She needs a car so she can get to work without hurting our business.  I don't know how many customers come by and leave and never come back because we were closed when we should be open.

So, if you think I'm cute and you don't want to see me sweat in that junk truck my daddy has, contribute to the cause so me and nana can get an air-conditioned car.  I want a Viper but my nana says, "Not in the budget."  I saw one the other day.  It was pretty!  It made me say, "Vrroom!"
